T01bsu018_u:4: buddhaṃ praṇamya sarvajñaṃ dharmaṃ saṅghaṃ guṇākaraṃ /
T01bsu018_u:7: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ sarvairarhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptairabhijñānābhijñātairmahāśrāvakaiḥ (KpSū 2) tadyathā, āyuṣmatā cājñātakauṇḍinyena āyuṣmatā cāsvajitā āyuṣmatā ca bāṣpeṇa āyuṣmatā ca mahāsthāmnā āyuṣmatā ca bhadrikeṇa āyuṣmatā ca mahākāśyapena āyuṣmatā coruvilvākāśyapena āyuṣmatā ca gayākāśyepena āyuṣmatā ca śāriputreṇa āyuṣmatā ca mahāmaudgalyāyanena āyuṣmatā ca
T01bsu018_u:8: mahākātyāyanena āyuṣmatā cāniruddhena āyuṣmatā ca revatena āyuṣmatā ca kaṃphillena āyuṣmatā ca gavāṃpatinā āyuṣmatā ca pilindavatsena āyuṣmatā ca bakulena āyuṣmatā ca mahākauṣṭhilena āyuṣmatā ca bharadvājena āyuṣmatā ca mahānandena āyuṣmatā copanandena āyuṣmatā ca sundaranandena āyuṣmatā ca pūrṇena āyuṣmatā ca subhūtinā āyuṣmatā ca rāhulena /
T01bsu018_u:9: evaṃ pramukhaiścānekairmahāśrākairāyuṣmatā cānandena śaikṣeṇa, anyābhyāṃ bhikṣusahasrābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:11: ṣaḍbhikṣuṇīsahasraiḥ, yaśodharayā ca bhikṣuṇyā rāhulamātrā saparivārayā /
T01bsu018_u:14: bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlairbahubuddhaśatasahasrasaṃstutairmaitrīparibhāvitakāyacittaistathāgatajñānāvatāraṇakuśalairmahāprajñaiḥ prajñāpāramitāgatiṃgatairbahulokadhātuśatasahasraviśrutairbahuprāṇakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasaṃpālakaiḥ tadyathā, mañjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca sarvārthanāmnā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca ratnapāṇinā ca bhaiṣajyarājena ca bhaiṣajyasamudgatena ca vyūharājena ca pradānaśūreṇa ca ratnacandreṇa ca pūrṇacandreṇa ca mahāvikramiṇā ca anantavikramiṇā ca trailokyavikramiṇā ca mahāpratibhānena ca satatasamitābhiyuktena ca dharaṇiṃdhareṇa ca
T01bsu018_u:15: akṣayamatinā ca mahāmatinā ca śāntamatinā ca nakṣatrarājena ca ratnavairocanena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena siṃhena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
T01bsu018_u:17: tadyathā, bhadrapālena ca ratnākareṇa ca susārthavāhena ca naradattena ca guhaguptena ca varuṇadattena
T01bsu018_u:18: indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikramiṇā (KpSū 4) ca anupamamatinā ca sūryagarbheṇa ca dharaṇiṃdhareṇa ca /
T01bsu018_u:21: tadyathā, candreṇa ca devaputreṇa sūryeṇa ca samantagandhena ca ratnaprabheṇa ca avabhāsaprabheṇa ca /
T01bsu018_u:24: brahmaṇā ca sahāpatinā sārdhaṃ dvādaśabrahmakāyikāsahasreṇa śikhinā ca brahmaṇā jyotiḥprabheṇa ca brahmanā /
T01bsu018_u:32: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavāṃścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ (KpSū 5) pūjito 'rcito 'pacāyitaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:33: tadā bodhisattvaviṣayasaṃdarśanapraṇidhānavyūhasamādhiviṣayadhāraṇīmukhavyūhaṃ samādhānamukhanirdeśaṃ caryāvaiśāradyaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvānugataṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitumārabdhavān,
T01bsu018_u:34: tadā nānāvarṇaraśmayo niścaritā yatprabhābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturmahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt /
T01bsu018_u:35: tena cāvabhāsena lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakāratamisrāḥ, yatremau candrasūryau eva maharddhikau mahānubhāvau maheśākhyau nābhipatato na virocatastatra ye sattvā upapannāste svakasvakamapi bāhuprasāritaṃ na paśyanti sma, tatrāpi tenāvabhāsena parisphuṭāḥ samānā anyonyaṃ paśyanti smānyonyaṃ saṃjānante sma /
T01bsu018_u:36: sarvāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi ca parisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma yāvad avīcirmahānirayo yāvadbrahmalokaṃ parisphuṭaṃ dṛśyate sma /
T01bsu018_u:37: ye ca teṣu sarveṣu kṣetreṣu ṣaṭsu gatiṣu sattvāste sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu018_u:38: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanto dhriyanto yāpayanto yaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣante sma sa ca sarvo nikhilena śrūyate sma /
T01bsu018_u:39: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā yogino yogācārāḥ prāptaphalāścāprāptaphalāśca te 'pi (KpSū 6) sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu018_u:40: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
T01bsu018_u:43: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtāste 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu018_u:44: ye ca teṣu parinirvṛtānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ratnamayadhātustūpāste 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu018_u:45: antarīkṣācca puṣpavarṣam abhiprāvarṣat, manojñaśabdā amāradundubhyaḥ prasasvanuḥ ; sarvaścāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram aṣṭādaśamahānimittam akampat prākampat saṃprākampat, avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat, acalat prācalat saṃprācalat, akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat, araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat, agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat /
T01bsu018_u:46: tasmin kṣaṇe sarvato lokeṣu harṣaṇīyāstoṣaṇīyāḥ prasādanīyā avalokanīyāḥ prahlādanīyā manojñāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante sma /
T01bsu018_u:47: na ca kasyacit sattvasya viheṭhā vā trāso vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vā /
T01bsu018_u:50: na ca kasyacit sattvasya rāgo vā dveṣo vā moho vā mātsaryo (KpSū 7) vā īrṣyā vā māno vā mrakṣo vā mado vā krodho vā vyāpādo vā paridāho vā bādhate /
T01bsu018_u:52: atha ratnavairocano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ mahānimittaprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāyaikāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat "paramāścaryādbhutaprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan, kuta ime raśmaya āgatāḥ?,
T01bsu018_u:53: kasyaiṣa prabhāvaḥ?, ko nvatra bhagavan hetuḥ?, kaḥ pratyayo bhaviṣyati?"
T01bsu018_u:54: atha khalu bhagavān ratnavairocanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat -
T01bsu018_u:55: "śṛṇu kulaputra sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te" /
T01bsu018_u:57: sādhu bhagavan" niti ratnavairocano bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt /
T01bsu018_u:59: "asti kulaputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi, ito buddhakṣetrakoṭīśatasahasragaṅgānadīvālukāsamān buddhakṣetrān atikramya padmā nāma lokadhāturnānāguṇavibhūṣitā nānāpuṣpasamīritā nānāgandhaiśca
T01bsu018_u:60: sphuṭā ratnavṛkṣairalaṅkṛtā ratnaparvatairākīrṇā; nīlavaiḍūryamayī tatra bhūmir (KpSū 8) bodhisattvairākīrṇā dharmaśabdena sphuṭā; sā ca punarvaiḍūryamayī bhūmirmṛdukācalindikasukhasaṃsparśa, nikṣipte ca caraṇe
T01bsu018_u:64: saptayojanānyuccatvena; teṣu ca vṛkṣeṣu divyakāṣāyavastrāṇi pralambante,
T01bsu018_u:65: divyāni ca vādyāni manojñāni saṃpravādyante; teṣu ca vṛkṣeṣu nānāśakuntā indriyabalabodhyaṅgamanojñāṃ śabdāṃ pravyāharanti; teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ patrāṇi
T01bsu018_u:67: ekaikasya ca vṛkṣasya divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena yojanasahasraṃ
T01bsu018_u:68: sphurati; teṣu ca vṛkṣeṣu divyānyalaṅkārāṇyabhipralambante sma /
T01bsu018_u:69: teṣu ca vṛkṣāntareṣu saptaratnamayāḥ kūṭāgārāḥ, pañcayojanaśatamuccatvena sapādaśatayojanaṃ vistāreṇa /
T01bsu018_u:74: sāmantakāśca puṣkariṇyaḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ padmaiḥ pūrṇāḥ, ekaikaṃ ca padmaṃ (KpSū 9)
T01bsu018_u:77: prajāyanti; te rātryāḥ prathame yāme teṣu padmakeśareṣupapadyante, tāṃ ca rātriṃ paryaṅkenātināmayanti, vimuktiprītisukhaṃ ca pratisaṃvedayanti /
T01bsu018_u:78: tatra ca rātryāḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye śītalā vāyavaḥ sugandhikā mṛdukāḥ sukhasaṃsparśacalitāḥ pravāyante, te ca saṃkucitāni puṣpāṇi rohayanti /
T01bsu018_u:79: te ca bodhisattvāḥ samādhito vyutthāya vimuktiprītisukhaṃ pratiprasrabhya
T01bsu018_u:80: padmakeśareṣvavatīryā, teṣu ca kūṭāgāreṣu praviśya saptaratnamayeṣvāsaneṣu paryaṅkeṇa niṣaṇṇā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
T01bsu018_u:81: teṣu ca vṛkṣakūṭāgārāntariteṣu ca caturdiśaṃ jāmbunadamayāḥ parvatā, viṃśatiyojanānyuccatvena trīṇi yojanāni vistāreṇa; teṣu ca parvateṣu anekaśatasahasrāṇi sūryakāntacandrakāntendranīlajyotīrasāśca maṇayo 'ntarāntare dṛśyanti sma /
T01bsu018_u:82: padmottarasya buddhasyābhā teṣu parvatemaṇiṣu nipatyā tayā ca buddhābhayā ca maṇiprabhayā sarvā sā padmā lokadhāturnityodāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā /
T01bsu018_u:83: na ca tatra candrasūryayoḥ prabhā prajñāyate, nānyatra yadā padmāḥ saṃkucanti pakṣiṇaścālpaśabdā bhavanti tadā rātrīti saṃjñā bhavati,
T01bsu018_u:85: teṣāṃ ca (KpSū 10) parvatānāmupari nīlavaiḍūryamayāḥ kūṭāgārāḥ ṣaṣṭiyojanānyuccatvena viṃśatiyojanāni vistāreṇa, tebhyaśca kūṭāgārebhyaścaturdiśaṃ saptaratnamayāstoraṇāstebhyaḥ kūṭāgārebhyaśca saptaratnamayāḥ paryaṅkā yatraikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvā dharmaṃ
T01bsu018_u:87: padmāyāṃ kulaputra lokadhātau indro nāma bodhivṛkṣastrīṇi yojanasahasrāṇyudvedhena pañcayojanaśatāni vistāreṇa, yojanasahasraṃ śākhāpatrapalāśaṃ susaṃsthitaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:88: tasya ca bodhivṛkṣasya mūle padmo raupyamayo nālaḥ pañcayojanaśatānyudvedhena, tasya koṭīśatasahasrasuvarṇamayāni patrāṇi pañcadaśayojanānyudvedhena /
T01bsu018_u:89: sarveṣu ca keśareṣvaśmagarbhamayāni kiñjalkāni, saptaratnamayāḥ keśarā daśayojanānyudvedhena saptayojanāni vistāreṇa /
T01bsu018_u:91: samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā, tasya buddhāsanapadmasya samantataḥ padmā yatra bodhisattvā niṣaṇṇāḥ padmottarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
T01bsu018_u:96: paścime yāme padmottareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā, rātryāḥ pratyuśakālasamaye tadrupamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān, yāvad brahmalokamātmānamabhinirmāya uṣṇīṣamūrdhnaḥ
T01bsu018_u:97: ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pramucyate, raśmibhirūrdhvāyā diśo buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn avabhāsayati /
T01bsu018_u:98: ye punastasmin samaye ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi sthitā bodhisattvā adhodiśam avalokayanti, teṣāṃ na sumeruravabhāsamāgacchati, na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na kālaparvatāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:99: ye ca bodhisattvāstebhyo lokadhātubhyo vyākṛtā ye samādhipratilabdhā ye dhāraṇīpratilabdhā ye kṣāntipratilabdhā ye ca bhūmyatikrāntā ye caikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāste 'pi tenāvabhāsena sphuṭā,
T01bsu018_u:100: añjaliṃ pragṛhya padmottarasya tathāgatasyātmabhāvaṃ vyavalokayitvā dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtagātraṃ aśītibhiścānuvyañjanairdṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ bodhisattvaparṣadaṃ padmāṃ ca
T01bsu018_u:102: (KpSū 12) ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamebhyo lokadhātubhyo gaṇanāsamatikrāntā bodhisattvāstāṃstāṃ lokadhātūnapahāya ṛddhibalena padmāṃ lokadhātumanuprāptāḥ padmottarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
T01bsu018_u:103: sa ca kulaputra padmottarastathāgato jihvendriyaṃ mukhānnirnāmayitvā sarvāvatīmimāṃ cāturdvīpikāṃ lokadhātuṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ sthitāścaṅkramanto jihvendriyeṇa paricchāditavān /
T01bsu018_u:104: ye cātra bodhisattvāḥ samāpannāste samādhibhyo vyutthāya sarvāvatī sā parṣat padmottarasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe udyuktā /
T01bsu018_u:107: sarvaromakūpebhya ekaikasmād romakūpavivarāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niścārayitvā daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ lokadhātūn udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuritvā,
T01bsu018_u:108: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstebhyo lokadhātubhyo vyākṛtā ye samādhipratilabdhā iti te 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svakasvakabuddhakṣetrābhayā ṛddhibalena padmāṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃprāptāḥ padmottarasya (KpSū 13) tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya pūjanāya paryupāsanāya atha khalu kulaputra padmottarastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ pratiprasrabhya sarvāvatyāṃ bodhisattvaparṣadi avaivartikacakraṃ nāma dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitavān bahujanahitāya
T01bsu018_u:109: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai, arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca mahāyānasya paripūraṇārthaṃ" //
T01bsu018_u:110: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dharmacakrapravartano nāma prathamaḥ parivartaḥ // 1
T01bsu018_u:112: dvitīyo dhāraṇīmukhaparivartaḥ atha khalu ratnavairocano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat
T01bsu018_u:113: "kathaṃ bhadanta bhagavan padmāyāṃ lokadhātau rātriṃdivaṃ prajñāyate?,
T01bsu018_u:114: kiyadrūpāśca tatra śabdāḥ śrūyante?, kiyadrūpeṇa te bodhisattvāścāśayena
T01bsu018_u:115: samanvāgatāḥ?, katamena vā vihareṇa viharanti?" bhagavān āha -
T01bsu018_u:118: saṃkucanti, pakṣiṇaścālpaśabdā bhavanti, bhagavāṃśca te ca bodhisattvā dhyānaiḥ krīḍanti vimuktiprītisukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti, tadā rātrīti prajñāyate /
T01bsu018_u:119: yadā punaste puṣpā vāteneritā bhavanti, śakunāśca manojñāni kūjanti, puṣpavṛṣṭiścābhipravarṣati, caturdiśaṃ paramasugandhā manojñā
T01bsu018_u:120: mṛdukāḥ sukhasaṃsparśā vāyavaḥ pravāyanti, bhagavāṃśca samādhervyutthāya padmottaro bodhisattvānāṃ
T01bsu018_u:121: śrāvakapratyekabuddhakathāṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, tena ca tatra divasaḥ prajñāyate /
T01bsu018_u:122: avirahitāśca tatra kulaputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena (KpSū 15)
T01bsu018_u:123: vaiśāradyaśabdenānabhisaṃskāraśabdenānutpādaśabdenānirodhaśabdena śāntaśabdenopaśāntaśabdena praśāntaśabdena mahāmaitrīśabdena mahākaruṇāśabdenānutpattikadharmaśabdenābhiṣekabhūmipratilābhaśabdena buddhabodhisattvaśabdenāvirahitā, nityaṃ te bodhisattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇvanti sma punaraparaṃ kulaputra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ padmāyāṃ lokadhātau pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā sarve te dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatā yojanaprabhā hyavinipātadharmāṇo yāvadbodhiparyantāt /
T01bsu018_u:124: sarve te bodhisattvā maitracittāḥ snigdhacittā akaluṣacittā dāntacittāḥ kṣamācittāḥ samāhitacittāḥ prasannacittā apratihatacittāḥ śuddhacittāḥ kalyāṇacittā dharmaprīticittāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kleśapraśamanacittāḥ pṛthivīsamacittā laukikāyāṃ kathāyām anabhiratacittā lokottarāyāṃ kathāyāṃ sābhiratacittāḥ sarvakuśaladharmaparyeṣṭicittā nirupadhau (KpSū 16) sadāprayuktacittā vyādhijarāmaraṇebhyaḥ praśāntacittāḥ sarvakleśadahanacittāḥ sarvasaṃyojanapraśamanacittāḥ sarvadharmāmanyanacittāḥ, āśayabalinaḥ prayogabalinaḥ pratyayabalinaḥ praṇidhānabalino 'sārabhinnāccālanabalino
T01bsu018_u:125: nidhyaptibalinaḥ kuśalamūlabalinaḥ samādhānabalinaḥ śrutabalinaḥ śīlabalinaḥ tyāgabalinaḥ kṣāntibalino vīryabalino dhyānabalinaḥ prajñābalinaḥ śamathabalino vipaśyanābalino 'bhijñābalinaḥ smṛtibalino bodhibalinaḥ sarvamāravidhvaṃsanabalinaḥ sarvamārabalapramardanabalinaḥ sarvaparapravādināṃ sahadharmeṇa nigrahabalinaḥ sarvakleśapramardanabalinaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:126: te ca bodhisattvā ye padmāyāṃ lokadhātau pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā bahubuddhaśatasahasrakṛtādhikārā hi avaruptakuśalamūlā; ye ca tatra padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre
T01bsu018_u:127: bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā dhyānāhārāste bodhisattvā dharmāhārā gandhāhārāstadyathāpi nāma devā (KpSū 17) brahmakāyikā, na ca tatra kavaḍikāhārāḥ prajñāyante /
T01bsu018_u:129: sarvaśaśca tatra mātṛgrāmasya nāmāpi nāsti, prajñaptirapi nāsti;
T01bsu018_u:130: sarvaśaśca tatra duḥkhaśabdo nāsti; sarvathā priyāpriyaśabdo nāsti,
T01bsu018_u:131: peyālaṃ na kleśaśabdo na parigraho na cātrāndhakāraṃ na durgandhaṃ na cittaklamatā na kāyaklamatā na narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:132: apāyaprajñaptirapi nāsti, na kaṇṭakagahanapāṣāṇaśarkarā na cāgnirna candrasūryā na tārakārūpā na mahāsamudrā na sumerucakravāḍā na lokāntarikā na kālaparvatā na mīḍhapāṣāṇā na pāṃśuparvatāḥ, na meghavarṣaśabdo na
T01bsu018_u:134: atha ca punaḥ padmā lokadhāturnityaṃ buddhābhayā bodhisattvābhayā puṇyābhayā ratnābhayā udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā /
T01bsu018_u:135: saphalāścātra nāma pakṣiṇomanojñāḥ snigdhāḥ svakasvakena svareṇa indriyabalabodhyaṅgāni pravyāharanti
T01bsu018_u:137: bhagavan sā padmā lokadhātuḥ?, (KpSū 18) kiyacciramasau padmottarastathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati yenādyarātrāvanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiracirābhisaṃbuddhā?, kiyacciraṃ ca parinirvṛtasya saddharmaḥ sthāsyati?, kiyaccirasthāyinaste bodhisattvā ye
T01bsu018_u:138: padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā?, kin te bodhisattvā virahitā buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānena utāhosvinneti?, kiṃ nāma cāsītpūrve sā padmā lokadhātuḥ?, kiyaccireṇa vā tatra jinasūryāstaṃgataḥ yasyānantareṇa padmottarena tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?, kiṃ pratyayamapyekatyā buddhavikurvāṇān
T01bsu018_u:139: buddhaprātihāryān paśyanti ye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ prātihāryān kurvanti, ekatyā na paśyanti?" /
T01bsu018_u:140: bhagavān āha - "tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājā,
T01bsu018_u:142: kaścid eva puruṣa āgacchet vīryavān balavān, samādhibalena vā taṃ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ sarṣapamātrapramāṇaṃ bhindyāt; gaṇanātikrāntāste sarṣapā bhavanti, na śakyaṃ te sarṣapāḥ (KpSū 19) kenacid gaṇayituṃ sthāpya
T01bsu018_u:143: sarvajñajñānena; yāvantaste sarṣapaphalā bhavanti tāvantaścāturdvīpikā pramāṇā /
T01bsu018_u:144: padmā buddhakṣetramevākīrṇā bodhisattvaiḥ tadyathā sukhāvatī lokadhāturbodhisattvairākīrṇā
T01bsu018_u:145: padmottarasya kulaputra tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya triṃśadantarakalpānyāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tiṣṭhato dhriyato yāpayato dharmaṃ ca deśayataḥ /
T01bsu018_u:146: padmottarasya kulaputra tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
T01bsu018_u:147: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye padmāyāṃ lokadhātau pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā teṣāṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpāyuḥpramāṇaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:148: pūrvaṃ ca kulaputra sā padmā lokadhātuścandanā nāma babhūva, na tvevaṃ pariśuddhābhūnna tvevam ākīrṇā śuddhasattvairbabhūva yathaitarhi padmā
T01bsu018_u:150: candanāyāṃ kulaputra lokadhātau candrottamo nāmābhūt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ
T01bsu018_u:151: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān, sa cāpi viṃśatyantarakalpān dharmaṃ deśitavān /
T01bsu018_u:153: ye cāvaśiṣṭā bodhisattvāsteṣām etadavocan - "adyarātrau madhyame yāme candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvāsyati,
T01bsu018_u:156: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaganamudro nāma bodhisattvaḥ, sa pūrvapraṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛtaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:157: "bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra mama parinirvṛtasya daśābhyantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
T01bsu018_u:158: rātryāḥ prathame yāme mama saddharmo 'ntarahāsyati, tatraiva rātryāḥ paścime yāme tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase, padmottaro nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato
T01bsu018_u:160: tatkālaṃ te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yena candrottamastathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu018_u:161: samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavāṃstenopajagmuḥ, upetya candrottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarve te bodhisattvāḥ samādhānabalena nānāprakārairbodhisattvavikurvaiścandrottamasya (KpSū tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvaśca pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavantametadavocan - "icchāmo vayam bhadanta bhagavan nime daśābhyantarakalpā nirodhamavahitena cittenātināmayituṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:162: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam mahāsattvamāmantryaitadavocat - "udgṛhṇa tvaṃ kulaputremaṃ sarvajñātākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ
T01bsu018_u:163: sarvātītānāgataistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairyauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ deśitaṃ, ye caitarhi daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante
T01bsu018_u:164: yāpayanti te 'pi buddho bhagavanto yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
T01bsu018_u:165: deśayanti, ye 'pi te bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantaste 'pi
T01bsu018_u:168: jalijalini mahājalini phutke butke sammade mahāsammade devāṃ aṭi caṭi ṭake ṭharaṭhakke amimakasi (KpSū 22) hilicilitili ruruke mahāruruke jaye durjaye jayamati śānte śāntanirghoṣaṇi amūle ale amūlaparichinne mārasainya vitrāsane mukte muktapariśuddhe abhīte bhayamocane
T01bsu018_u:169: bhāradroharaṇā dānta vidyāvidyā varuttame, nigrahaṃ paravādināṃ dharmavādināmanugrahaṃ ārakṣā dharmavādināṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadamidaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:170: buddhakāśaye amama nimama avevi arthe arthani stīraṇe lokādhimukte sandadha paribhāvane, caturṇāmāryavaṃśānāṃ adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadā /
T01bsu018_u:171: bhāṣīthe bhāṣaṇe dhāre dhārayati gupte śubhe śubhaprade tatphale agraphale
T01bsu018_u:172: 'niṣphale nilaha samukta amukta nirmukte atravita vimuktavati vilaphala ayukta iviti diviti ratitula tulamaṃ ahiṃsāma ititāva atvānatvāna
T01bsu018_u:173: sarvaloka anaka livindha abhūsare hatamatte veśāgravate aphala kaphala,
T01bsu018_u:176: jaḍataḥ aniharavavatavyo idaṃ phalaṃ niyomaphalaṃ samudānāya vibhuṣa paśya sāmantra anumanto akumanto chedāvane mantrastā daśabala vigrahasthā isusthita sunikhama tīkṣṇamati āloko atitṛṣṇā adimati,
T01bsu018_u:178: anye manye mane mamane vire virate śame śamitā viśānte mukte nirakṣame same samasame kṣaye akṣaye ajiti śānte samiṣṭhe dhāraṇī ālokāvabhāse ratnavrate raśmyavate jñānavate meruvate kṣayanidarśane lokapradīpanidarśane, caturṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāmadhimuktipadaprakāśanapadamidaṃ cakṣa ābhāsanidarśane jñānālokanidarśanaṃ ca prabhāsane sarvendriya bhūmātikrante sarvasarve vamāṃ sarve prāthavā kṣayaṃ kare gokāha vadane lokānudarśana vibhū, caturṇāṃ ṛddhipādānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadamidam
T01bsu018_u:180: acale buddhe dṛdhapracale sattve gṛhna siddhi kaṃpati nisiddha smahiddhe parekasire some caṇḍe datve acale acale apare vicivale nipare pracacale prasare anayan prabhyāse kaṃkame prabhāvini same nijase grakrame nayute,
T01bsu018_u:182: puṣpe supuṣpe drumaparihāre abhayarucire cekaratke akṣayamastu ninile mamale pañcaśiśire lokasya vijñāne nayasaṃgṛhīte ca yukte succendena,
T01bsu018_u:184: cakravajre maitra samāpade krānte kete karuṇa rudīkṣayi prītirūpe kṣamasaṃpanne arake varate kharo khare amūle mūle sādhane, caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadamidaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:185: vartte cakre cakradhare varacakre vare prare hile hile dhare ārūpāvate huhure yathā jibhaṃga niṃbare yathāgne yathāparaṃ cariniśe yathā bhayaririśi (KpSū 25) satyanirhāra jaracavila vīryanirhāra cure mārganirhāra samādhinirhāra prajñānirhāra vimuktinirhāra vimuktijñānadarśananirhāra nakṣatranirhāra candranirhāra sūryanirhāra padāścaturuttaratathāgatena adbhutaṃ niradbhutaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ abuddha
T01bsu018_u:186: ihabuddhaṃ tatrabuddhaṃ nihaṃgamapare alaha dalaha paṇḍare paṇḍare tatrāntalu māṃgagharaṇi pūṭani saṃpūṭani gatapraṃgamanuniruva nāśani nāśabandhani cicchini cicchidra mayova hidiṃgamā vare mare hanane bharaṃ bhare bhinde bhire bhire ruṣare śaraṇe darane pravartte varaṇāḍaye vidranvumā varakhumā brahmacāriṇa indravani dhidhirāyani maheśvaralalani mamasume alamini ekākṣaraci vaṃcani carasti ābhicaṇḍāla sūre sarvasurā āvarasurā punakanitāṃ paṇḍitāṃ āyinakaṇḍi jabhāme gandhare atra runimakare bhirohiṇī siddhamatte vilokamate, buddhādhiṣṭhite dhāraṇīmukhe daśānāṃ
T01bsu018_u:189: samanantarārabdhe khalu punarbhagavatā asmin sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe atha tāvadiyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kaṃpitā prakaṃpitā saṃprakaṃpitā calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā kṣubhitā prakṣubhitā saṃprakṣubhitā garjitā pragarjitā saṃpragarjitā, unnamati praṇamati saṃpraṇamati /
T01bsu018_u:190: tathārūpaścāvabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ yaddaśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:191: naiva tasmin samaye sumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍaḥ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
T01bsu018_u:192: daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamātikrāntā lokadhātavaḥ samāpāṇitalajātā saṃdṛśyante /
T01bsu018_u:193: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu prativasanti,
T01bsu018_u:195: buddhakṣetreṣvantarhitā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakārairvividhairbodhisattvavikurvitairbhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tatraiva niṣeduḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaśravaṇārthaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:196: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāśca devanāgayakṣāsurakumbhāṇḍapiśācā (KpSū 27) yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvato yena ca bhagavāṃstenopajagmuḥ, upetya bhagavataḥ pādau
T01bsu018_u:199: ye cātra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sannipatitāste sarve padmāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paśyanti sma,
T01bsu018_u:200: padmottaraṃ ca tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇena parivṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:202: pratilabdhā, dhāraṇīpratilabdhāśca te bodhisattvā daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntān lokadhātusthān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma,
T01bsu018_u:204: āścaryaprāptāste samādhibalena bodhisattvavikurvitena ca buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā tasthuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:205: bhagavāṃstān evam āha - "imaṃ kulaputra sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhāvayamānaścaturaśītidhāraṇīmukhaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhate,
T01bsu018_u:206: dvāsaptatiśca dhāraṇīmukhasahasrāṇi pratilabhate, ṣaṣṭiṃ ca samādhimukhasahasrāṇi pratilabhate
T01bsu018_u:208: pratilabdho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabhate mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
T01bsu018_u:209: kevalamasya samādheḥ pratilābhāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān avabudhyate sarvajñajñānaṃ ca pratilabhate
T01bsu018_u:211: imāṃ ca dhāraṇīṃ svabhāvena buddhvā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmāṃ deśayanti, na cātikṣipraṃ parinirvāyanti /
T01bsu018_u:212: paśyata kulaputrāsyāḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśāyā dhāraṇyā anubhāvenāyaṃ mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya prādurbhūtaḥ, mahāṃścābhāso yenāvabhāsenānantāparyantā buddhakṣetrā udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā,
T01bsu018_u:215: ye ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanantāparyantā devāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā nāgā yakṣāsuramanuṣyāmanuṣyā vā imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ śroṣyanti, te sahaśravaṇena sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśasyāvaivartino bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T01bsu018_u:216: likhamānaścāvirahito bhavati buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānena yāvadanuttareṇa parinirvāṇena; (KpSū 29)
T01bsu018_u:217: svādhyāyamānaśca bodhisattva imaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ sarvāṇi gāḍhakarmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ kṣapayati, janmaparivartena ca prathamāṃ
T01bsu018_u:220: pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāṇi syurupacitāṇi tānyapyasya parikṣayaṃ
T01bsu018_u:221: gacchanti, yena janmaparivartena ca prathamāṃ bhūmimavakrāmati; yasya nāstyanantaryāṇi tasya tena janmanā sarvāṇyanyāni karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacchanti, janmaparivartena ca prathamāṃ bhūmimavakrāmati /
T01bsu018_u:223: 'pi na bhāvayati na svādhyāyati śṛṇvanaśca dharmabhāṇakasya paṭṭaṃ
T01bsu018_u:224: bandhati, tasya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanto dhriyanto yāpayantaḥ anyalokadhātusthāḥ sādhukāramanupradāsyanti, te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, na cireṇa cāsau
T01bsu018_u:227: evameva yaḥ kaścid gandhena pūjāṃ karoti so 'pi na cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhigandhasya lābhī bhavati, puṣpeṇa pūjāṃ kṛtvā (KpSū 30)
T01bsu018_u:228: dharmabhāṇakasyānuttarāṇi jñānapuṣpāṇi pratilabhate, bhakṣyānnapānaṃ dattvā dharmabhāṇakasyānuttarasya tathāgatāhārasya lābhī bhavati
T01bsu018_u:229: bodhisattvaḥ, vastreṇācchādya dharmabhāṇakamanuttaratathāgatavarṇalābhī bhavati; yaśca dharmabhāṇakaṃ ratnairācchādayati so 'pyacirāt
T01bsu018_u:231: tadevaṃ mahārthikaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ayaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaḥ
T01bsu018_u:234: anena ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ asaṅgapratibhānatāṃ pratilabhate,
T01bsu018_u:237: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yadā gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavādata tathaiva pṛthivīcālo 'bhūt, mahataścāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo 'bhut,
T01bsu018_u:238: gaṇanātikrāntāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇyudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭānyabhūvan /
T01bsu018_u:239: evameva samāni pāṇitalopamāni viṣamāni pṛthivīpradeśāni dṛśyante /
T01bsu018_u:240: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipatitāste daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu (KpSū 31) buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti
T01bsu018_u:241: / evameva daśabhyo digbhyo gaṇanāsamatikrāntebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo gaṇanāsamatikrāntā bodhisattvāścandanāṃ lokadhātumupasaṃkrāntāścandrottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vandanāya paryupāsanāya, idam eva sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ śrotuṃ" //
T01bsu018_u:242: tatra kulaputra candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvān mahāsattvān āmantrayate - "abhijānāmyahaṃ kulaputra ye bodhisattvā
T01bsu018_u:243: ekajātipratibaddhāsta imān daśāntarakalpān nirodhām avahitena cetasā viharitvāvaśiṣṭā bodhisattvā asya gaganamudrasya bodhisattvasya sakāśādimān daśāntarakalpān imameva sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ śrutavanto 'bhūvan" /
T01bsu018_u:244: imān daśāntarakalpān dharmaṃ śrutvā daśasu dikṣu teṣu gaṇanāsamatikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu teṣāṃ gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ bhagavatāmantike cittamabhiprasādya tena cittaprasādahetunāvaruptakuśalamūlā bhūtvā nānāvidhairbodhisattvavikurvitaiḥ candrottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā, bhagavantametadavocan - "eṣāṃ bhadanta
T01bsu018_u:245: (KpSū 32) daśānāmantarakalpānām atyayena gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttaraṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati?" /
T01bsu018_u:246: candrottama āha - "evameva kulaputremam, eṣām daśānām antarakalpānāmatyayena gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
T01bsu018_u:248: dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati, bodhisattvānāmiha daśāntarakalpānidameva sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ deśayiṣyati /
T01bsu018_u:249: tatra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāntikāddharmaṃ śroṣyati taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā kuśalamulānyavaropayitvā, yasmin samaye gaganamudro bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ
T01bsu018_u:250: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate; so 'bhisaṃbuddhabodhiṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravaracakraṃ avaivartikacakraṃ pravartayitvā bahubodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāvaivartikāṃ sthāpayitvā, ye bodhisattvā iha daśāntarakalpān tasya sakāśādimaṃ
T01bsu018_u:251: sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaṃ deśāmānaṃ śroṣyanti te tasmin samaye dharmaṃ śrutvā ekajātipratibaddhā bhaviṣyanti, ye tu kalpaṃ
T01bsu018_u:254: tasminneva samaye imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ paryantato lapsyante" ityuktvā,
T01bsu018_u:256: vividhāni buddhaviṣayaprātihāryāṇi saṃdarśayitvā, gaganamudrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nārāyaṇaṃ samādhiṃ nidarśayitvā,
T01bsu018_u:258: yena pravartitaṃ dharmacakramiha daśāntarakalpān bodhisattvānāmidaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu buddhānubhāvena lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairavabhāsitaḥ saṃdṛśyate,
T01bsu018_u:260: yena bodhyāsane supravartitadharmacakro bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, cakramālaṃ samādhiṃ nidarśayati /
T01bsu018_u:261: yena dharmacakraṃ pravartayamāno bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi avaivartikāṃ sthāpayati
T01bsu018_u:262: dharmacakrapravartanāyeti viditvā gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'parimitena bodhisattvasaṅghena bhagavatāḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakeṣu kūṭāgāreṣu praviśya sthitāścandrottamo 'pi tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu018_u:264: (KpSū 34) ca bodhisattvāstasyāmeva rātryāmatyayāt tasya bhagavataḥ śarīre
T01bsu018_u:265: pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakeṣu kūṭāgāreṣu praviśanti sma /
T01bsu018_u:267: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā ekajātipratibaddhāste nirodhasamādhānenaitān daśāntarakalpān atināmayanti
T01bsu018_u:268: gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati, teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ daśāntarakalpān kuśalamūlānyavaropitavān /
T01bsu018_u:271: mahāprātihāryaṃ kṛtaṃ, anekāni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi avaivartikānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
T01bsu018_u:272: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe bhāṣyamāṇe aśītīnāṃ bodhisattvanayutaśatasahasrāṇām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabdhā,
T01bsu018_u:274: dvāsaptatibhiśca bodhisattvanayutairiyaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśā dhāraṇī pratilabdhā, gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni" //
T01bsu018_u:276: atha khalu ratnacandravairocano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - "katamairbhadanta bhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato
T01bsu018_u:278: bhagavān āha - "caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
T01bsu018_u:279: katamaiścaturbhi?, iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścaturṣvāryavaṃśeṣu vyavasthito bhavati /
T01bsu018_u:280: katameṣu caturṣu?, iha bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaretareṇa cīvareṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhavati /
T01bsu018_u:287: asmin prathame āryavaṃśe vyavasthito bhavati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:289: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaretareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāreṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhavati /
T01bsu018_u:297: ebhiścaturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate bhāvayati
T01bsu018_u:298: aparaiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
T01bsu018_u:300: pañcabhir?, iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ātmanā śīlavāṃ viharati,
T01bsu018_u:302: bhayadarśī, samādāya śikṣati śikṣāpadeṣu, parānapi śīlavirahitāṃ dṛṣṭvā
T01bsu018_u:303: śīlasaṃpade samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati; anena prathamena dharmaṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:304: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dṛṣṭivyasanagatāṃ sattvāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyāṃ vyutthāpya samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati; anena dvitīyena (KpSū 37) dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:305: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nācāravyasanagatāṃ sattvān samyagācāre samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati; anena tṛtīyena dharmeṇa
T01bsu018_u:307: punaraparam āśayavipannān sattvān āśayasaṃpattau samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati; anena caturtheṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:308: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne saṃprasthitān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati; anena pañcamena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:309: ebhiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
T01bsu018_u:310: aparaiḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
T01bsu018_u:311: katamaiḥ ṣaḍbhir?, iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svayameva bahuśruto bhavati śrutādhāraḥ śrutasannicayaḥ, tasya ye te dharmā ādau kalyāṇā madhye kalyāṇāḥ paryavasāne kalyāṇāḥ svarthāḥ suvyañjanāḥ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ (KpSū 38) pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ abhivadamānā
T01bsu018_u:312: abhivadanti, tadrūpā anena dharmā bahavaḥ śrutā bhavanti dhṛtā vacasā paricitā manasā anvīkṣitā dṛṣṭyā supratividhāḥ, sa evaṃ bahuśrutaḥ samānaḥ parān aśrutān sattvān bāhuśrutye samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati; anena prathamena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T01bsu018_u:313: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nīrṣyako bhavati amatsarī, sa parān īrsyāmātsaryābhibhūtān sattvān anīrṣyāyām tyāgasaṃpadi ca samādāpayati
T01bsu018_u:314: yāvat pratiṣṭhāpayati; anena dvitīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati
T01bsu018_u:315: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmaviheṭhanajātīyo bhavati abhayapradātā, nānopadravairupadrūtān sattvān upadravebhyaḥ
T01bsu018_u:316: parimocayati, akuhakaśca bhavatyalapako 'śaṭhaśca bhavatyamāyāvī śūnyatayā ca bahulīviharati
T01bsu018_u:317: ebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
T01bsu018_u:318: evaṃrūpairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvān samāsavistareṇa saptavarṣāṇīmān (KpSū 39) drāmiḍamantrapadāṃ triḥ kṛtvā
T01bsu018_u:319: divā pañcamaṇḍalena niṣadya kāyagatāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya śūnyatāvihāreṇa imā evaṃ dramiḍā mantrapadā utsārayitavyāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:320: uttiṣṭhatā samantato daśasu dikṣu tiṣṭhato dhriyato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ smaratā satataṃ buddhānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayatā saptānāṃ varṣāṇāṃ atyayena imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:321: asyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambhād bodhisattvo mahāsattvastadrūpam āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ pratilabhate, yena prajñācakṣuṣā daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tiṣṭhato dhriyato yāpayato
T01bsu018_u:322: mahāprātihāryavidarśayataḥ sarvāṃ paśyati, teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
T01bsu018_u:324: dvāsaptatiśca samādhimukhasahasrāṇi pratilabhate, ṣaṣṭiśca dharmamukhasahasrāṇi pratilabhate
T01bsu018_u:325: asyāṃ ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabhate, mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
T01bsu018_u:326: yena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ dhāraṇī pratilabdhā bhavati tena yadi pañcānantaryāṇī karmāṇyācīrṇāni bhavati, tasya janmāntareṇa (KpSū 40)
T01bsu018_u:327: parikṣayaṃ gacchanti, tṛtīye janmani niravaśeṣaṃ tāni karmāṇi naṣṭāni
T01bsu018_u:329: yasya tu bodhisattvasya nānantaryāṇi karmāni kṛtāni bhavanti tasyānyāni sarvakarmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti, janmaparivartena daśabhūmīḥ samatikrāmati, na cirasyedānīṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān pratilabhate, sarvajñajñānaṃ ca pratilabhate /
T01bsu018_u:330: evaṃ bahukaraḥ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmayaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaḥ, satatasamitaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T01bsu018_u:331: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ smitavidarśanāt prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃrūpeṇa ṛddhiviṣayena samanvāgato bhavati /
T01bsu018_u:332: yad gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā nānāvidhasamādhikṣāntidhāraṇīṃ pratilabdhāḥ,
T01bsu018_u:334: evaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaḥ karmaparikṣayāya saṃvartate kuśalābhivṛddhaye /
T01bsu018_u:335: ye ca kulaputra sattvā asyāḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇyā nāma śroṣyanti (KpSū 41) tasya ca bhagavataścandrottamasya tathāgatasya, teṣāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇāni kṣayaṃ
T01bsu018_u:337: atha te bodhisattvā evamāhuḥ - "asmābhirbhadanta bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu atīteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu tiṣṭhatsu dhriyatsu yāpayatsu iyaṃ dhāraṇī śrutā ca pratilabdhā ca" /
T01bsu018_u:341: apare evam āhuḥ, "asmābhirnavasu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu atīteṣu tiṣṭhatsu dhriyamāneṣu yāpayatsu iyaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇīṃ śrutvā sarvākāreṇa pratilabdhā"
T01bsu018_u:343: daśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān atikramya santāraṇo nāma mahākalpo 'bhūt /
T01bsu018_u:345: sālendrarājo nāma buddho 'bhūd vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
T01bsu018_u:347: anantakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṇa bhikṣusaṅghena parivṛtaḥ (KpSū 42) tathā gaṇanātikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛta imāmeva sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśāṃ dhāraṇīṃ bhāṣitavān, tasyāntike mayeyaṃ dhāraṇī śrutā bhāvanā paripūryādhigatāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:348: evamaprameyeṣu kalpeṣu aprameyatareṣu asaṃkhyeyatareṣu atītānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ asaṃkhyeyairbodhisattvavikurvitaisteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā, ekaikasya buddhasya sakāśe
T01bsu018_u:349: aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyānyatulyāni aprameyāṇi kuśalamūlānyavaropya puṇyaskandhaḥ parigṛhītastenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena bahubhirbuddhasahasrairvyākṛtaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:350: kālamavekṣyāhaṃ praṇidhānaviṣayenaiva ciraṃ saṃsāre saṃsṛto, yena me pūrvaṃ saṃsāre saṃsarato
T01bsu018_u:354: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvametad avocat - "evametan
T01bsu018_u:355: maintreya yastvaṃ sālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādimāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇīṃ pratilabdhavān /
T01bsu018_u:357: yathaiva te maitreyāśāparipūrṇāśaktastvaṃ maitreya śīghramevānuttareṇa jñānenānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau praveṣṭuṃ /
T01bsu018_u:358: yacca tvaṃ maitreya iyacciraṃ saṃsāre 'bhiratastat sarvaṃ praṇidhānavaśena kālaprekṣiṇā, tena te maitreya etarhi mamāntikādyauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ, atītānāmapi te tathāgatānāmantike yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ" //
T01bsu018_u:359: tatra bhagavān sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ avalokayate, bodhisattvaparṣadaṃ bhikṣuparṣadaṃ bhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāparṣadaṃ
T01bsu018_u:362: pratisaṃvidbhūmiranutkṣepabhūmiḥ samatāparikṣayopekṣabhūmirjātikṣayabhūmirmanuja vinmujaḥ malanmujaḥ visāgraḥ daśāvate veśataḥ teraṇa vesalagra śamuśavataḥ vimati vimati yopahira (KpSū 44) regamata vasisakrama iticāravate mekhemudra daharavate prajñākṣābubu dahakramitā sadoṣavantaḥ elaya tilaya ahusuṭā amundhamaṃ arthavati muruvati tehīnadvivā akaneti bakanate samake visābhaṭe iṭe
T01bsu018_u:363: iṭabale atra tatra kuruṣaṃ laruṣaṃ latatha katha sarvantaḥ sarvatarvaḥ aniruddhaḥ dihakhaṭambiphala bahuphala śataphala śīṣṭavate, api devānāṃ bhagavān pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyuktānyadhimuktipadāṇi prakāśayati, eṣu prakāśyamāneṣu ṣaṣṭibhirdevanayutaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtamabhūt /
T01bsu018_u:364: tatphalam agraphalaṃ lalaha alaha nilaṃhare vacatakhyā idaṃphalaṃ niyāmaphalaṃ namudaya vibhūkha prajñācakra sunirvṛticakra jñānīcakra,
T01bsu018_u:367: paśya momate anumato akumato akumatī chīdratrake (KpSū 45) mantrasthā deśabala vipravastha iśasthita atimati tīkṣṇamati āloko sterituṣṇa,
T01bsu018_u:368: ebhiradhimuktipadaiścatuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ nāgasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni, tatraiva ca avaivartikāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:369: aprabhā samadanā ahadyo bhagavadyo karaṇyākṣa siddhamati samantakṣau alabale piṭakaro mahābale ojadaro dharaṇe migalekṣe udākṣa kudākṣa kukākṣa viroyo virūpamukha akṣihasta saṃkṣibala asurovina asuropramardane,
T01bsu018_u:372: arthe pilile tinithe saṃtīrthe katitene nakeme nanamaste ubherabhe mudame madame matime saniha śūre dhāraṇīya sendra sadeva sanāga sayakṣāsuradevā nāga nirukti parivāra niruktalāni smṛti prajñā parivāramati pratilābhī gatidhṛtiparivāra gatidhṛtilābhīḥ (KpSū 46) pūrvakeṣu hiteṣu caritavantaḥ
T01bsu018_u:373: abhiskāmavantaḥ śūravantaḥ ciravīryavantaḥ bhītavantaḥ sitabhāge mārgamudra diśāpakarṣaṇi kṣaparahu oharaṇo devaracatu suramudra yakṣamudra rākṣasamudra vedivedime tape tattape uṣṇāname prakhādye nanava dhāraṇīya āviśa diśāśodhane vākyaśuddhe jihvāśuddhe vāciparikarmaḥ prajñā buddhi smṛti mati gati dhṛti gaṇana pratisaraṇabuddhiḥ jayacakre śūnyacakre
T01bsu018_u:376: tatra bhagavān vaiśāradyasamavasaraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvamāmantrayate sma -
T01bsu018_u:381: dānadamasaṃyamakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñā parigṛhītā bahavo buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāḥ paryupāsitāḥ, kvacid dānān dattaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:382: kvaciccīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ, kvacid brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇaṃ, kvacid bhāvanā niṣevitā,
T01bsu018_u:383: kvacit kṣāntirbhāvitā, kvacid vīryamārabdhaṃ, kvacit samādhirniṣpāditā,
T01bsu018_u:384: kvacit prajñā sevitā, bahvaprameyaṃ vividhaṃ nānāprakāraṃ śubhaṃ karma kṛtaṃ, yenaitarhi mamānuttaraṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:385: anekāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ kulaputra tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā mṛṣāpaiśunyaparuṣasaṃbhinnapralāpā varjitāḥ, anekavidhaṃ kuśalaṃ vākkarma sevitaṃ bahulīkṛtaṃ, yenaitarhi prabhūtajihvatā pratilabdhā, na hi kulaputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyathā kathayanti" /
T01bsu018_u:388: mukhācca jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayitvā svaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ pracchādya tasmājjihvendriyāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyaḥ pramuktāstaiśca raśmibhiḥ ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturudāreṇāvabhāsena (KpSū 48) sphuṭo 'bhūt, taiśca raśmibhirnirayatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyāḥ sphuṭā babhūvuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:389: te ca raśmayo ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā prajvalitagātrā dahyante teṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti yeṣāṃ spṛṣṭānāṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sukhā vedanā prādurbabhūva /
T01bsu018_u:390: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya sattvasya purataḥ buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtagātraḥ aśītibhiranuvyañjanairvirājitatanuryaṃ dṛṣṭvā te nairayaikāḥ sukhasamarpitā buddhadarśanāpyāyitāśarīrā buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ cintayanto
T01bsu018_u:391: 'sya sattvasyānubhāvenāsmābhiḥ sukhā vedanā pratilabdhā; te bhagavataḥ sakāśe premaprasādaṃ gauravaṃ ca saṃjanayanti /
T01bsu018_u:392: bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ kathayati - "bhoḥ sattvā evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣadhvaṃ, "namo
T01bsu018_u:393: buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṅghāya", nityamevaṃ sukhasamarpitā bhaviṣyatha" /
T01bsu018_u:394: tataste nairayikāḥ sattvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācamudīrayanti,
T01bsu018_u:396: atha te nairayikāḥ sattvāstena kuśalamūlena tena ca cittaprasādena tataścyavitvā ekatyā
T01bsu018_u:397: deveṣūpapannā, ekatyā manuṣyeṣu; ye 'pi śītanarakeṣūpapannāḥ sattvāsteṣām uṣṇā vāyavaḥ (KpSū 49) pravāyanti, pūrvavad yāvan manuṣyeṣūpapadyante /
T01bsu018_u:398: evaṃ pretānāṃ piśācānāṃ kṣuttṛṣṇāprajvalitagātrāṇāṃ teṣāṃ te raśmayo bubhukṣāgniṃ nirvāṇaṃ kurvanti, sukhāṃ ca vedanāṃ saṃjanayanti /
T01bsu018_u:399: ekaikasya pretasya nirmitaṃ buddharūpamagrataḥ sthitaṃ bhavati dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaṃ aśītyā cānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ; taṃ dṛṣṭvā te pretā buddhadarśanāt sukhā prīṇitagātrā evaṃ cintayantaḥ, "asya
T01bsu018_u:401: te bhagavataḥ sakāśe prasādaṃ premagauravaṃ cotpādayanti /
T01bsu018_u:403: yūyaṃ sattvā, evaṃ vācamudīrayata, "namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ
T01bsu018_u:405: tataste pretā añjaliṃ pragṛhyaivaṃ vācamudīrayanti, "namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṅghāya"
T01bsu018_u:406: / atha te pretasattvāstena kuśalamūlena tataścyavitvā kecid deveṣūpapannāḥ ekatyā manuṣyeṣvevaṃ tiraścāṃ saṃcodayanti, evaṃ manuṣyāṃ saṃcodayanti /
T01bsu018_u:407: gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā bhagavatsakāśaṃ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
T01bsu018_u:408: tena ca samayena gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyakāyā (KpSū 50) anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayām
T01bsu018_u:413: III dānavisargas tṛtīyaḥ atha khalu śāntimatir bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavatā svarddhyābhisaṃskāre pratiprasraṃbhite bhagavantam etad avocat /
T01bsu018_u:415: bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yad anyeṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pariśuddhā buddhakṣetrā apagatakaluṣā apagatapañcakaṣāyā nānāguṇavyūhā buddhakṣetrāḥ,
T01bsu018_u:416: sarve cātra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nānāviddhaguṇaparipūrṇā nānāsukhasamarpitā, nāpi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ nāmāpi vidyate, kutaḥ punar upapattiḥ? /
T01bsu018_u:417: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yad bhagavān pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetra upapannaḥ, āyuḥkaṣāye kalpakaṣāye sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāye vartamāne anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ, catasraś ca pariṣadaḥ trīṇī yānāny ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati? /
T01bsu018_u:418: kasmād bhagavatā pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ na parigṛhītaṃ apagatapañcakaṣāyaṃ?" /
T01bsu018_u:423: mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatatvāt kulaputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā apariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhaṇanti
T01bsu018_u:424: tat kasmād dhetos?, tathā mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yenāham etarhy evaṃ pratikaṣṭe pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetra upapannaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:425: tac cṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣīṣye 'haṃ te śāntimate" /
T01bsu018_u:426: "sādhu bhagavān" niti śāntimatir bodhisattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt //
T01bsu018_u:428: "bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputraikagaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu asaṃkhyeyeṣv atikrānteṣu asmin buddhakṣetre dhāraṇo nāma mahākalpo babhūva
T01bsu018_u:429: / tasmiṃś ca mahākalpe buddhakṣetre tasyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ araṇemī nāma rājābhūc caturdvīpakaḥ cakravartī /
T01bsu018_u:430: tasya khalv āraṇeminaḥ samudrareṇur nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt purohitaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:431: tasya putro jāto dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ aśītibhir anuvyañjanair virājitaḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇo vyāmaprabhaḥ nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalo 'secanakadarśanaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:432: jātamātrasya ca devaśatasahasraiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā samudragarbha iti nāma sthāpitaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:433: so 'pareṇa samayena niṣkramya keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya (KpSū 53) anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ, ratnagarbho nāma tathāgata udapādi,
T01bsu018_u:434: dharmacakrapravartanena sa bhagavān bhahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ svargamokṣaphale pratiṣṭhāpitavān
T01bsu018_u:435: so 'pareṇa samayena bahuśrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto grāmanagaranigama janapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu caryāṃ cañcūryamāṇo 'nupūrveṇānyataraṃ nagaraṃ
T01bsu018_u:437: tatra "bahir nagarasya nātidūre jambūvano nāmodyāne ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati sārdham anekaiḥ śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrair" iti aśroṣīd,
T01bsu018_u:438: rājāraṇemī "ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyakasaṃbuddho 'smākaṃ vijitam anuprāpto jambūvanodyāne viharati anekaiḥ śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ
T01bsu018_u:440: yan nūnam ahaṃ upasaṃkrāmayeyam, upasaṃkramya taṃ tathāgatam
T01bsu018_u:442: athāraṇemī rājārājarddhyā mahatā ca rājānubhāvenānekaiḥ prāṇikoṭīnayutāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto nagarān nirjagāma, yena jambūvanodyānaṃ tenopajagāmopetya, yāvad eva yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena yātvā padbhyām evārāmaṃ prāviśad, yena (KpSū
T01bsu018_u:443: 54) ratnagarbhas tathāgatas tenopajagāma; upetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ
T01bsu018_u:444: pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdad, ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānam araṇeminaṃ ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati anekaparyāyeṇa dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā tūṣṇīm abhūt /
T01bsu018_u:445: atha rājāraṇemī utthāyāsanād ekāṃśaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya yena ratnagarbhas tathāgatas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ratnagarbham tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham etad avocat "adhivāsayatu me bhagavān idam
T01bsu018_u:446: traimāsaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena, ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyae
T01bsu018_u:450: atha rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:452: atha rājāraṇemī koṭṭarājānāhūyāmātyamahāmātrān bhaṭabalāgrapaurajānapadān pauruṣeyān āmantryovāca - "yannūnaṃ grāmaṇyo jānīyurmayā ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ traimāsaṃ
T01bsu018_u:454: so 'haṃ yo me kaścid upabhogaparibhoga upasthānaṃ paricaryāntaḥpuraṃ ca gauraveṇa
T01bsu018_u:456: yad api yuṣmākaṃ paudgalikaṃ upabhogaparibhogopasthānaparicaryāntaḥpuraṃ gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato niryātayata bhikṣusaṅghasya ca" /
T01bsu018_u:459: tasmin nevodyāne bhagavato 'rthāya kūṭāgāraṃ māpayati saptaratnamayaṃ
T01bsu018_u:460: samantataḥ caturdiśaṃ cātra saptaratnamayāni dvārāṇi māpayati sma /
T01bsu018_u:466: / tad api cakraratnaṃ bahiḥ kūṭāgārasya bhagavata evābhimukhaṃ puruṣamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe sthitaṃ jvalati /
T01bsu018_u:467: hastiratnamapi sarvaśvetaṃ saptāṅgaṃ supratiṣṭhitaṃ, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitvā
T01bsu018_u:470: mālyairnānāraṅgaiśca paṭṭairnānāvidhaiśca duṣyairuparacitaṃ, tasya vṛkṣasya saptaratnamayaṃ chatraṃ sthāpitamabhūt /
T01bsu018_u:474: maṇiratnamabhūt prabhāsvaraṃ, tataḥ svayameva bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthāpayāṃ āsa /
T01bsu018_u:475: tatastayā maṇiratnābhayā sarvaṃ tadudyānaṃ satatasamitamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭaṃ abhūt, buddhābhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvamidaṃ (KpSū 57) satatasamitaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
T01bsu018_u:476: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya gauśīrṣasyaiva candanasya pādapīṭhaṃ sthāpitaṃ, ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvaśveto hastināgaḥ sthāpita uparyevaṃrūpameva cakraratnaṃ puruṣapramāṇaṃ sthāpitaṃ
T01bsu018_u:477: yathā bhagavatastathā, ekaikasya ca śrāvakasyāgrataḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā kanyā sthāpitā gośīrṣoragasāracandanacūrnairavakirati, ekaikasya ca śrāvakasyāgrato vaiḍūryamaṇiḥ sthāpitaḥ samantataścodyānasyābhyantare nānāvidhāni vādyāni vādyante, bahiścodyānasya samantena pariṇāyakaratnaṃ
T01bsu018_u:479: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī divasedivase nagarānniryāti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
T01bsu018_u:480: tasya yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevodyānaṃ prāviśat, praviśya yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopajagāmopetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
T01bsu018_u:481: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ trīnvārān pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā, ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya svayaṃ hastaśaucamadāt,
T01bsu018_u:482: svayaṃ ca praṇītena prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyena lehyapeyena svahastaṃ
T01bsu018_u:483: (KpSū 58) saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati, svahastaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhagavataṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātrapāṇiṃ svayameva vyajanamādāya bhagavantaṃ vījayāmāsa /
T01bsu018_u:484: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya rājaputrasahasraṃ koṭṭarājasahasraṃ caivaṃrūpamupasthānaṃ kṛtvā vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvakān vījayati sma /
T01bsu018_u:487: gaganatale cānekairdevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭirabhivṛṣṭā divyāni vādyāni abhivādayanti, divyāni ca chatrāṇi vāsāṃsi ābharaṇāni ca pralambayanti /
T01bsu018_u:488: nīlavāsasaṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ catvāriṃśacchatasahasrāṇi ye candanadīpāt gośīrṣasya candanasya kāṣṭhānyānayanti, bhagavato 'rthāyāhāraṃ
T01bsu018_u:490: rātrau svayameva rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purato bhikṣusaṅghasya cānekāni dīpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi jvālayati /
T01bsu018_u:491: atha kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā ekāṃ dīpasthālikāṃ śirasyupasthāpayitvā dvāvaṃśayordvau pāṇyordvau caraṇayordīpasthālīḥ,
T01bsu018_u:494: tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorevamaklāntakāyaḥ aklāntacitto māsatrayaṃ bhagavantamupasthitavān
T01bsu018_u:495: evaṃ sahasraṃ rājāputrāṇāṃ caturaśītiśca koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi anyāni ca prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi, ekaikaṃ śrāvakaṃ rājakīyenopakareṇena
T01bsu018_u:497: yathā rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhan tathāgatamupasthitavān tathāgramahiṣī devī māsatrayaṃ gandhapuspairupasthitavatī
T01bsu018_u:499: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiṃ jāmbūnadamayāni niṣkasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
T01bsu018_u:500: cakraratnacakrapūrvaṃgamāni ca suvarṇamayāni caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati
T01bsu018_u:503: maṇiratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītiḥ sūryakāntimaṇisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
T01bsu018_u:506: upasthānāya pariṇāyakaratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītikoṭṭarājasahasrāṇi bhagavata upasthānāya niryātayati sma /
T01bsu018_u:507: añcuranagarapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītinagarasahasrāṇi bhagavata upajīvyāni niryātayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
T01bsu018_u:508: caturaśītiratnamayāni kalpavṛkṣasahasrāṇi caturaśītiratnarāśipuṣpasahasrāṇi caturaśītisaptaratnamayāni chatrasahasrāṇi caturaśītyudārāṇāṃ rājārhanāṃ vastrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturaśītisahasrāṇi ratnamayānāṃ mālānāṃ
T01bsu018_u:510: ratnamayāḥ śakunā ratnamayāśca mṛgāścaturaśītivyajanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
T01bsu018_u:511: caturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātayati sma /
T01bsu018_u:512: evaṃ cāha, "ahaṃ bhagavan bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ, kṣamatu me bhagavān, asmākamupavane 'bhiramatu, bhagavān asminnupavane ramatu nityaṃ; punarapyahaṃ bhagavantamupasaṃkramiṣye darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca" /
T01bsu018_u:518: teṣāṃ adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā viditvātha rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triskṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavanto 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:519: atha teṣāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭho 'nimiṣo nāmā bhagavantaṃ traimāsamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopastiṣṭhati
T01bsu018_u:521: rājakumārasahasraṃ dinedine bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ /
T01bsu018_u:522: atha kulaputra bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā samudrareṇurnāma
T01bsu018_u:523: brāhmaṇaḥ, sa sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācate, sa taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ parigṛhītastaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpanivāsilokaṃ triśaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpayati,
T01bsu018_u:525: tenaivamanvāhiṇḍatā na sa kaścijjambūdvīpe manuṣyabhūto (KpSū 62) 'sti yaḥ samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena piṇḍakena na parigṛhīto, yo vā na triśaraṇagamane
T01bsu018_u:526: pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ, yasya vānuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittaṃ notpādayati, yo vā nānuttare jñāne samādāpito na pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:529: animiṣo 'pi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ māsatrayamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena
T01bsu018_u:530: rājñāraṇeminā, so 'pi trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi niryātayati sarvasauvarṇāni nagarāṇi divyāni ca hastyaśvamaṇistrīgṛhapatipariṇāyakaratnāni sthāpayitvā caturaśītihastyaśvasahasrāṇi, evaṃ sūryakāntimaṇikanyākumārakalpavṛkṣapuṣparāśicchatravastramālyābharaṇaratnapīṭhaśīrṣanayanakuṇḍalasuvarṇasūtramuktāhāropānahaśayyāpādapīṭhabhājanabherīvādyaśaṅkhapaṭahadhvajabhṛṅgārāmadīpasthālikādīni nānāratnamayāśca śakunā nānāmṛgāṃśca ratnamayāṃ rasāyanāṃśca;
T01bsu018_u:531: ekaikaśaścaturaśītisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitavanta evaṃ bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
T01bsu018_u:533: atha sa rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpitavān bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca, animiṣo rājakumāro bhagavantamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā tathaiva dakṣiṇā dattā anantā /
T01bsu018_u:534: evamindragaṇena māsatrayaṃ bhagavān upasthito vibhavaśca parityaktaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:535: peyālaṃ, tathaivānaṅgaṇaḥ, abhayaḥ, ambaraḥ, aśajaḥ, middhaḥ, miṣaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:536: mārdavaḥ, paṅgagaṇaḥ, mādhvavaḥ, mānavo, māsaṃvo, mājavaḥ, aravaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:537: ājñavaḥ, mukhavaḥ, arthabahuḥ, alindraḥ, neravaḥ, reṇajaḥ, candranemī,
T01bsu018_u:538: sūryanemī, indranemī, vajranemī, kṣāntinemī, sthānanemī, javanemī, raṇemī,
T01bsu018_u:539: rāhuḥ, rāhubalaḥ, rāhucitraḥ, dāmacitraḥ, rājadhānaḥ, rāgabhramaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:540: rāndhavaḥ, rakṣakaḥ, kāyaḥ, śayamāḥ, yatravaḥ, syajalaḥ, yārmathaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:541: yadhvajaḥ, yamānaḥ, yasyanaḥ, namajyotiḥ, arañjanadhvaḥ, yāvad araṇemino rājñaḥ putrasahasreṇa ekaikena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu018_u:542: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ (KpSū 64) sārdhamaprameyena bhikṣusaṅghena, evaṃrūpeṇa bhagavata upasthānenopasthitaḥ
T01bsu018_u:543: cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairmāsatrayaṃ yathā jyeṣṭhena rājaputreṇa, tathaivaikaikaścaturaśītiḥ svarṇamayāścakrasahasrāṇi vistareṇa yāvaccaturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitāni bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
T01bsu018_u:544: evaṃrūpeṇa mahāprasādena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā kecid devatvaṃ kecicchakratvaṃ kecin māratvaṃ keciccakravartirājyaṃ kecin mahābhogatāṃ kecicchrāvakayānaṃ kecit pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prārthayanti, adhiṣṭhamānāśca dvau varṣaśatau
T01bsu018_u:545: pañcapañcāśacca varṣāṇi bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayanti (KpSū 65) bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca /
T01bsu018_u:546: tatkāle samudrareṇurbrāhmano 'grapurohito 'bhyāgato 'drākṣīt taṃ bhagavantaṃ tai rājaputrairupasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā saptavarṣāṇi
T01bsu018_u:550: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa evaṃrūpeṇa sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannenopasthānena bhagavata upasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena //
T01bsu018_u:551: atha khalu kulaputrāpareṇa samayena samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ cetasaḥ parivitarka udapādi
T01bsu018_u:554: praṇidhānaṃ jāne, kim ayaṃ prārthayati devatvaṃ vā uta śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā mahābhogatāṃ vā śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vānuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim ākāṅkṣate /
T01bsu018_u:559: kaccit svapne nivedayatu devo vā yakṣo vā nāgo vā buddho vā śrāvako vā brāhmaṇo vā kin tāvad rājā devaśriyaṃ kāṅkṣate uta manuṣyaśriyaṃ atha śrāvakatvamatha pratyekabuddhabhūmimatha vānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:560: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ agrapurohitaḥ svapne tathārūpamavabhāsamadrākṣīt, yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu
T01bsu018_u:562: te ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ tasya brāhmaṇasya padmāni svarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni aśmagarbhakeśarāṇi preṣayanti /
T01bsu018_u:563: sarveṣu ca teṣu padmeṣu sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
T01bsu018_u:565: ekaikasmācca sūryamaṇḍalāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo niścerustā raśmayaḥ sarvāstasya brāhmaṇasya vaktre praviśanti /
T01bsu018_u:567: svakāyasya ca kukṣau ṣaṣṭibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭāṃ dhyāyamānāṃ paśyati /
T01bsu018_u:569: chatraṃ copari cākāśe (KpSū 67) yāvad brahmalokaparyante sthitaṃ paśyati /
T01bsu018_u:571: tebhyaśca padmebhyo divyānyatikrāntamānuṣāṇi tūryāṇi niścaranti śṛṇoti ca /
T01bsu018_u:572: tatra ca rājānamāraṇeminaṃ paśyati, rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena dhāvantaṃ
T01bsu018_u:573: sūkaramukhena vividhān bahuprāṇino bhakṣayante, bhakṣayitvā cairaṇḍavṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:574: vividhāśca prāṇinaḥ samāgamya taṃ rājānaṃ bhakṣayanti yāvad asthiśaṅkalāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtvā chorayanti
T01bsu018_u:575: evaṃ punaḥ punastathaiva prādurbhavantaṃ sūkaramukhaṃ rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena bahuvidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇaṃ, vividhaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ khādyamānamasthiśaṅkalāvaśiṣṭaṃ kṛtvā choritaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:576: punaraparaṃ rājaputrān paśyati sūkaramukhenāpare gajamukhenāpare mahiṣamukhenāpare siṃhamukhenāpare vṛkamukhenāpare śṛgālamukhenāpare śvamukhenāpare markaṭamukhena paśyati, śoṇitābhyukṣitagātrānanekavidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍavṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇān vividhaiḥ prāṇibhirbhakṣyamāṇān asthiśaṅkalāvaśiṣṭānutsṛṣṭān punarapi tenaiva kāyena sthitān tathaiva prāṇino bhakṣayataḥ paśyati /
T01bsu018_u:577: anyāṃśca rājaputrān paśyati mahiṣarathābhirūḍhān sumanāpuṣpābhyalaṅkṛtān (KpSū 68) kupathena dakṣiṇābhimukhān gacchataḥ /
T01bsu018_u:579: "imāni brāhmaṇa padmāni bhāgaṃ kuru, bhāgaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ
T01bsu018_u:580: prathamaṃ rājñaḥ saṃvibhāgamekaṃ padmamanuprayaccha, tata eṣāmapi rājaputrāṇāmekaikaṃ padmaṃ dada, avaśiṣṭāni koṭṭarājñāṃ prayaccha, aparāṃ
T01bsu018_u:584: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ padmāni bhājayamāna eva pratibuddhaḥ, saṃvicintayamāna utthāyāsanāt punarvicintayati, "hīnapraṇidhirayaṃ rājā cakravartī saṃsārasukhābhirato hīnā vāsyādhimuktiḥ sārdhamekatyai rājaputrairekatyāḥ punā rājaputrāḥ śrāvakayānamākāṅkṣanti ye mayā mahiṣarathābhirūḍhā dṛṣṭāḥ sumanāpuṣpairalaṅkṛtā dakṣiṇābhimukhā gacchanti /
T01bsu018_u:586: yacca mayādhatriyāṃ varṣaśatāṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvat pratiṣṭhāpiṭāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:587: tad evaṃ mayā sarvajambūdvīpe gatānekāni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu samādāpitāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
T01bsu018_u:588: tasyaitannimittaṃ yena mayā svapne mahāvabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ (KpSū 69) daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:589: yacca mayā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācayitvā bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triśaraṇakriyāvastuṣu sthāpitāni vinītāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
T01bsu018_u:592: bhikṣusaṅghena, tena mama daśabhyo digbhyaḥ anyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ
T01bsu018_u:594: yacca mayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, tena te buddhā saptaratnamayāni chatrāṇi visarjayanti /
T01bsu018_u:596: yacca raśmayo mukhe praviśamānā dṛṣṭāḥ, yaccāsau mahān ātmabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:597: yacca sūryavigrahamālā dṛṣṭā, yacca kukṣau bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāni
T01bsu018_u:598: imā evaṃrūpāḥ svapnā dṛṣṭāḥ, yacca me śakrabrahmalokapāla dṛṣṭā ājñāpayantīmāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kuru, yacca mayā tāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kṛtvā
T01bsu018_u:600: yannvaham imāḥ svapnā buddhāya bhagavata ākhyāsye, kiṃhetukāḥ kiṃpratyayā mayaivaṃrūpāḥ svapnā dṛṣṭā, yannvahaṃ (KpSū 70) tathāgataṃ
T01bsu018_u:602: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ tasyā eva rātryā atyayena bhojanaṃ sajjīkṛtvā kālyate eva yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma, upetya svayameva bhagavato
T01bsu018_u:604: hastaśaucamupanīya prabhūtena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
T01bsu018_u:605: saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhikṣusaṅghamanekaparyāyena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ viditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcamāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purato niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
T01bsu018_u:606: atha rājāraṇemī tatraivābhyāgataḥ sārdhaṃ putrasahasreṇānekaiśca prāṇisahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ, sa yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat, praviśya ca yena
T01bsu018_u:607: bhagavāṃstenopajagāmopetya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghasya ca bhagavataḥ purataḥ niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
T01bsu018_u:608: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yathādṛṣṭāṃ svapnāṃ bhagavato nivedayati /
T01bsu018_u:611: tava padmāni visarjayanti, teṣu ca padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛṣṭā raśmayaḥ
T01bsu018_u:613: yattvayā brāhmaṇa adhatrikāyāṃ varṣaśatāṃ jambudvīpamāhiṇḍatā, tena tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ
T01bsu018_u:615: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:616: yacca tvayā sarvasattvārthaṃ mahāyajñasyārambhaḥ kṛtastena tvaṃ brāhmaṇa buddhā bhagavanto
T01bsu018_u:617: samyaksaṃbodhau, ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, yaiśca tava padmāni
T01bsu018_u:619: asmagarbhakeśarāṇi, teṣu ca sarveṣu padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛśyante /
T01bsu018_u:621: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt svapne ye daśausu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, tairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ saptaratnamayāni chatrāṇi visarjitāni, yāni chatrāṇi copari cākāśe yāvad (KpSū 72) brahmalokaparyantaṃ saṃtiṣṭhanti yasyāṃ eva rātrau tvaṃ brāhmaṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase tasyāṃ eva rātrau daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣūdāraḥ kīrtiśabdaśloko 'bhyudgacchate, upari ca yāvad brahmalokaparyantaṃ kṛtvā na śakyante tava mūrdhānaṃ vyavalokayituṃ brahmādibhirdevalokairapi idaṃ tasya svapnasya pūrvanimittaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:622: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣit mahāntamātmabhāvaṃ yāvad brahmalokaṃ yacca sūryamaṇḍalānāṃ mālā śīrasi baddhā, tadye tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, te ca tavābhisaṃbuddhabodherbrāhmaṇa buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu
T01bsu018_u:624: sarve ye tvayā bodhau samādāpitā te tavābhīkṣṇaṃ varṇaṃ udāhariṣyanti, "anena
T01bsu018_u:625: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vayaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,
T01bsu018_u:627: te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān visarjayiṣyanti tava pūjākarmaṇe, tataste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vividhairbodhisattvavikurvitaistava (KpSū 73) pūjāṃ
T01bsu018_u:628: kṛtvā, tatra tava sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā nānāvidhāḥ samādhirdhāraṇīḥ
T01bsu018_u:630: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā tava varṇaṃ uccārayiṣyanti ghoṣamanuśrāvayiṣyanti
T01bsu018_u:632: yattvayā brāhmaṇa svapne dṛṣṭā bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tāni tava kukṣau praviśya padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭā dhyāyanti, abhisaṃbuddhabodhiśca tvaṃ brāhmaṇa
T01bsu018_u:633: bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayiṣyasi avaivartikāni sthāpayiṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T01bsu018_u:634: te tava parinirvṛtasya brāhmaṇānuttareṇa parinirvāṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu paścāddaśāsu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu te buddhā bhagavanto dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantastava varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyanti /
T01bsu018_u:635: "evam asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣvatikrānteṣu evaṃnāmā tathāgato abhūd arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
T01bsu018_u:636: vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃboddhau samādāpitā vinītā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā avaivartikāśca sthāpitā, yena vayametarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, (KpSū 74) dharmarājyaṃ ca pratilabdhāḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:638: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇa svapne dṛṣṭavān sūkaramukhena yāvacchvamukhena rudhiramrakṣitena gātreṇānekavidhāṃ prāṇino bhakṣayitvā hīna eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇāste 'pyanye
T01bsu018_u:640: punarapyāpyāyitakāyā rudhirābhyaktena kāyena yāvacchvamukhena bahuvidhāṃ prāṇino bhakṣayitvā punarhīnasyairaṇḍavṛkṣasya mūle niṣaṇṇā vividhaiśca prāṇibhiḥ khādyante /
T01bsu018_u:641: te tvayā mohapuruṣāstrividhe puṇyakriyāvastuni samādāpitā prātiṣṭhāpitā dāne yame saṃyame ca, te deveṣu cyavanaduḥkhamabhilaṣanti, manuṣyeṣu jarāvyādhimaraṇāpriyasaṃprayogapriyavinābhāvaduḥkhāṃ preteṣu
T01bsu018_u:643: trividhe ca puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpitā deveṣu devarājyamabhilaṣanti manuṣyeṣu caikadvīpaiśvaryamākāṅkṣante
T01bsu018_u:646: evaṃ te mohapuruṣāḥ sarve tvayā trividhe puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpitāstavopāsakā bhaviṣyanti
T01bsu018_u:648: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇa svapnamadrākṣīt apare manuṣyā mahiṣarathābhirūdhāḥ sumanāmālālāṅkṛtaśirasaḥ apathena dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ
T01bsu018_u:649: gacchanti, te 'pi tvayā brāhmaṇa kulaputrāḥ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ kevalamātmadamanārthaṃ
T01bsu018_u:652: atha khalu kulaputra brāhmaṇaḥ samudrareṇū rājānamāraṇeminametadavocat -
T01bsu018_u:654: durlabhamudumbarapuṣpasadṛśānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ prādurbhāvo loke, durlabhaḥ kuśaladharme chandaḥ, durlabhaṃ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:659: (KpSū 76) anavasthitā mahārāja vāyuvegacapalā devamanuṣyasaṃpattayo, dakacandropamā bālāḥ
T01bsu018_u:661: te bālāḥ punaḥ punarnarakeṣu kāraṇāduḥkhamanubhavanti tiryakṣu saṃmohaduḥkhaṃ preteṣu kṣutpipāsāduḥkhaṃ manuṣyeṣu priyaviprayogaduḥkhaṃ deveṣu cyavanaduḥkhaṃ punargarbhavāsaduḥkhaṃ parasparaśīrṣaprapātanaduḥkhaṃ
T01bsu018_u:663: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?, kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ na kurvanti na vyāyamanti aprāptasya prāptaye 'nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣātkṛtasya
T01bsu018_u:665: evaṃ mūrkhā bālāḥ khidyante bodhicittena yatra sarvaduḥkhakṣayo bhavati, saṃsāreṇa ca na khidyante nodvijanti yatra punaḥ punarduḥkhotpattirbhavati /
T01bsu018_u:666: parīkṣasva mahārāja yathā saṃsāraḥ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ bhājanabhūtaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:667: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ mahārāja kṛtādhikāro bhagavataḥ śāsane 'varopitakuśalamūlastriṣu ratneṣu
T01bsu018_u:668: bhagavato dattadāno (KpSū 77) mahābhogatāyai rakṣitaśīlaḥ svargopapattipratilābhāya śruto bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ
T01bsu018_u:671: āha, "alaṃ brāhmaṇa, nāhaṃ brāhmaṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhilaṣāmi saṃsārābhirataḥ,
T01bsu018_u:672: yanmahābrāhmaṇa mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ dharmaḥ śrutaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:709: rājā prāha - "ayaṃ brāhmaṇa tathāgataḥ aśītivarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ loka utpanno, na śakyaṃ tathāgatena sarve 'pāyaḥ śamayituṃ /
T01bsu018_u:710: ye sattvā avaruptakuśalamūlaste sattvāḥ phale sthitāḥ, kecit samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntiṣu niṣpannāḥ, utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāstu ye sattvāste bodhau avaivartyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
T01bsu018_u:713: katame sattvā bhagavatā vinītāḥ sadekasattvasyāpi duḥkhaṃ na praśāntaṃ, kṣetrabhūtaḥ kevalaṃ bhagavata āśrayaḥ, nānavaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamocanaṃ karoti
T01bsu018_u:715: bodhisattvacaryāṃ caraṃstenāhaṃ mahājñānasamucchrayeṇa acintyenodāreṇa dharmamukhapraveśena sattvān vinayeyaṃ buddhakāryaṃ ca kuryāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:716: na kevalamasmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhāya cittaṃ (KpSū 80) pariṇāmayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:717: yadyahaṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ labheyamutpādayeyamahaṃ bodhicittaṃ, tadāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ
T01bsu018_u:718: yadāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca spṛśeyaṃ, sarvaṃ ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ praśamayeyaṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:721: tathā samāhitena bhagavatā ādarśavyūhe samādhau tathārūpāvabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaḥ sarvaguṇavyūhā dṛṣyante;
T01bsu018_u:722: keṣucid buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtāḥ, keṣucit parinirvāṇāya saṃsthitāḥ;
T01bsu018_u:723: yatra ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇā māraṃ parājayanti,
T01bsu018_u:724: yatra cācirābhisaṃbuddhā dharmacakraṃ pravartayanti, yatra cācirapravṛttadharmacakraṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti, yatra ca buddhānāṃ
T01bsu018_u:725: bodhisattvānāṃ sphuṭāṃ buddhakṣetrāṃ, yatra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmutpādo nāsti, yatra ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhā utpadyante, yatra ca śūnyaṃ
T01bsu018_u:733: sarvāvatī sā parṣattāṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhān, samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ punā rājānametadavocat - "paśya
T01bsu018_u:734: mahārājaitān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān, utpādaya mahārājanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ, gṛhāṇa mahārāja buddhakṣetraṃ yādṛśamākāṅkṣasi" /
T01bsu018_u:735: athāraṇemī rājā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
T01bsu018_u:736: "kena bhagavan karmaṇā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
T01bsu018_u:737: parigṛhṇāti, kena karmaṇāpariśuddhaṃ; utkṛṣṭāḥ sattvāḥ kena karmaṇā,
T01bsu018_u:740: mahārāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti
T01bsu018_u:743: bhadanta (KpSū 82) bhagavan nagaraṃ praviśyaikāgre niṣadya praṇidhānaṃ cintayiṣyāmi, tathārūpaṃ me buddhakṣetramapagatapañcakaṣāyaṃ rocate tatremā subhavacaryā pariṇāmayiṣyāmi" /
T01bsu018_u:746: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato
T01bsu018_u:748: nagaraṃ praviśya svake gṛha ekāgraḥ pratisaṃlīno
T01bsu018_u:752: yacca tvayā tribhiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ śubhaṃ caratā puṇyamārjitaṃ tatsarvamanuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayā" /
T01bsu018_u:758: rājaputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ, (KpSū 83) svakaṃ niveśanaṃ gatvā ekākī rahogato niṣadya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ cintayati /
T01bsu018_u:759: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimantrayitvovāca, "utpādaya tvaṃ kumāra bodhicittaṃ", vistareṇa peyālaṃ yāvat, sarvarājaputrasahasraṃ bodhau samādāpayati, caturaśītiḥ
T01bsu018_u:760: koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi, anyāni ca navatiḥ koṭyaḥ sattvānāṃ bodhau samādāpayati
T01bsu018_u:761: / te 'pi sarva evamāhuḥ, "vayamapi svasvagṛhaṃ gatvaikākino niṣadya
T01bsu018_u:763: evamuktvā sarva eva svagṛhāṇi gatvaikākino niṣaṇṇāḥ saptavarṣāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānāni cintayanti //
T01bsu018_u:764: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ apareṇa samayena cetasaḥ parivitarka udāpādi
T01bsu018_u:766: ayaṃ ca mayā buddho bhagavān saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakarṇairupanimantritaḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena /
T01bsu018_u:767: yadi ca mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā paripūryate tathā cāyaṃ praṇidhānaṃ saṃpadyate yad ahaṃ devāsuragandharvayakṣarākṣasakumbhāṇḍān asmin mahāyajñe samādāpayāmi" /
T01bsu018_u:769: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ purohito vaiśravaṇamākāṅkṣate darśanāya /
T01bsu018_u:770: atha khalu vaiśravaṇo mahārājānekairyakṣaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastenopajagāmopetya samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyāgrataḥ sthitvaitadavocat - "kiṃ brāhmaṇa matto hyākāṅkṣase?" brāhmaṇaḥ prāha - "ko bhavān?" vaiśrāvaṇaḥ prāha - "śrutaṃ
T01bsu018_u:772: so ahaṃ; brāhmaṇa kim ājñāpayasi kiṃ karavāṇi?" /
T01bsu018_u:778: "tena hi tvaṃ mahārāja yākṣān asmākaṃ vacanenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpaya /
T01bsu018_u:780: sacedyūyaṃ yakṣā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvarthikā gacchata, yūyaṃ pārāt samudrasya gośīrṣaṃ uragasāracandanamānayantu, apare bhagavato 'rthe
T01bsu018_u:781: gandhamapare vividhāṃ puṣpān, yenāhaṃ divasedivase bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ
T01bsu018_u:783: "evamastu brāhmaṇa", vaiśravaṇo mahārājā tasya brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya tatraivāntarhitaḥ bherīmāhatya yakṣarākṣasāṃ sannipātyaitadavocat (KpSū 85) - "yat khalu mārṣā jānīyuḥ, ayaṃ jambudvīpe samudrareṇurnāma brāhmaṇo rājño 'raṇemino 'grapurohitaḥ, taṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupasthāsyati /
T01bsu018_u:784: tadyuṣmābhistat kuśalamanumoditavyaṃ, tena ca yūyaṃ kuśalamūlenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatā" /
T01bsu018_u:785: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahuyakṣarākṣasakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi añjaliṃ kṛtvocuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:787: ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupatiṣṭhati sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena, tatsarvaṃ vayaṃ puṇyaskandhamanumodāmastena ca kuśalamūlenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyemahi" vaiśravaṇo mahārājaḥ prāha -
T01bsu018_u:788: "śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ, yaḥ kaścid yuṣmākaṃ kuśalamūlenārthikaḥ puṇyārthī sa
T01bsu018_u:789: saptavarṣān pārāt samudrasya gośīrṣoragasāracandanamānayatu, yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo bhagavato bhikṣusaṅghasya cāhāraṃ sajjīkuryāt" /
T01bsu018_u:791: "vayaṃ mārṣā imān saptavarṣān gośīrṣamuragasāracandanamānayiṣyāmo, (KpSū 86) yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo bhagavato 'rthāyāhāraṃ sajjīkariṣyati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca" /
T01bsu018_u:803: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo viruḍhakasya mahārājasyākāṅkṣati darśanaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:804: tato virūḍhako mahārājā yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastenopajagāmopetya yāvad anekakumbhāṇḍakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayanti /
T01bsu018_u:806: atha khalu dvitīyikāyāścāturdvīpikāyā lokapālā buddhānubhāvenāgatāḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya sakāśat, tān api brāhmaṇaḥ
T01bsu018_u:811: koṭīśataṃ vīrūḍhakānām koṭiśataṃ virūpākṣāṇāṃ koṭiśataṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sapārṣadyānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti /
T01bsu018_u:813: "yadyahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ āśā ca samṛdhyeta yadi ca me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyeta, virūḍhakānāṃ tadahaṃ kārayeyaṃ kāraṃ, asmin mahāyajñe tat sattvānāṃ saṃvibhajeyaṃ, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:815: darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatu, suyamo devaputraḥ saṃtuṣito devaputraḥ sunirmito devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputraḥ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatu" /
T01bsu018_u:816: sahacittotpādādeva kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya śakro devānāmindro darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ, suyāmaśca (KpSū 88) devaputraḥ saṃtuṣitaśca devaputraḥ sunirmitaśca devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputraḥ taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:823: "yāni yuṣmākaṃ devaloke sarvaviśiṣṭāni ratnamayāni kūṭāgārāṇi ratnavṛkṣā vā kalpavṛkṣā vā gandhavṛkṣā vā puṣpavṛkṣā vā phalavṛkṣā divyāni cīvarāṇi divyāsanāni
T01bsu018_u:824: divyāni prajñapanāni divyāni ratnabhājanāni divyānyalaṅkāracchatradhvajapatākābharaṇāni divyāni ca vādyāni tairvastubhiḥ sarvajambūdvīpamalaṅkuruta bhagavato 'rthāya bhikṣusaṅghasya
T01bsu018_u:827: brāhmaṇasyāntikāt prākāntā devalokaṃ gatā gatvā veṭakaṃ devaputramāveṭukaṃ devaputraṃ rohiṇaṃ devaputraṃ korabhanandaṃ devaputramāmantrayitvaivamāhuḥ
T01bsu018_u:828: / " gacchata yūyaṃ mārṣā jambūdvīpamavatīrya jambūvanaṃ udyānamevaṃvidhenālaṅkāraviśeṣenaivaṃvidhairāsanaiḥ saṃstatairalaṅkuruta yathaivāyaṃ (KpSū 89) devaloko 'laṅkṛtaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:830: ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayata yādṛśo 'yaṃ ratnaniryūhaḥ kūṭāgāra īdṛśaṃ
T01bsu018_u:832: te pañcadevaputrā devarājñaḥ pratiśrutya jambūdvīpamavatīrya ekarātryā sarvaṃ jambūvanamudyānamevaṃrūpeṇālaṅkāreṇa ratnavṛkṣairyāvaddhvajairalaṅkṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:834: kṛtastadyathā śakrasya devānāmindrasya ratnaniryūhaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ sarvākārapariniṣṭhitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ ca jambūvanaṃ divyenālaṅkāreṇālaṅkṛtya devarājānāṃ saṃkramyārocayanti /
T01bsu018_u:836: devalokaḥ svabhyalaṅkṛtaḥ tathaiva jambūvanodyānaṃ divyairalaṅkāraviśeṣaiḥ svalaṅkṛtaṃ sarvākārapariniṣṭhitaṃ, evaṃrūpaśca sarvaratnamayaḥ kūṭāgāro
T01bsu018_u:837: bhagavato 'rthāya kṛtaḥ tadyathā śakrasya devānāmindrasya ratnaniryūhaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ /
T01bsu018_u:838: na hi mārṣā devalokasya jambudvīpe ca jambūvanasyodyānasya kiṃcidapyasti nānākaraṇaṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:839: atha te pañcadevarājānaḥ śakrasuyāmasaṃtuṣitāḥ sunirmitaparanirmitavaśavartī jambūdvīpamavatīrya samudrareṇuṃ brāhmaṇamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:844: "yūyaṃ khalu pañcadevarājānaḥ pṛthagdevanikāye rājyaṃ kārayata tatra
T01bsu018_u:845: yuṣmākaṃ vaśo vartate, gacchata rājānaḥ svakasvakāṃ devaparṣadāṃ,
T01bsu018_u:848: atha te pañcadevarājānaḥ svakasvakeṣu sthānāntareṣu gatvā śakro devānāmindro devāṃstrayastriṃśān sannipātyaivamāhuḥ - "yut khalu mārṣā jānīyurjambudvīpe 'raṇemino rājñaḥ samudrareṇurnāma brāhmaṇaḥ
T01bsu018_u:849: agrapurohitaḥ, sa ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupanimantrya pratimānayati sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena /
T01bsu018_u:853: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahavastrayastriṃśaddevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācamudīrayanti
T01bsu018_u:854: "anumodāmo mārṣā evaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tayā cānumodanayā (KpSū 91) yatpuṇyamasmākaṃ syāttatsarvaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu018_u:856: suyāmo devaputro yāmān devān sannipātya vistareṇa peyālaṃ tuṣitanirmāṇaratidevaputraḥ paranirmito devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devān sannipātya yāvad bahūni devaputrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyañjaliṃ pragṛhya vācaṃ bhāṣante sma /
T01bsu018_u:857: "anumodāmo vayaṃ mārṣā yat kuśalamūlaṃ tasmācca kuśalamūlatyatpuṇyaṃ tatsarvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:858: tena hi mārṣā gacchāmo jambudvīpamavatarāmaḥ bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca" /
T01bsu018_u:859: te pañcadevarājāno rātrāvekaiko devarājñaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhirbahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ jambudvīpamavatīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca bhagavato 'ntikād dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
T01bsu018_u:864: punaraparaṃ kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarka udapādi /
T01bsu018_u:866: tadayaṃ mama praṇidhiḥ saṃpadyate yadidamasurāṃ bodhau samādāpayeyaṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:868: upasaṃkramya yāvadbahvasurakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi brāhmaṇasya vacanena sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayanti,
T01bsu018_u:869: bhagavataśca sakāśamupagamya dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti, vistareṇa peyālaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:871: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pūrṇo nāma māra āgatya yāvadanekairmārakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairmārakāyikairdevaputrasiḥ sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni yāvadupasaṃkrāntā dharmaśravaṇāya /
T01bsu018_u:872: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ ketapuriṃ nāma mahābrahmāṇamākāṅkṣate upasaṃkramaṇāya
T01bsu018_u:873: yāvadbrāhmaṇasya sakāśāt pratiśrutya brahmalokāt, yāvad bahuprāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayanti, tataścāvataranti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca,
