T01bsu018_u:876: samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo dvitīyāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ śakramākāṅkṣate suyāmaṃ saṃtuṣitaṃ sunirmitaṃ paranirmitavaśavartinaṃ ca devaputramākāṅkṣate darśanāya /
T01bsu018_u:877: te 'pi pañcadevarājāno bhagavato 'nubhāvena brāhmaṇasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntastān brāhmaṇaḥ samanuśiṣṭavān /
T01bsu018_u:878: te 'pi svakāni bhavanāni gatvā svakāṃ parṣadaṃ brāhmaṇahastena samādāpayanti /
T01bsu018_u:879: evaṃ bahubhistrayastriṃśaddevaniyutaśatasahasrairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikaiste ca sahaśakreṇemāṃ cāturdvīpikāmāgatā bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca, bhagavataścāntikāddharmaṃ śrotuṃ /
T01bsu018_u:880: evaṃ suyāmaḥ saṃtuṣitaḥ sunirmitaḥ paranirmitavaśavartī devaputraḥ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartikān devān bodhāya samādāpayitvā bahubhiḥ paranirmitavaśavartidevakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu018_u:881: kṛtacittotpādaiścāturdvīpikāmāgatā bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca, bhagavataścāntikāddharmaṃ śrotuṃ /
T01bsu018_u:882: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ asurendrā mārā brahmāṇaḥ, (KpSū 94) evaṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ caturthyāṃ pañcamyāṃ śakrasuyāmasaṃtuṣitanirmāṇaparanirmitāsurendra mārā brahmāṇaḥ

T01bsu018_u:885: koṭīśatamasurendrāṇāṃ koṭīśataṃ mārāṇāṃ koṭīśataṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ ekaiko mahābrahmānekaiḥ koṭīniyutaśatasahasrairbrahmakāyikānāṃ devānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtacittotpādānāṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagavadanubhāvenemāṃ cāturdvīpikāmāgato bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkramaṇāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca bhagavataścāntikāddharmaṃ śrotuṃ

T01bsu018_u:891: yadevaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ kuryāt yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ tiryāñco yāmalokikā nairayikāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ duḥkhāvedanā praśāmyeta sukhāvedanotpadyeta,

T01bsu018_u:894: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya cetasā cittamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pratāpaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:895: yathā samāhitena cittena bhagavān pratāpe samādhau bhagavataḥ kāyādaikaikasmād romakūpād gaṇanāsamatikrāntā raśmaya udgatāstaiśca raśmibhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sphuṭo 'bhut /

T01bsu018_u:897: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya nirmito buddhavigraho 'gratastiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairalaṅkṛtagātraḥ aśītibhiranuvyañjanaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaśarīraḥ /

T01bsu018_u:907: / evaṃ yuṣmākaṃ duḥkhāvedanā na bhūya utpadyate, nityaṃ ca sukhāyā

T01bsu018_u:925: (KpSū 98) samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti cittaṃ cotpādayanti, āsanasthā ye dūrasthāyinaḥ paścāttamudyānaṃ praviśanti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya
T01bsu018_u:927: evaṃ samudrareṇumā brāhmaṇenāgrapurohitena tāni saptavarṣāṇi gaṇanātikrāntā devā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā vinītā niveṣitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā, gaṇanātikrāntā nāgāḥ asurā yakṣarākṣasāḥ kumbhāṇḍā gandharvāḥ pretāḥ piśācā nairayikā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā vinītā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ, yāvat tiryagyonigatā iti /
T01bsu018_u:929: cakraratnaṃ, caturaśītihastisahasrāṇi saptaratnālaṅkāravibhūṣitāni sthāpayitvā hastiratnaṃ, yāvaccaturaśītirathasahasrāṇi niryātayati /

T01bsu018_u:943: evamanimiṣo jyeṣṭho rājaputraḥ, nimuḥ, indragaṇaḥ, evaṃ tadrājñaḥ sarvaṃ

T01bsu018_u:947: satatasamitaṃ ca daśasu dikṣvaikaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti /

T01bsu018_u:956: bhadanta bhagavan rājāraṇemī anutarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaḥ, sa gṛhaṃ gatvaikākī rahogataḥ pratisaṃlīno niṣaṇṇaḥ, na cātra kasyacin

T01bsu018_u:976: bhagavāṃstenopajagāma, upetya bhagavataḥ pādau śīrasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghasya caikānte nyaṣīdat sārdham anekaiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ /

T01bsu018_u:980: evaṃ tad rājñaḥ putrasahasraṃ samādāpayati tathaiva caturaśītiḥ koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi aparāśca

T01bsu018_u:1017: mā ca tatra sattvā bhaveyuḥ parigrahavanto 'ntataḥ svaśarīre
T01bsu018_u:1022: na tatra sattvānāṃ āyuḥ pramāṇaparyantaḥ syād, anyatra praṇidhānavaśena /
T01bsu018_u:1024: na tatra buddhakṣetre durgandhaṃ syāt, divyātikrāntena bhagavadgandhena tadbuddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt /
T01bsu018_u:1028: paryupāsīran, yāvad vividhena bodhisattvavikurvitenākāṅkṣeyuḥ buddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathaiva teṣāṃ siddhyeyuḥ, tenaiva pūrvabhaktena vivarteyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1031: na kaścit sattvo buddhakṣetraguṇālaṅkārasya varṇaparyantaṃ śaktaḥ syādgṛhītumantaśo divyenāpi cakṣuṣā /
T01bsu018_u:1035: prabhāsvaraṃ ca tadbuddhakṣetraṃ syāt, samantena ca gaṇanātikrāntā
T01bsu018_u:1037: ye cātra sattvā upapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparyantena brahmacāriṇaḥ syuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1038: sarvasattvāḥ sadevakasya lokasya namasyanīyāḥ syuḥ, yāvad bodhiparyantena nendriyavikalā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1041: sarvasattvāśca tatra navāni vastrāṇi kāśāyāṇi dhārayeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1042: sahopapannāśca tatra sattvāḥ suvibhaktivatīṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ, yasya samādheḥ pratilābhādgaṇanātikrānteṣu
T01bsu018_u:1043: buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā buddhān paryupasīran yāvad bodhiparyantenānupaśyeyuḥ
T01bsu018_u:1044: / ye ca tatra bodhisattvā upapadyeyuḥ te yādṛgjātīyāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛgjātīyān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ (KpSū 109) teṣu ratnavṛkṣeṣu paśyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1045: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuryasya samādheḥ pratilābhāt daśasu dikṣu gaṇanātikrānteṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāstiṣṭhato yāpayato nityaṃ paśyeyurye tatra sattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ te sarva evaṃrūpeṇa cīvaravimānālaṅkārābharaṇavarṇarūpeṇa syuryathā paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1046: na tatra buddhakṣetre pāṃśuśilā kālaparvatā bhaveyuḥ, na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na sumerurna mahāsamudrāḥ; na tatrāvareṇanivaraṇakleśaśabdāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvataśca; tatra narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdo na syānnākṣaṇaśabdo na duḥkhaśabdaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1047: evaṃrūpeṇāhaṃ bhagavan buddhakṣetreṇārthī; tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan
T01bsu018_u:1049: pariśodhayiṣye; evamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan puruṣakāraṃ kariṣye, tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye
T01bsu018_u:1050: daśayojanasāhasrikaśca me bodhivṛkṣo bhavet, tatra niṣaṇṇaścāhamekakṣaṇenacittotpādenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeya /
T01bsu018_u:1051: apramāṇā ca me prabhā syāt buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇām (KpSū 110) avabhāsayanti /
T01bsu018_u:1052: aparimāṇā ca mamāyurbhavedaprameyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ na śakyaṃ kenacid gaṇayitumanyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
T01bsu018_u:1053: aprameyaśca me bodhisattvasaṅghaḥ syāt śrāvakapratyekabuddhavarjito, yanna śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
T01bsu018_u:1054: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇabhāṣaṇaṃ kuryurghoṣaṃ cānuśrāvayeyuryaśa udīrayeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1055: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste sarve buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlapariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra
T01bsu018_u:1058: bodhicittotpādaṃ kuryuḥ, mama buddhakṣetra upapattimākāṅkṣamāṇāḥ, tatra ca kuśalamūlapariṇāmanaṃ kuryuḥ; teṣāṃ cāhaṃ maraṇakālasamayeṣvagratastiṣṭheya bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ; te ca māṃ
T01bsu018_u:1059: dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ prasādaṃ ca mamāntika utpādayeyuḥ, sarvāvaraṇatāṃ (KpSū 111)
T01bsu018_u:1060: ca nivartayeyuḥ, kālaṃ ca kṛtvāsmākaṃ buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1061: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāste 'smākaṃ sakāśādaśrutapūrvāṃ dharmadeśanāmākāṅkṣeyuḥ śrotuṃ te yādṛśīmākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1062: bodhiprāptasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te
T01bsu018_u:1063: 'vaivartikāḥ syuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, prathamāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ tathā dvitīyāṃ, yādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ cākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1064: parinirvṛtasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu paścād gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā paramāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ ca prāpnuyurmāmeva namasyamānā āścaryaprāptā yaśakīrtiṃ ca varṇayeyuḥ;
T01bsu018_u:1065: bodhisattvabhūtena ca yadā mayā buddhakāryaṃ abhiniṣpāditaṃ tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ, abhisaṃbuddhasya ca mama
T01bsu018_u:1066: paramaprasādapratilabdhā bodhisattvāḥ prathamāyāḥ kṣāntyā lābhinaḥ syurdvitīyāyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ, yādṛśīṃ ca samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ pratilabheyuḥ, yāvadbodhiparyantenānupaśyeyuḥ bodhiprāptasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ (KpSū 112)
T01bsu018_u:1067: śṛṇuyustāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayeyuḥ, yāvadbodhiparyantena na bhūyaḥ strītvaṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1068: parinirvṛtasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu gaṇanātikrāntā yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ tāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ prasādaṃ ca prāpnuyuḥ,
T01bsu018_u:1069: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayeyuḥ, yāvadbodhiparyantena na bhūyaḥ strītvaṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1073: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājño 'raṇeminaḥ sādhukāramadāt
T01bsu018_u:1074: "sādhu sādhu mahārāja, gambhīraste mahārāja praṇidhānaṃ pariśuddhaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1075: paśya mahārāja paścimāyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ atikramya indrasuvirājitā nāma lokadhātuḥ, tatrendraghoṣeśvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu018_u:1076: samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T01bsu018_u:1078: prajñaptirapyasti, utpādāya na tatra śrāvakapratyekabuddhakathā kriyate,
T01bsu018_u:1080: sarva evopapādukāḥ sattvā, na ca tatra
T01bsu018_u:1082: sarva ete guṇāstatra buddhakṣetre yathā mahārājenāparimitaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānam kṛtamamitāśayāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstena tvaṃ mahārāja indraghoṣeśvararājatathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya tasmin saddharme 'ntarhite
T01bsu018_u:1085: yathaivendraghoṣeśvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya indrasuvirājitāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ tathaivācintyamatiguṇarājasya tathāgatasya meruprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau guṇavyūho bhaviṣyati /
T01bsu018_u:1087: yadācintyamatiguṇarājastathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya ṣoḍaśāntarakalpāḥ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati, tasya saddharme 'ntarhite sahasrāntarakalpātyayena viratirnāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
T01bsu018_u:1088: (KpSū 114) tatra raśmirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, peyālaṃ pūrvavat, samāścaiṣāmāyuḥ samā lokadhātuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1089: evaṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ saddharme 'ntarhite aparā nāma sā
T01bsu018_u:1093: samo buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ samaṃ cāntarakalpā sthāsyati yāpayiṣyati dharmaṃ ca deśayiṣyati
T01bsu018_u:1094: tasya parinirvṛtasya saptāntarakalpāṃ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati, tasmiṃśca saddharme 'ntarhite, peyālaṃ pūrvavat /
T01bsu018_u:1095: evaṃ cāprameyāparimāṇān tathāgatāṃstatra buddhakṣetra upapannān paśyāmi parinirvṛtāṃśca, naivāsau lokadhātussaṃvartate na nivartate /
T01bsu018_u:1096: tatrānāgate 'dhvani atikrānta ekasmin gaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye nadīgaṅgāvālikāsame
T01bsu018_u:1098: tatra tvaṃ mahārājanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase, amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyasi" /
T01bsu018_u:1099: rājāraṇemyāha - "kutra te bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye
T01bsu018_u:1102: bhagavān āha - "ime te mahārāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye
T01bsu018_u:1103: 'prameyairasaṃkhyeyairatulyairaparimāṇairdaśabhyo digbhyaḥ tābhyastābhyo lokadhātubhya āgatā maṃ vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya, ye mama purato niṣaṇṇā ete 'tītairbuddhairvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
T01bsu018_u:1104: pratyutpannairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirete kulaputrā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T01bsu018_u:1108: 'varuptakuśalamūlo bhāvitaprajñaḥ, ta ete mahārāja kulaputrā ye tatra
T01bsu018_u:1112: samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ sa kiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate?"
T01bsu018_u:1113: bhagavān āha - "mahākāruṇika eṣa brāhmaṇaḥ samudrareṇuḥ, śroṣyasi tvaṃ yathaiṣa siṃhanādaṃ nadiṣyati" /
T01bsu018_u:1114: rājā āha - "yadyeṣa me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyati yathāhaṃ (KpSū 116) bhagavatā
T01bsu018_u:1115: vyākṛtāḥ, tadyathāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādavandanaṃ kuryāṃ pañcamaṇḍalena tadā
T01bsu018_u:1117: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti te ca māṃ vyākuryuḥ"
T01bsu018_u:1118: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādayornipatitaḥ
T01bsu018_u:1119: yadaiva rājñaḥ śirasā pṛthivī spṛṣṭā tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrāḥ kampitāḥ calitāḥ pracalitāḥ kṣubhitāḥ saṃprakṣubhitāḥ, gāṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā vyākurvanti /
T01bsu018_u:1120: "santīraṇe buddhakṣetre dhāraṇe kalpe 'śītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānamaraṇeminaṃ vyākaroti /
T01bsu018_u:1122: praviṣṭe dvitīye 'saṃkhyeye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvamitaśuddhāyāṃ amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, samantato daśasu dikṣu
T01bsu018_u:1128: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī tuṣṭa udagraḥ pramuditāḥ
T01bsu018_u:1129: prītisaumanasyajātaḥ, atikramya nātidūre ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya //
T01bsu018_u:1133: peyālaṃ pūrvavat, "avalokitā mayāpāyā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ pracaṇḍaghoraṃ duḥkhaṃ anubhavanti /
T01bsu018_u:1134: avalokitā mayā svargā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ saṃkliṣṭacittāḥ punarapyapāyeṣu prapatanti
T01bsu018_u:1137: svareṇāhaṃ bhagavan tān sattvān vijñapayāmi, sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu018_u:1138: yad ahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ ye kecanasattvā duḥkhotpīḍā bhayatarjitā dharmadurbhikṣāndhakāre praviṣṭā līnā dīnā atrāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā
T01bsu018_u:1140: yadyahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śṛṇuyāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyeyaṃ, na ca tāṃ sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ
T01bsu018_u:1142: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sattvahetościrapraṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa ciraṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi tadā me āśāparipūrirbhavatu /
T01bsu018_u:1143: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahārājāraṇemī atikrānte ekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
T01bsu018_u:1144: amitāyurnāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, pariśuddhe buddhakṣetre pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
T01bsu018_u:1145: yāvatyāmitāyustathāgataḥ aparimāṇān kalpān buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā pariniṣṭhitabuddhakāryo 'nupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pravekṣyate, tasya praviṣṭasya yāvat saddharmaḥ sthāsyati (KpSū 119) tāvacciramahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi, bodhisattvabhūto 'haṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyāmi /
T01bsu018_u:1146: yadāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya rātryāḥ prathame yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme 'hamanuttarāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1149: evamevāhaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti tān api buddhān bhagavataḥ svareṇa vijñapayāmi vyākurvantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau" /
T01bsu018_u:1151: evaṃ cāha - "yattvayā kulaputrāvalokitā apāyāḥ avalokitāḥ svargā avalokitaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃjanitaṃ kāruṇyacittaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamocanārthaṃ kleśapraśamanārthaṃ, tasmāttvaṃ kulaputrāvalokiteśvaro nāma bhaviṣyasi /
T01bsu018_u:1156: 120) yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme tvaṃ kulaputrānekavyūhe bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase, samantaraśmyabhyudgataśrīkūṭarājo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1159: avalokiteśvara āha - "yadi bhagavan nimā mamāśā paripūryate tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ karomi tadā ye buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu
T01bsu018_u:1160: gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te vyākurvantu māṃ, calatu ca dharaṇī sarvagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu daśasu dikṣu
T01bsu018_u:1163: yadā cāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditastadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu (KpSū 121) buddhakṣetreṣu dharaṇī pracalitā, te ca buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvanti peyālaṃ pūrvavat,
T01bsu018_u:1168: prakampitā dharaṇīsakṣetra ṣaḍvikāro bhaviṣyasi jināgrapugalo maharṣī" //
T01bsu018_u:1169: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimirnāmāmantrayāmāsa
T01bsu018_u:1171: yacca tvayā śubhamupārjitaṃ tatsarvaṃ sattvahetoḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1173: atha nimī rājakumāro bhagavataḥ purastānniṣadyedamavocat - "yat mayā bhagavān upasthitaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena,
T01bsu018_u:1176: na kevalamasmin kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhimahaṃ spṛśeyaṃ; yatrāvalokiteśvaraḥ kumāraḥ sarvaratnasannicayāyāṃ lokadhātāvanekaratnavyūhe bodhivṛkṣe niṣaṇṇo
T01bsu018_u:1177: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate samantaraśmyabhudgataśrīkūṭarājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati, tamahaṃ adhyeṣayeyaṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ yāvaccāsau tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayet tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ, tasya tathāgatasyāstaṃgatasya saddharme 'ntarhite tasyānantareṇāhaṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1180: parinirvāpayeyaṃ, evameva parinirvṛtasya saddharmaściraṃ tiṣṭhet, sarva eva guṇavyūhaḥ yathā samantaraśmyabhyudgataśrīkūṭarājasya tathāgatasya" /
T01bsu018_u:1182: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ sthānaṃ yathā svayaṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1183: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputra tasmin buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1185: yathā sthāmante (KpSū 123) kulaputra mahāsthānaṃ parigṛhītaṃ, tena tvaṃ kulaputra
T01bsu018_u:1187: sa prāha - "yadi me bhagavanneṣāśā paripūryate, tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena kāyena pādau vandāmi tadā me daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu, sumanāvarṣaśca
T01bsu018_u:1189: yadā kulaputra mahāsthāmaprāptena satpuruṣeṇa ratnagarbhasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhirvyākṛtaḥ, ṣaḍvikāraṃ ca mahāpṛthivī pracalitā, sumanāvṛṣṭiśca prapatitā /
T01bsu018_u:1197: "yanmayā bhagavān sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena, yacca me kāyavāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ, idaṃ cānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:1199: na tu kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ, na cātikṣipraṃ prāpnuyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1200: na yāvaccāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tāvadbodhicaryāṃ caran, daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1201: ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitā yeṣāṃ mayā tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ bodhicitte
T01bsu018_u:1202: pāramitāsu ca ye mayā samādāpitā niveśitā pratiṣṭhāpitā bodhicaryāṃ caratā, tān ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālikāsame buddhakṣetre
T01bsu018_u:1203: paramāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavato dharman deśayataḥ
T01bsu018_u:1205: evamahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran buddhakāryaṃ kuryāṃ, tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1206: sattvānāmāśayapariśodhayamānaḥ yāvantaḥ kecit sattvā (KpSū 125) mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran ta evaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ tadyathā brahmakāyikā devāḥ;
T01bsu018_u:1207: tathā ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ syāt /
T01bsu018_u:1208: tasya ca buddhakṣetrasya bhavāgraparyantāni prākārāṇi anekaratnasaṃsthitāni nānāratnapratyuptāni ca syuḥ, sarvā ca tatra buddhakṣetre śuddhavaiḍūryamayī pṛthivī syāt,
T01bsu018_u:1210: na tatra mātṛgrāmasyanāma prajñaptiḥ syāt, sarvasattvāścopapādukāḥ syurna tatra
T01bsu018_u:1211: sattvāḥ kavadīkārāhārāḥ syuḥ, sarve ca tatra sattvā prītyāhārā dharmāhārāḥ
T01bsu018_u:1213: na tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñaptiḥ syāt,
T01bsu018_u:1214: śuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmapagatakhilamaladveṣamrakṣāṇāṃ śuddhānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ syāt /
T01bsu018_u:1215: sarve tatra bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastradhāriṇaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ, samanantaraprādurbhūtānāṃ mahāvabhāsaṃ bhavet, teṣāṃ dakṣiṇe haste ratnapātrī nānārasapūrṇā prādurbhavet; samanantaraprādurbhūtānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ
T01bsu018_u:1217: 126) yannūnaṃ vayamanyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato
T01bsu018_u:1218: yāpayato 'nenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmo buddhaśrāvakāṃśca duḥkhitaṃ ca janaṃ pratimānayāmaḥ, pretabhavaneṣu ca gatvā kṣuttarṣaprajvalitagātrān sattvān anenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmaḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:1219: sahacittotpādena te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā acintyacāritravatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ, tasya ca samādheḥ
T01bsu018_u:1221: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavata āhāreṇa pratimānayeyuḥ śrāvakāṃścānyāṃśca sattvāṃ, prītyā pratimānya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svabuddhakṣetraṃ āgaccheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1222: evaṃ cīvararatnāni, yāvat tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svakaṃ buddhakṣetramāgatyānyonyaṃ cīvareṇa
T01bsu018_u:1224: yāvanti ca tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmupabhogaḥ paribhogā bhaveyustaiḥ sarvairbuddhaiḥ śrāvakaiścānyaiśca sattvaiḥ sahasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā paścādātmanā paribhuñjeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1225: aṣṭākṣaṇavarjitaṃ ca buddhakṣetraṃ bhavet, na ca tatra duḥkhaśabdo bhavet, (KpSū 127) na
T01bsu018_u:1227: anekaratnaśatasahasropacitaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ syāt, anekaratnapratyuptaṃ maṇisandarśanasadṛśaṃ bhavet, yāni maṇiratnāni daśasu dikṣvadṛṣṭapūrvāṇi tāni aśrutapūrvāṇi tāni maṇiratnāni pracareyuḥ, yeṣāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ nāmadheye nirdiśyamāne varṣakoṭyo 'pi kṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1228: yaśca bodhisattvaḥ ākāṅkṣeta svarṇamayaṃ eva buddhakṣetraṃ paśyeyaṃ tasya svarṇamayaṃ eva tiṣṭheta /
T01bsu018_u:1229: yo rūpyamayamākāṅkṣeta sa rūpyamayaṃ paśyet, na cāsya suvarṇamayaṃ parihāyeyaṃ, peyālaṃ pūrvavat
T01bsu018_u:1230: ya ākāṅkṣeta sphatikamayaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ aśmagarbhamayaṃ lohitamuktāmayaṃ musālagalvamayaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ paśyema, ityākāṅkṣeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1231: agarumayaṃ tagaramayaṃ tamālapatramayaṃ yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣeduragasāracandanamayaṃ goṣīrṣacandanamayaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭuṃ tasya tathaiva syāt /
T01bsu018_u:1232: yathā yathā yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathā tathā tādṛśaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1233: syāt; na caiko dvitīyasya praṇidhiḥ syāt, sarveṣāṃ eva praṇidhiḥ
T01bsu018_u:1236: prajñāyeyātāṃ, svayaṃ prabhāśca tatra bodhisattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ, anyāṃ yādṛśīṃ prabhāmākāṅkṣeran tādṛśīmutsṛjeyuḥ, antato buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvapi /
T01bsu018_u:1237: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre rātridivasānāṃ nāmadheyamapi prajñāyate, anyatra kusumavikasanatayā
T01bsu018_u:1238: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śītoṣṇaṃ prajñāyate na vyādhirna glānyaṃ na jarāmaraṇamanyatra yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣedbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ so 'nyatra
T01bsu018_u:1240: na tatra buddhakṣetre maraṇaṃ bhaveyuḥ, anuttaraparinirvāṇena uparyantarīkṣe tathāgataparinirvāṇaṃ syāt /
T01bsu018_u:1242: sarvatra ca buddhakṣetre gaganatale tūryakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrā vādyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1243: na ca tebhyastūryebhyaḥ kāmopasaṃhitāḥ śabdā niścareyuḥ, anyatra pāramitā śabdā
T01bsu018_u:1248: bodhisattvacārikāmahaṃ bhagavaṃścaramāṇo yāvan mayāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhā dṛṣṭāste vyūhāste 'laṅkārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tāni sthānāni tāni praṇidhānāni sarva eva mama buddhakṣetre praviśeyuḥ, sthāpayitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhavyūhāṃ pañcakaṣāyikāṃśca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1249: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre narakatiryakpretāḥ prajñāyeyurna sumerurna cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na śīlāpāṃśuparvatāḥ prajñāyeyuḥ, na mahāsamudrā; na cānye kāṣṭhavṛkṣā
T01bsu018_u:1250: bhaveyurdivyātikrāntairnānāvṛkṣaistadbuddhakṣetramākīrṇaṃ syāt, anyatra divyaiḥ kusumairmāndāravamahāmāndāravairna ca tatra durgandhaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1252: sarve tatraikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvā utpadyeran, na tatraikasattvaḥ syādyastataścyavitvānyatra pratyājāyeta, anyatra tuṣitebhyaḥ tataścyuto
T01bsu018_u:1254: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvannaivaṃvidhaṃ mahāpuruṣakāramabhiniṣpādayiṣyāmi
T01bsu018_u:1258: na tatra bodhisattvaḥ syād yo na mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitaḥ syāt; sarve te tatra bodhisattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāḥ pāramitāsu niveśitāḥ; tatraivedaṃ buddhakṣetramantargataṃ kuryāṃ sarve cāmī duḥkhā praśamayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1259: bodhisattvabhūto 'haṃ bhadanta bhagavan evaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ niṣpādayeyaṃ, tataḥ paścāt tatra buddhakṣetre
T01bsu018_u:1261: daśacāturdvīpikasahasrapramāṇo me bodhivṛkṣaḥ pariṇāhena syāt, saptaratnavicitrasandarśano nāma bhavet /
T01bsu018_u:1262: daśatrisāhasraḥ samantapariṇāhena; tasya ca bodhivṛkṣasya gandhenābhayā ca kṛtsanaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt; tasya mūle pañcacāturdvīpikapramāṇaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1264: praśamakṣamasuvicitrajñānagandhasamavasaraṇaṃ nāma bhaveccaturaśītiyojanānyuccatvena; tasyāhaṃ bodhivṛkṣasya mūle vajrāsane
T01bsu018_u:1266: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yāvat parinirvāṇakālaṃ tatparyaṅkaṃ na (KpSū 131) bhindyāṃ na muceyaṃ na tasmād bodhivṛkṣamūlāduttiṣṭheyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1267: bodhivṛkṣamūlastha evāhaṃ vajrāsane niṣaṇṇo 'haṃ nirmitān buddhān bodhisattvāṃśca gaṇanātikrānteṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ, ekaiko buddha ekapūrvabhaktena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet, tenaiva pūrvabhaktena gaṇanātikrāntān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ avaivartikāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ, evaṃ nirmitā bodhisattvā
T01bsu018_u:1269: bodhiprāptasya me gaṇanātikrānteṣu daśasu dikṣvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu mama kāyo dṛṣyet, yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mama kāyo lakṣaṇālaṅkṛtaścakṣurindriyasyābhāsamāgacchet sarve te sattvā niyatā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, yāvad bodhiparinirvāṇena te sattvā avirahitā bhaveyurbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ na tatrendriyavikalā bhaveyurye ca tatra bodhisattvā māṃ draṣṭuṃ iccheyuste yena yenaiva gaccheyuḥ parivarteyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyuḥ tiṣṭheyuḥ, sarve te bodhisattvāḥ
T01bsu018_u:1271: paśyeyuḥ, dṛṣṭvā ca yasya dharmasaṃśayaḥ syāt so 'sya sahadarśanena vigacchettīrṇavacikitsāḥ syādanupadiṣṭasya dharmapadasyārthamājāneyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1272: apramāṇaṃ me (KpSū 132) āyurbhavet na śakyate kenacid gaṇayituṃ anyatra
T01bsu018_u:1273: sārvajñena jñānena, apramānāśca tatra bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1274: yasmiṃśca kṣaṇe 'haṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe tatra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastrāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ, yāvan mama parinirvāṇānna cātra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo 'pi
T01bsu018_u:1275: dīrghakeśaḥ syāt śuklaprāvaraṇo vā, sarva eva śramaṇavarṇāḥ syuḥ
T01bsu018_u:1277: bhagavān āha - "sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa, tvamapi paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī atīvaśobhanaṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, atīvaguṇavāstvamatīvajñānavān;
T01bsu018_u:1278: yatastvaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvānāmarthāyaivaṃrūpāṃ pravarāṃ praśastāṃ matiṃ kṛtavān pravaro buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ, tataste kulaputra mañjuśrīrnāma bhavatu /
T01bsu018_u:1285: samantadarśī nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1286: evaṃrūpā ca te bodhisattvaparṣadbhaviṣyati sarve caite praṇidhānāstvayi saṃpatsyante yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ; bodhisattvabhūtena tatastvaṃ bahubuddhakoṭīṣvavaruptakuśalamūlo bhaviṣyasi, āśayapariśodhakaśca
T01bsu018_u:1287: kleśapramardakaḥ, ye ca te mañjuśrīssattvā nāmaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakṣayo bhaviṣyati, kuśalavivardhakaśca bhaviṣyasi" /
T01bsu018_u:1288: mañjuśrīrāha - "yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśāparipūrirbhavediti yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā caiva māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti
T01bsu018_u:1293: tathāprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo divyamāndāravapuṣpāṇyabhipravarṣantu, tebhyaśca māndāravebhya evaṃrūpaḥ
T01bsu018_u:1294: śabdo niścaratu yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ (KpSū 134)
T01bsu018_u:1296: yadā cāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeya tadā caivaṃrūpaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhavet"
T01bsu018_u:1297: yadā ca mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā tatkṣaṇādevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhakṣetrāḥ prakaṃpitā, divyāni ca māndāravāṇyabhipravarṣitāni, sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā
T01bsu018_u:1299: ye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti te tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
T01bsu018_u:1300: paripṛcchanti, "ko 'tra hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ evaṃrūpāṇāṃ nimittānāṃ prādurbhāvāya?" te ca buddhā bhagavanto mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1304: calitā kṣitiḥ tarpitāḥ sattvāḥ saukhyaiḥ puṣpāḥ pravṛṣṭā bheṣyase buddha
T01bsu018_u:1307: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturthaṃ rājaputramānaṅgaṇaṃ nāmāmantrayati /
T01bsu018_u:1311: bhetsyasi, buddhakāryaṃ ca kariṣyasi, tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase
T01bsu018_u:1312: tena tvaṃ kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsaśrīrnāma bodhisattvo bhavasva /
T01bsu018_u:1314: 'dhvanyatikrāntānāmekagaṅgānadīvālikānāmasaṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsaṃkhyeye purimāyāṃ diśi daśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamān buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāllokadhātūnatikramya tatrānimiṣā nāma
T01bsu018_u:1316: samantabhadro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno bhaviṣyasi yāvad buddho bhagavān /
T01bsu018_u:1317: evaṃrūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetramanekaguṇavyūhitaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:1319: samanantaravyākṛtaśca kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
T01bsu018_u:1321: sa āha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalena vandeyaṃ tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāllokadhātavo divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena sphuṭā bhaveyuḥ ye ca tatra lokadhātuṣu sattvā upapannā bhaveyuḥ nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā devā vā manuṣyā vā te sarve taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ, teṣāṃ kāyavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittavyādhiḥ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca tāvacciraṃ praśāntaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1323: atha khalu kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandate /
T01bsu018_u:1324: atha tavadeva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavo divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena sphuṭā babhūvuḥ, sarveṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kāyavyādhiścittavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca praśāntaṃ pratiprasrabdhaṃ (KpSū 137)
T01bsu018_u:1328: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ rājaputramabhayaṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /
T01bsu018_u:1330: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yatra na narakā bhaveyurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ, yatra nīlavaiḍūryamayī bhūmirvistareṇa
T01bsu018_u:1331: yathā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhā tathā vaktavyāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1332: abhayaśca rājaputro ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrataḥ padmaṃ sthāpayitvāha
T01bsu018_u:1333: / "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadahaṃ bhagavato
T01bsu018_u:1335: daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsaṃkhyai rathacakrapramāṇamātraiḥ (KpSū 138)
T01bsu018_u:1336: padmaiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣet vayaṃ ca paśyema" /
T01bsu018_u:1337: sahodīrate vākye buddhānubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabdhavān, daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamai
T01bsu018_u:1338: rathacakrapramāṇāmātraiḥ padmaiḥ padmavarṣaṃ pravarṣitaṃ, yaṃ dṛṣṭvābhayo rājakumāraḥ paramaprītisaumanasyajāto babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:1339: bhagavān āha - "atīva kulaputra śobhanaṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, śobhanaṃ ca buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ, atiśīghraṃ ca te samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:1342: padmā gagane tiṣṭhantu tathaiva gagane sthitā varṣantu" /
T01bsu018_u:1343: bhagavān āha - "atikṣipraṃ kulaputra gaganatalaṃ padmairmudritaṃ, tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra gaganamudro nāma bhavasva /
T01bsu018_u:1346: dvitīye pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasraṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikrāmayitvā tatra padmā nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati, tatra tvaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase, (KpSū 139) padmottaraśca nāma tathāgato
T01bsu018_u:1347: bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān aprameyena śuddhena bodhisattvasaṅghena, aparimāṇā ca te āyurbhaviṣyati /
T01bsu018_u:1349: gaganamudro bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā nipapāta
T01bsu018_u:1353: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ rājaputramambaraṃ nāmāntrayati sma /
T01bsu018_u:1355: yāvad yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1356: "yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tad daśadiśī gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu (KpSū
T01bsu018_u:1357: 140) lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganeṣu saptaratnamayāḥ chatrāḥ prādurbhavantu hemajālapraticchannāḥ saptaratnamayābhirghaṇṭābhiralaṅkṛtāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1358: tatra chatraghaṇṭājālairevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaret yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ pāramitāśabdo balaśabdo 'bhijñāśabdo vaiśāradyaśabdaḥ, sarve ca te sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te śrutvā sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1362: samanantaravyāhṛte 'smiṃ vyāhāre atha daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganatalāt peyālaṃ evaṃrūpāḥ śabdā niścaranti /
T01bsu018_u:1364: "sacenme bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ bhagavataḥ purato jñānavairocanaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheya,
T01bsu018_u:1365: yena mama kuśalā dharmā nivarteyuḥ, pratilabdhe ca samādhau māṃ bhagavāṃ vyākuryāt" /
T01bsu018_u:1367: bhagavān āha - "sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa, udāraṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, tena tvaṃ puṇyābhisyandena daśasu (KpSū 141) dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrā bahavaścaikapramāṇāḥ, śatasahasramanojñaśabdasaṃcodito
T01bsu018_u:1368: buddhakṣetraḥ, tatastvaṃ kulaputra vegavairocano nāma bhagasva /
T01bsu018_u:1370: 'dhvanyekanadīgaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye purastimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavo 'tikramitvā ādityasomā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra tvaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase, dharmavaśavartīśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvad buddho bhagavān" sa ca vegavairocano bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalena vandati ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ
T01bsu018_u:1372: "uttiṣṭha suvrata surata dāntacitta sattvebhyaḥ tīvrakaruṇā mahatī
T01bsu018_u:1374: tāre hi sattvān duḥkhārṇavatīraṃ saṃsthā yāvanna budhyasi
T01bsu018_u:1377: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ saptamaṃ rājaputramaṅgajamāmantrayāṃ āsa /
T01bsu018_u:1380: yatra ca na narakā na tiryagyoniḥ na yamalokaḥ prajñāyate, na mātṛgrāmo na ca sattvānāṃ garbhavāsaḥ, na sumeruḥ na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na pāṃśuśailaparvatā notsadaśarkarakaṭhallakaṇṭakagahanā na kāṣṭhavṛkṣā na mahāsamudrā, na ca tatrādityacandrā na tārakarūpā na rātridivasā na tamaskandhā, na ca tatra
T01bsu018_u:1381: sattvānāmuccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇakaṃ na kāyakhedadurgandhaṃ, na ca sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet na cittaklamatā; na ca tatra
T01bsu018_u:1382: pāṃśubhūmirbhavet ; sarvā ca tatra bhūmiraśmagarbhamayī bhavet anekaratnaśatasahasrālaṅkṛtā bhavet, māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca tad buddhakṣetraṃ nānāratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtaṃ bhavet; te ca ratnavṛkṣā
T01bsu018_u:1383: nānāratnajālālaṅkṛtā bhaveyuḥ; nānāratnaduṣyā nānāratnavastrā nānāratnamālā nānāratnābharaṇālaṅkārālaṅkṛtā
T01bsu018_u:1385: bhaveyuḥ; na tatra rātriḥ prajñāyeta, anyatra yadā puṣpāḥ
T01bsu018_u:1388: pratyājāyeyuḥ; samāpannāśca tatra bodhisattvā darśanavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ
T01bsu018_u:1389: pratilabheyuḥ, yena samādhinā pratilabdhena daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyuḥ; tatkṣaṇe caivaṃrūpaṃ viśuddhaṃ divyaśrotraṃ
T01bsu018_u:1390: pratilabheyuḥ, yena daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1391: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ sarve jātismarā bhaveyuste ca buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān anusmareyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1392: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarve evaṃrūpaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ pratilabheyuḥ, yat samantāddaśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ paśyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1393: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarva evaṃrūpeṇa paracittajñānakauśalyena samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ, yadekakṣaṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāṃ vijāneyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1394: (KpSū 144) te sattvāstāṃ samādhiṃ praṇāmeyū; rātryāḥ pratyuṣakālasamaye caturdiśaṃ sugandhāḥ prītikarāśca mṛdusukhasaṃsparśā vāyavo vāyeyuḥ, ye tān puṣpān vikāsayeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1395: te ca bodhisattvāstābhyaḥ samādhibhyo vyutthihitvā tebhyaḥ puṣpakeśarebhya uttiṣṭheyuḥ; tathārūpaṃ ca ṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratilabheran yad ekacittakṣaṇene buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānyekaikāṃ diśaṃ gaccheyuḥ, tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavato vanditvā paryupāsitvā tadā nivarteyuḥ, tatra ca māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpakeśareṣu paryaṅkamābadhvā niṣīdeyuḥ,
T01bsu018_u:1396: dharmasukhamanasikāreṇa tathāgataṃ prekṣeyuryena yena ca niṣīdeyuḥ parivarteyurvā sarvadiśāsu ca māmeva paśyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1397: yathārūpaṃ ca tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kāṅkṣāvimatidharmeṣu saṃśayotpadyeta tatsarvaṃ mama darśanavyavalokanamātreṇa vigaccheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1398: yathārūpaṃ ca dharmadeśanān te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathārūpaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ mama vyavalokanamātreṇājāneyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1399: amamā aparigrahāśca tatra sattvā bhaveyuḥ, antaśaḥ svakāyajīvitenāpyanarthikāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1400: sarve ca tatra bodhisattvā avaivartikā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1402: bhavenna ca tatra buddhakṣetre śikṣāgrahaṇasya nāma bhavet, na
T01bsu018_u:1403: cāpattivyūtthāpanakathā, yathā yāvatsarvasattvā dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1406: sarve ca tatra sattvā muṇḍā navakāṣāyacīvaraprāvṛtāḥ
T01bsu018_u:1407: pratyājāyeyuḥ; suvibhaktaṃ ca samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ; yāvadbodhiparyantena praṇāmeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1409: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhiduḥkhaṃ prajñāyeta /
T01bsu018_u:1410: yeṣāṃ sattvānāmāyuḥparikṣayo bhavet te sarve paryaṅkena parinirvāyeyuḥ, svakācca śarīrāttejodhātuṃ pramuñceyuryenātmanaḥ śarīraṃ sādhyeyuḥ, caturdiśaśca vāyava āgaccheyuḥ ye tāni bodhisattvaśarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu kṣipeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1411: evaṃrūpāśca mahāmaṇiratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ tadyathā rājñaścakravartinaḥ prabhāsvaraṃ maṇiratnaṃ; ye ca tatra sattvāstāṃ maṇiratnaprabhāṃ paśyeyuḥ taṃ vā maṇiratnaṃ paśyeyuḥ spārśeyurvā te sarve narakatiryagyamalokaduḥkhāni yāvadbodhinirvāṇena mā pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1412: te ca tataścyavitvā tatropapadyeyuḥ yatra tiṣṭhanto (KpSū 146) yāpayanto buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
T01bsu018_u:1413: tatropapannāśca te sattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuste ca
T01bsu018_u:1419: yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ buddhadarśanenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1420: sarve ca tatra sattvā apagatakhiladveṣamrakṣerṣyāmātsaryā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1421: vivarjitaṃ ca taṃ buddhakṣetraṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairbhavet, śuddhaiśca bodhisattvaistaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet /
T01bsu018_u:1422: snigdhacittā mṛducittā avairacittā akilviṣacittāḥ śāntacittāḥ samāhitacittāśca bhaveyuḥ tatra ye sattvā upapadyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1423: prabhāsvaraṃ ca me tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhavet, mahadguṇavyūhaṃ ca me tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhavet
T01bsu018_u:1424: daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ lokadhātubhirdṛśyeta gandhena ca sphuret /
T01bsu018_u:1426: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre duḥkhaśabdaḥ śrūyeta /
T01bsu018_u:1427: tāvaccāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaścaivaṃrūpābhirbuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhasaṃpadābhiḥ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi, evaṃrūpaiḥ pariśuddhāśayaiḥ sattvaistadbuddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi; tataḥ paścād ahaṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ bodhiprāptasya ca me 'pramāṇā prabhā bhavet; sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu ca daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lakṣanālaṅkṛto me kāyaḥ saṃdṛśyediti /
T01bsu018_u:1428: ye ca tatra sattvā māṃ paśyeyuḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamayet, dveṣo moherṣyā mānamrakṣasarvakleśopakleśāḥ praśameyuḥ; sarve
T01bsu018_u:1431: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ śītanarake pratyājātā bhaveyusteṣāṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhāvedanā prādurbhavet, tathārūpāṃ ca sukhāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1432: vedanāṃ pratilabheran yathāpi nāma dvitīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoste ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā parameṇa kāyacaitasikena sukhena samarpitā bhaveyuste ca sarve
T01bsu018_u:1434: tataścyavitvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran, tatra cānaivartikā bhaveyuḥ
T01bsu018_u:1436: ye ca sattvāḥ pretabhavaneṣūpapannāḥ mama paśyeyuḥ, peyālaṃ avaivartikā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau; evaṃ tiryagyonigatā vaktavyāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1437: evaṃ devāḥ dviguṇā ca me prabhāsayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1438: apramāṇā ca me āyurbhavet, yanna śakyaṃ kenacidgaṇayituṃ anyatra sarvajñajñānena /
T01bsu018_u:1439: bodhiprāptasya ca me daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto mama varṇaṃ bhāṣeranyeṣāṃ anuśrāvayeyaṃ; ye ca tatra sattvā mama varṇaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te tatra mama buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayeyuḥ, te kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ sthāpayitvānantaryakārakāṃ saddharmapratikṣepakāṃ āryāpavādakāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1440: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ mama ca buddhakṣetra upapattiṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ, teṣāmahaṃ maraṇakālasamayeṣvanekagaṇaparivṛto vitimirasamādhiṃ
T01bsu018_u:1441: samāpannāḥ tathārūpeṇa subhāṣitena tān sattvān saṃtoṣayeyaṃ, teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhaṃ praśamet, tenaiva prasādena niścitāṃ samādhiṃ
T01bsu018_u:1442: pratilabheyuḥ, (KpSū 149) cittaspṛhaṇāṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ, kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1443: ye ca punaranyatra buddhakṣetreṣu saptadhanavirahitāḥ sattvā anarthikāḥ tribhiryānairanarthikā devamānuṣikābhiḥ saṃpattibhiranarthikāḥ kuśalaparyeṣṭyā tribhiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ adharmarāgaraktā viṣamalobhābhibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāsteṣāṃ prabhāsamādhinā maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ tiṣṭheyaṃ, anekagaṇaparivṛto dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ, teṣāṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
T01bsu018_u:1445: te sattvā mamāntike paramaprītiprasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ bodhau ca cittānyutpādyeyuḥ,
T01bsu018_u:1446: teṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhā vedanāḥ praśameyuḥ, te sūryapradīpaṃ ca samādhiṃ
T01bsu018_u:1447: pratilabheran, mohapraṇāhaṃ caiṣāṃ bhavet, kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:1448: bhagavān āha - "sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa, śodhanaṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:1449: sa prāha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣatu /
T01bsu018_u:1450: ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ te sarve bodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1452: praṇītadyutiṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ, yat svayaṃ eva paśyeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1453: utpāditaśca kulaputra praṇītadyutiḥ samādhiḥ svayamevādrākṣīt tadbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu uragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣitaṃ, daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi
T01bsu018_u:1454: gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ prāñjalibhūtā adrākṣuḥ, ye bodhāya cittānyutpādayanti" /
T01bsu018_u:1456: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā bodhau samādāpitāstena tvaṃ kulaputra siṃhagandho bhavasva /
T01bsu018_u:1458: dvitīye uparimāya diśāyeto buddhakṣetrāddvicatvāriṃśatgaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya tatra nīlagandhaprabhāsavirajo nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati, tatra tvaṃ siṃhagandhānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
T01bsu018_u:1459: prabhāsavirajaḥsamucchrayagandheśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān" /
T01bsu018_u:1461: atha khalu kulaputra siṃhagandho bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditavān /
T01bsu018_u:1464: chittvā tvaṃ bhavaduḥkhakleśabandhanāṃ bheṣyasi narajina āryapudgalaḥ" //
T01bsu018_u:1465: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'ṣṭamaṃ rājaputramamighaṃ nāmāmantrayāṃ āsa /
T01bsu018_u:1467: bodhisattvabhūto bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ daśasahasrān kliṣṭān buddhakṣetrānevaṃrūpāṃ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi, yathā nīlagandhaprabhāsavirajaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ tathā bhaviṣyati evaṃrūpairavaruptakuśalamūlaiḥ pariśuddhāśayairmahāyānasaṃprasthitairbodhisattvaistadbuddhakṣetraṃ
T01bsu018_u:1469: tathārūpāmahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā nānye bodhisattvāścaranti
T01bsu018_u:1470: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannimāni saptavarṣāṇi buddhaguṇabodhisattvaguṇapariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇapariśuddhaṃ rahogata ekākī saṃcintayamāno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:1471: darśanavyūhasamādhipūrvaṃgamena ekadaśabodhisattvasamādhisahasrāṇi yāni mayātrotpāditāni pratilabdhāni bhāvitāni, eṣā mama bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvabhūtasya bodhisattvacārikā; ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣvanantāparyantāsvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, ye trādhvasamatikrāntā dhvajāgrākeyūrā buddhakṣetrāstāṃ paripūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ
T01bsu018_u:1473: tena ca samādhināhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan paramāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavato bodhisattvaśrāvakagaṇaparivṛtān paśyeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1475: (KpSū 153) ekaikena cāhaṃ kāyenānuttarairvicitrai ratnaiḥ puṣpairanuttarairvicitrairgandhairmālyaiśca curṇavilepanairvādyaiḥ sarvābhiścānuttarābhirvyūhābhirekaikaṃ pūjayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1476: ekakṣetre cāhaṃ samudravālikāpramāṇān kalpāṃ careyaṃ, yadā cāhaṃ sarvakāyavibhāvanena
T01bsu018_u:1479: animiṣasamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekarajāgracittapramāṇena sarvabuddhakṣetrān pūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ paśyeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1480: araṇāsamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekacittakṣaṇena sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānatītānāgatapratyutpannān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1481: śūraṅgamasamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavannarakeśvavataritvā nairayikamātmabhāvamabhinirmiṇitvā nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ, bodhāya ca samādāpayeyaṃ, tatastān sattvān bodhāya
T01bsu018_u:1483: (KpSū 154) yatra buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1484: sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ, avaivartikabhūmau ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ; evaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1485: tiryakṣu, evaṃ preteṣu, evaṃ yakṣeṣu, evaṃ rākṣaseṣu, evamasureṣu, evaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1486: nāgeṣu, evaṃ kinnaramahorageṣu, evaṃ piśācapūtanakaṭapūtaneṣu, evaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1487: manuṣyacaṇḍāleṣu, evaṃ vaṇijeṣu gaṇikāsu; yathārūpeṣu ca bhagavan sattvāḥ
T01bsu018_u:1488: kuleṣūpapadyante, yathārūpaśca teṣāṃ ātmabhāvapratilābhaḥ, yathārūpeṇa ca sattvāḥ karmapratyayena sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhāṃ vā pratisaṃvedayanti,
T01bsu018_u:1489: yathārūpeṣu ca śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu prasaktāḥ, tathārūpamātmabhāvaṃ nirmiṇitvā tathārūpaśilpasthānakarmasthāneṣūdyogaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1490: tathārūpeṇa cakṣaravyāhāreṇa sattvānāṃ cittamārādhayeyaṃ, dharmaṃ ca deśayeyaṃ, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1492: / tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā daśasu sarvabuddhakṣetrasahasreṣu sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantatiṃ tathā
T01bsu018_u:1493: pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā pūrvakarmakleśāṃ na kuryuḥ, yadekasattvasyāpi (KpSū
T01bsu018_u:1494: 155) catvārā mārāścittasantatipathaṃ na prajānīyuḥ, tadahaṃ daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyevaṃrūpāṃ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayeyaṃ, yathā prabhāsavirajāsamucchrayagandheśvararājajyotistathāgatasya nīlagandhaprabhāsaviraje buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāstathā bhaveyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1495: evaṃ mayā svabuddhakṣetrasya svaparṣāyā ca yathā siṃhagandhena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1496: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā daśasu buddhakṣetrasahasreṣu sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni praśāmyantu,
T01bsu018_u:1497: sarve ca mṛducittā bhavantu, karmaṇyacittā bhavantu,
T01bsu018_u:1500: prādurbhavantu, yena te sattvāḥ tān buddhān pūjayeyuḥ, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayeyuḥ
T01bsu018_u:1501: ahaṃ ca bhagavan darśanavyūhasamādhānabalena svayaṃ paśyeyaṃ, sahodīritayāṃ vācāsminnevameva svayaṃ paśyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ" iti /
T01bsu018_u:1502: bhagavān āha - "sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yastvaṃ kulaputra samantake ca svake ca buddhakṣetre daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇi pariśuddhāni sthāpayiṣyasi
T01bsu018_u:1505: tena tvaṃ kulaputra samantabhadro nāma bhavasva /
T01bsu018_u:1506: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ samantabhadrānāgate 'dhvani atikrānta ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye parivartāvaśiṣṭe dvitīya uttarāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1507: diśīto buddhakṣetrāt ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramitvā tatra jñānatāpasuviśuddhaguṇā nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati; tatra tvaṃ samantabhadrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
T01bsu018_u:1510: atha khalu kulaputra samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādayoḥ śirasā nipapāta /
T01bsu018_u:1512: "uttiṣṭha surata suvrata dāntacittā sattvāna santati viśodhya
T01bsu018_u:1515: sattvān tāraya kleśanadīsughorān tvaṃ jñāna ulkadhara bheṣyasi buddha loke" //
T01bsu018_u:1516: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputra samayena daśakuśīdaprāṇasahasrāṇi ekakaṇṭhena vācaṃ babhāṣire /
T01bsu018_u:1517: "bhaviṣyāma vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan te pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, yāṃ suviśuddhāśayāḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carāmāṇaḥ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayati /
T01bsu018_u:1518: evaṃ ca vayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayitvā tatra buddhakṣetra upapadyema" /
T01bsu018_u:1519: evaṃ kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena daśaprāṇisahasrā vyākṛtāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1521: samantabhadro 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate tadā yūyaṃ teṣu sāmantakeṣu lokadhātuṣvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyadhve /
T01bsu018_u:1522: sahasraikanāmakāstathāgatā bhaviṣyathaḥ yaduta sahasraṃ jvālakuṇḍeśvaraghoṣā nāma bhaviṣyatha tathāgatāḥ, aparaṃ (KpSū 158)
T01bsu018_u:1523: sahasraṃ saṃvṛtīśvaraghoṣā nāmāno bhaviṣyanti, aparaṃ sahasraṃ suvimalaghoṣeśvararājanāmā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatāḥ, aparaṃ sahasraṃ prahīṇabhayaghoṣeśvararājanāmā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatāḥ, aparaṃ sahasraṃ vimalaghoṣatejeśvararājanāmā bhaviṣyanti /
T01bsu018_u:1524: pañcaśatā ekaṃ nāmadheyāḥ yaduta sūryaghoṣanāmā bhaviṣyanti /
T01bsu018_u:1557: aparaṃ sahasraṃ visṛṣṭadharmarājāno nāgendravimuktibuddhalokasāgaralocanaśailanāmā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1558: ekakāle ekadivase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyanti, anyonyāsu lokadhātuṣu daśāntarakalpāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati" /
T01bsu018_u:1559: te 'pi daśaprāṇasahasrā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā nipetuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1564: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo navamaṃ rājaputramāmantrayate sma amighaṃ nāma /
T01bsu018_u:1565: peyālaṃ, sa prāha - "tathārūpamahaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā me daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāstiṣṭhanto yāpayantaḥ buddhā bhagavanto bodhicārikāṃ carataḥ sākṣibhūtā bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1566: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan tvatpurato bodhāya cittamutpādayāmi, yāvaccānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye
T01bsu018_u:1567: atrāntareṇa me bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya na vipratisāracittamutpadyeta, yāvadbodhiparyantamupādāya dṛḍhapratijño bhaveyaṃ yathāvādī tathākārī, na cānyasya sattvasya
T01bsu018_u:1568: cittasaṃkṣobho bhaveyaṃ, na (KpSū 162) ca me śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne
T01bsu018_u:1569: cittamutpadyeta, mā ca kāmarāgacittacaitasikā utpadyeran, mā styānamiddhasahagatā mauddhatyasahagatā mā kaukṛtyasahagatā na
T01bsu018_u:1570: vicikitsāsahagatā na prāṇātipātaṃ nādattādānaṃ nābrahmacaryaṃ na mṛsāvādaṃ na paiśunyaṃ na pāruṣyaṃ nābhidhyā na vyāpādaṃ na mithyādṛṣṭiḥ na saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ na mātsaryasahagataṃ na dharme 'gauravacittatā na visaṃvādanacittatā /
T01bsu018_u:1571: yāvadbodhiparyantān mama bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya ime dharmā na saṃvidyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1573: yāvadbodhiparyantena nāhaṃ buddhadarśanena virahito bhaveyaṃ na dharmaśravaṇena na saṅghopasthānena
T01bsu018_u:1575: sarvāsu jātiṣu pāṃśukūliko bhaveyaṃ, traicīvarikaḥ vṛkṣamūlikaḥ naiṣadyikaḥ āraṇyakaḥ piṇḍapātikaḥ alpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ dharmadeśakaḥ ādeyavākyaḥ aparimāṇapratibhānasaṃpanno bhaveyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1579: śūnyatāmanaskāreṇa ca mātṛgrāmasya na dantavidarśanaṃ kuryāt, (KpSū 163)
T01bsu018_u:1582: yasya cāhaṃ dharmabhāṇakasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ śāstṛsaṃjñān tasyāntike utpādayeyaṃ, satkṛtya cāhaṃ taṃ dharmabhāṇakaṃ yathā tathāgataṃ tathā satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyaṃ yāvadātmamāṃsairapi dharmabhāṇakamupasthiteyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1583: na cāhaṃ pātramapātraṃ cāvekṣya dānaṃ dadyāṃ, na mama dharmadānamātsarikā
T01bsu018_u:1586: paritrāyeyaṃ, svavīryabalapraṇidhānopārjitena cāhaṃ dravyena vyasanagatān sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1587: na cāhaṃ pravrajitaliṅginaṃ vā gṛhasthaliṅginaṃ vā āpattyānāpattyā vā codayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1589: yadi ca me bhadanta bhagavannime praṇidhānā yāvadbodhiparyantamupādāya saṃṛdhyeyuḥ yathā bhagavataḥ purataḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, tadubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ divyāścakraratnāḥ prādurbhavantu sahasrārāḥ sanābhikāḥ sanemikāḥ ādityavarṇaprabhāsvarāḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:1590: sahabhāṣitāyāṃ asyāṃ vāci amighena rājaputreṇobhāyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ tathārūpāṇi cakrāṇi (KpSū 164) prādurbhūtāni yathāyācitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1591: punarāha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yāvadbodhiparyantena tadime cakrāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gacchantu, evaṃrūpeṇoccaśabdena yathā nandopanandā nāgarājā gacchanti tathā sarvāvantaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ svareṇa vijñāpayantu bodhisattvavyākaraṇasmṛtyasaṃpramoṣajñānadarśanaśūnyatābhāvanāpracārabuddhaviṣayaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cārayituṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1592: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrotrendriyeṣvayaṃ dharmaparyāyamābhāsamāgacchatu, nipatitamātre ca teṣāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1593: sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamatu, dveṣo moho mānerṣyā mātsaryaḥ praśamatu,
T01bsu018_u:1595: preṣitau ca kulaputrāmighena rājaputreṇa tau dvau cakraratnau tau caivaṃrūpeṇa javena gacchatastadyathā buddhā bhagavanto buddhajavena
T01bsu018_u:1596: gacchanti; evameva tau dvau cakraratnau gacchataḥ daśasu
T01bsu018_u:1597: diśāsvaprameyeśvasaṃkhyeyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ bodhisattvavyākaraṇasmṛtyasaṃpramoṣajñānāntargatābhāvanāpracārabuddhadharmaparyāyaṃ cārayanti /
T01bsu018_u:1599: śrotrendriyasyābhāsamāgacchati, teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rāgo yāvan mātsaryacittacaitasikāḥ praśāntāḥ, sarve ca buddhajñānaviṣayaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1600: manaskāreṇānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditavanto, muhūrtamātreṇa ca te cakrāḥ pratinivṛtyāmighasya rājaputrasya purataḥ sthitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1601: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ amighasya rājaputrasya
T01bsu018_u:1602: sādhukāramadāt, "sādhu sādhu kulaputra, tvayātīva śobhanaḥ praṇidhiḥ kṛta,
T01bsu018_u:1603: ime ca divyāścakraratnāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣitā,
T01bsu018_u:1606: bhaviṣyasi tvamakṣobhyo lokasya pariṇāyakaḥ, gṛhṇa tvamakṣobhya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāni yādṛṣānyākāṅkṣasi" /
T01bsu018_u:1607: akṣobhya āha - "tādṛśamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhamākāṅkṣāmi yathā sarvalokasvarṇabhūrbhavet,
T01bsu018_u:1608: samāpāṇitalopamā divyamaṇiratnavyavakīrṇā apagataśarkarakaṭhallā apagataśilāstaṃbhapāṣāṇaparvatā mṛdukā kācalindikasukhasaṃsparṣā, nikṣipte pādatale 'vanamedutkṣipte pādatale punarunnamet na cātra narakatiryagyoniyamalokapretaviṣayāṃ (KpSū 166) prajñāyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1609: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre durgandhā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ, divyātikrāntena gandhena tadbuddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet, divyaiśca māndāravamahāmāndāravaiḥ puṣpaistadbuddhakṣetramākīrṇaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1610: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ bhavet, na ca parasparabhayaṃ na ca parasparaviheṭhā na ca sattvānāmakālamaraṇaṃ vipratisāramaraṇaṃ nāsamāhitamaraṇaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1612: na ca durgatiṣūpapadyeyuḥ, na pañcakaṣāyeṣu śūnyesu
T01bsu018_u:1614: alparāgāśca tatra sattvā bhaveyuralpadveṣā alpamohāḥ, sarve ca tatra daśakuśalāṃ karmapathān samādāya varteyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1615: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ śīlpagrahaṇaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1616: bhavet, na nāmanimittaṃ, na ca tatra sattvānāṃ mārāvatāraṃ mārgena /
T01bsu018_u:1617: na ca tatra sattvā durvarṇā bhaveyuḥ, na ca tatra sattvā vaimātra bhaveyuḥ,
T01bsu018_u:1618: yadutāryo vā dāso vā, amamā aparigrahāśca tatra sattvā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1619: na ca tatra śrāvakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vā śuklamokṣaṇaṃ bhavet, antataḥ
T01bsu018_u:1620: svapnāntaragatānāmapi; (KpSū 167) sarve ca tatra sattvā dharmakāmā dharmaparyeṣṭiparā bhaveyuḥ
T01bsu018_u:1622: viparītadṛṣṭiko bhavet na cānyatīrthiko, na ca tatra sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet cittaklamatā vā bhavet; sarve ca te tatra sattvāḥ pañcābhijñā
T01bsu018_u:1624: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇā vā bhukṣā vā viheṭhayet, yādṛśaṃ cāhāramākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśaṃ ratnabhājaneṣu purataḥ prādurbhavet yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1625: na coccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇamaśru vā kāye svedo vā bhavet, na ca tatra śītaṃ noṣṇaṃ bhavet, sugandhaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ bhavet,
T01bsu018_u:1627: te ca tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gandhakṛtyaṃ kurvīranyadākāṅkṣeyuḥ yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ, ya ekaḥ śītalaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1628: dvitīya uṣṇa, apara utpalagandhaṃ vāyumākāṅkṣeyuḥ, apara uragasāracandanagandhaṃ vāyuṃ, apare kālānusārigandhaṃ, apare
T01bsu018_u:1629: tagaragandhaṃ, apare 'garugandhaṃ, apare sarveṇa sarvaṃ vāyunākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
T01bsu018_u:1632: tatra ca sattvānāṃ saptaratnamayāḥ kūṭāgārā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1633: teṣu ca kūṭāgāreṣu saptaratnamayāḥ paryaṅkāḥ stritāḥ (KpSū 168)
T01bsu018_u:1636: prādurbhavet, yatra te sattvā udakenodakakāryaṃ kuryuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1639: yathārūpā ca tatra sattvā vastrābharaṇaṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ te tān tebhyaḥ kalpavṛkṣebhyo gṛhītvā prāvareyuḥ, evaṃ puṣpairyāvadābharaṇāṃ gṛhītvā bandheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1641: bhavet, yojanasahasramuccatvena yojanaṃ skandhapariṇāhena yojanasahasraṃ śākhāpariṇāhena /
T01bsu018_u:1642: vāyusamīritaśca tato bodhivṛkṣāddivyātikrāntaḥ snigdho manojñaḥ pāramitā abhijñendriyabalabodhyaṅgaśabdo niścaret, ye ca sattvāstaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuste virāgacittāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1643: sarvaguṇopetaśca tatra buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo bhavet tadyathā tuṣitadevanikāye 'psarāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1644: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmo durgandho bhavet, na dvijihve nerṣyāmātsaryaparicite /
T01bsu018_u:1648: sarāgacittamutpadyeta, gatvā mātṛgrāmaṃ sarāgena cittena prekṣate muhūrtena puruṣasya rāgaḥ praśāmyeta, mahatodvegena ca prakramet,
T01bsu018_u:1649: śubhavirajaṃ ca samādhiṃ pratilabheta, tena ca samādhinā mārapāśebhyaḥ
T01bsu018_u:1651: yā ca tatra strī puruṣaṃ sarāgaṃ nirīkṣeta gurviṇī bhavet, nirīkṣitamātreṇa cobhayo rāgaḥ
T01bsu018_u:1653: ye garbhavāsairdārakadārikā evaṃ kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ, tadyathā devāstrayastriṃśā nandanti pramodanti kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti /
T01bsu018_u:1654: evaṃrūpaśca tatra buddhakṣetre garbhavāsā dārakadārikāḥ saptarātriṃdivasāni sukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ
T01bsu018_u:1655: tāśca striyo garbhiṇyaḥ evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ, tadyathā dvitīyadhyānasaṃpanno bhikṣuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1656: na ca te sattvā aśucinā garbhamalena
T01bsu018_u:1657: kliśyeyuḥ, saptame ca divase paramasugandhena parameṇa ca sukhopadhānena samarpitāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ
T01bsu018_u:1658: na caiva sā strī duḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaved, ubhau ca puṣkariṇīmavataritvā snātvā ca sā strī evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheta,
T01bsu018_u:1659: yayā virāgaśubhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheta, tena ca samādhinā mārakarmaṇā
T01bsu018_u:1661: yacca pūrvajanmani tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavedyena ca bahukalpakoṭīstrībhāvamanubhavitavyaṃ tena samādhinābhinirvṛtena strībhāvaṃ ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacched, yāvat parinirvāṇaṃ na
T01bsu018_u:1663: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavet yad gaṇanātikrāntān kalpān nityagarbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavitavyaṃ bhavet, te bodhiprāptasya me
T01bsu018_u:1664: nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ prasādaṃ ca pratilabheyuste tataścyavitvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyurgarbhavāsena ca pratyājāyeyustatra sarveṇa sarvaṃ tatkarmaparikṣayaṃ gaccheyuryāvadbodhiparyantena na bhūyaste sattvā garbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurye sattvā avaruptakuśalamūlāste padmeṣu pratyājāyeyuḥ, ye sattvā anavaruptakuśalamūlāste garbhavāsena pratyājāyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1665: karmaparikṣayena mama buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo vā garbhavāso vā prajñāyeta ekāntasukhasamarpitāste sattvāstatra buddhakṣetre bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1668: (KpSū 171) manuṣyā ulkāvatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā te sattvāḥ śūnyatāvabhāsāṃ gambhīrān dharmān avabudhyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1669: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre kāmopasaṃhitaḥ śabdo bhavet /
T01bsu018_u:1670: bodhivṛkṣamūlaniṣaṇṇaścāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan muhūrtenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpnūyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1671: bodhiprāptasya ca me tatra buddhakṣetre na bhūyaścandrasūryāṇāṃ prabhā prajñāyeta, anyatra kusumasaṃkocanena; evaṃrūpāṃ cāhaṃ prabhāṃ pramuñceyaṃ yena divyena cakṣuṣāprameyāsaṃkhyeyairanyairbuddhakṣetraistiṣṭhato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1672: bodhiprāptaścāhamevaṃrūpeṇa svareṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yena svareṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetramāpūrayeyaṃ, ye ca tatra sattvāḥ syuḥ te sarve buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste yena yena gaccheyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyurvā parivarteyurvā, te satatasamitaṃ māṃ
T01bsu018_u:1673: paśyeyuryathārūpeṣu dharmeṣu dharmasaṃśayā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ mama darśanamātreṇa vyavalokanamātreṇa ca teṣāṃ saṃśayā vigaccheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1674: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vānuttarayānikā vā mama nāmaṃ vā varṇaṃ va śṛṇuyuḥ, te tataścyavitvā (KpSū 172) mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1675: te tatra mama dharmaṃ śrutvā ye śrāvakayānikāste 'ṣṭavimokṣadhyāyino 'rhanto bhaveyuḥ, ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ te pratyekāṃ bodhimabhigaccheyuḥ, ye ca tatra
T01bsu018_u:1676: bodhisattvā mahāyānikāste mat sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā gambhīrāṃ samādhikṣāntidhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ, te tatraivāvaivartikā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T01bsu018_u:1677: aprameyaśca me śrāvakasaṅgho bhaved yo na śakyaṃ kenacidgaṇayituṃ anyatra svayaṃ tathāgatena
T01bsu018_u:1678: bodhiprāptaścāhaṃ yena yena gaccheyaṃ yatra yatra ca pādatalena pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ tatra tatra sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni
T01bsu018_u:1679: prādurbhaveyuḥ, te ca padmāḥ śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā mama varṇaśabdaṃ ghoṣaṃ niścārayeyuḥ; te ca sattvā mama nāma varṇaṃ yaśaśca śrutvā prītiprasādaprāmodyamutpādayeyuḥ, te prasādajātā mama buddhakṣetra
T01bsu018_u:1680: upapattimākāṅkṣeyuḥ, tatra ca tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayeyuḥ, te tataścyavitvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1682: apagataśramaṇavākyāpagataśramaṇakauṭilyāpagataśramaṇaśāṭhyā apagataparṣā (KpSū 173) bhaveddharmagurukā na pariṣkāragurukā na lābhasatkāragurukā,
T01bsu018_u:1683: anityaduḥkhānātmaśūnyatābhiratā ārabdhavīryā ca sā parṣadbhaveddharmaśravaṇā saṅghaprāgbhārā
T01bsu018_u:1684: ye ca tatrāvaivartikā bodhisattvā bhaveyuste 'nāgatapraviṣṭāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste jātivyativṛttā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayeyuḥ,
T01bsu018_u:1685: yāvadbodhiparyantena te dharmā na saṃpramoṣaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1686: yāvadbodhiprāptaścāhaṃ daśamahākalpasahasrāṇi tiṣṭheyaṃ, parinirvṛtasya ca me kalpasahasraṃ saddharmastiṣṭhet" /
T01bsu018_u:1687: bhagavān āha - "sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa, pariśuddhaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ
T01bsu018_u:1689: bhaviṣyasi tvamakṣobhyānāgate 'dhvani atikrānte hyekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeya 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye purastimāyāṃ diśi, ataḥ sahasrime buddhakṣetre 'bhiratirnāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati, evaṃrūpayā guṇavyūhayā saṃpannā yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1691: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase, evamevākṣobhyo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān"
T01bsu018_u:1692: akṣobhya āha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvatra lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaparigṛhītā (KpSū 174)
T01bsu018_u:1693: ye ca sattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītāste sarve maitracittā bhavantvavairacittā akaluṣacittāste evaṃrūpaṃ kāyasukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ tadyathāpi nāma daśabhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya padmasamādhiṃ samāpannasya yenāśayaprahāṇaviśuddhirbhavati, evaṃrūpeṇa sattvāḥ kāyacaitasikena sukhena samārpitā bhavantu /
T01bsu018_u:1694: yadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeta tadā sarvapṛthivī svarṇāvabhāsā bhavatu" /
T01bsu018_u:1695: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā ca tasmin samaye sarvasattvā evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, tadā dharaṇī sarvā svarṇāvabhāsā dṛśyate /
T01bsu018_u:1698: sthāpitā bahutṛṣṇā karuṇacitte bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ śubhamati jagati śāstā" //
T01bsu018_u:1700: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo daśamaṃ rājaputraṃ himaṇiṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /
T01bsu018_u:1701: peyālaṃ himaṇī rājaputra evaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānamakārṣīt tadyathākṣobhyena kṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1702: "yadi me bhadanta bhagavan nevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvasattvā buddhālaṃbanamanaskāraṃ pratilabhantu /
T01bsu018_u:1703: sarveṣāṃ coragasāracandanagandho haste prādurbhavatu, te ca sarve taṃ gandhaṃ buddhavigraheṣu pariṇāmayantu" /
T01bsu018_u:1704: bhagavān āha - "sādhu sādhu kulaputra, udāraṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, yacca tvayā sarvasattvā uragasāracandanahastā sthāpitā buddhamanaskāraścāśayenotpāditaḥ, tena tvaṃ kulaputra gandhahastirnāma bhavasva /
T01bsu018_u:1708: 'ntarhite saptame dviase tvaṃ gandhahaste tatra lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1712: paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeyaṃ tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣatu" /
T01bsu018_u:1713: yadā khalu kulaputra gandhahastirbodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat /
T01bsu018_u:1716: darśaya śubhapatha varapraṇītaṃ sthāpaya bahujagamabhaye pāre" //
T01bsu018_u:1717: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa ekādaśamaṃ rājaputraṃ siṃhaṃ nāmāmantrayāmāsa /
T01bsu018_u:1721: bhavasva, bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ ratnaketo 'nāgate (KpSū 177) 'dhvani atikrānte gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye 'vaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye tatrābhiratyāṃ lokadhātau parinirvṛte svarṇapuṣpe tathāgate tasya ca saddharme 'ntarhite trayāṇāṃ antarakalpānāmatyayena tadbuddhakṣetraṃ jayasomaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati, tatra tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase nāgavinarditeśvaraghoṣo nāma bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān /
T01bsu018_u:1722: evaṃrūpaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhena yathākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya"
T01bsu018_u:1723: ratnaketurāha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādau vande tadā sarvasattvā evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ
T01bsu018_u:1724: pratilabheyuḥ, yathā bodhisattvā ye mahābodhiṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya karuṇāyamānāḥ saṃbodhau prasthitā na nivarteyuḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:1725: evameva kulaputra ratnaketurbodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau
T01bsu018_u:1726: vanditvā, evameva sattvā evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabdhavanto yaduta
T01bsu018_u:1728: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato ratnaketuṃ bodhisattvamāha -
T01bsu018_u:1730: "uttiṣṭha dhairya sumate paramarūpa sattvahetu sudṛḍhakṛta pratijñā /
T01bsu018_u:1731: sthāpayasi bahujana virajacitte bhaviṣyase naravaro pravarabuddhaḥ" //
T01bsu018_u:1733: praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, kṛtvaivaṃrūpā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītā yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāśca parigṛhītāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1734: sarve ca ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1736: apare catvāraḥ śatā rājaputrāṇāṃ yairevaṃrūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ yathā vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsena, te 'pi sarve ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena
T01bsu018_u:1738: aparairekonanavatibhī rājaputrairevaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ, evaṃrūpaṃ ca buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ (KpSū 179.) yathā samantabhadreṇa /
T01bsu018_u:1741: sarve ca ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, anyonyeṣu lokadhātuṣvekakāle bodhiṃ prāpsyanti /
T01bsu018_u:1742: evameva tribhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ pṛthakpṛthak praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:1744: sarve ca ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vyākṛtāanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, "evameva
T01bsu018_u:1747: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyāśītiputrā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya bhrātaraḥ, teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ samudreśvarabhuvirnāma māṇavaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1748: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ samudreśvarabhuviṃ māṇavaṃ āmantrayāmāsa /
T01bsu018_u:1753: samudrareṇurāha - " tvaṃ tāvat putra praṇidhānaṃ kuruṣva, paścādahaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kariṣye"
T01bsu018_u:1754: sa āha - "kiṃ tāvat pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pratigṛhṇāmyutāhosvidapariśuddhaṃ?"
T01bsu018_u:1759: atha khalu kulaputra samudreśvarabhuvirmāṇavako yena ratnagarbhas tathāgatastenopasamakrāmadupasaṃkramya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ sthitvaivamāha - "evamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimākāṅkṣāmi, aśītivarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ pravarāṃ bodhiṃ spṛśeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1760: yathaitarhi bhagavan sattvā mandarāgā mandadveṣā mandamohā udvignāśayāḥ saṃsāre bhayadoṣadarśinastathā tatra buddhakṣetre sattvā
T01bsu018_u:1761: bhaveyuḥ, yatrāhamabhisaṃbuddheyaṃ, te ca mamāntike pravrajeyuḥ, tribhiśca yānairahaṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1762: yadi bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tad vyākarotu māṃ bhagavānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau"
T01bsu018_u:1765: atikrānta ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye utpalasantīraṇe kalpe cāturdvīpikā baliṣṭhā nāma bhaviṣyati, imaṃ buddhakṣetramaśītivarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:1766: bodhimabhiprapsyasi, ratnakūṭo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān" /
T01bsu018_u:1767: sa āha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadiha
T01bsu018_u:1768: sarvatrārāme lohitamuktiḥ pravarṣatu, sarvavṛkṣebhyaśca pañcāṅgikaṃ tūryaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1770: yadā ca kulaputra samudreśvarabhuvirmāṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvatrārāme lohitamuktimayavarṣaṃ pravarṣitaṃ, sarvavṛkṣebhyaśca pañcāṅgikaṃ tūryaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1774: abhiprāya tubhya paripūryatu śuddha sattvāna arthakaru bheṣyasi buddha loke" //
T01bsu018_u:1776: dvitīyaśca brāhmaṇasya putraḥ saṃbhavo nāma, sa evaṃ vadati yathā samudreśvarabhuviḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1779: buddhakṣetre vardhamānāśītivarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vairocanakusumo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān" /
T01bsu018_u:1782: vyākaraṇaṃ peyālaṃ, evaṃ sumanastathāgataḥ śailarājā saṃvṛtalocano brahmottaro jambūcchāyaḥ pūrṇamuttaro ratnaśailaḥ
T01bsu018_u:1783: samudragarbho nārāyaṇaḥ śikhī kanakamunirmunīndraḥ kauṇḍinyaḥ siṃhavikramo jñānadhvajo buddhaśravo 'parājito vikasitojjayo hiteṣī prajñāvabhāso
T01bsu018_u:1784: mahendraḥ śāntaprajñākaro nando nyagrodharājaḥ kanakalocanaḥ sahitaḥ sūryanandiḥ ratnaśikhī sumetro brahmaḥ sundo brahmarṣabhaḥ praṇādo dharmacandraḥ (KpSū 183) arthadarśī yaśonandī yaśottaraḥ abhirūpaḥ sugandhaścaturaḥ pravaralocanaḥ sunijastaḥ sārthavrataḥ sumanoratho
T01bsu018_u:1785: varaprajñaḥ kanakadhvajaḥ sunetro devaśuddhaḥ śuddhodanaḥ sudarśanaḥ virūḍhadhvajo virūpākṣo brahmasvaraḥ śrīsaṃbhavaḥ śrīmahāvirajo maṇibhadraḥ mārīciḥ śākyamunirghoṣeśvaraḥ satyasaṃbhavaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ saṃbhavapuṣpaḥ sukusumaḥ akṣobhyaḥ sūryagarbho ratīśvaro nāgadanto
T01bsu018_u:1786: vajraprabhāsaḥ kīrtirājā vyāghraraśmiḥ sanetyajñānasaṃbhavaḥ gandhasvaraḥ sālendraḥ nārāyaṇagataḥ jyotigarbhaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1787: yastu tatra kulaputra sarvapaścimakaḥ purohitaputraḥ vigatabhyasaṃtāpo nāma, sa ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purutaḥ sthitvāha /
T01bsu018_u:1788: "ime bhadanta bhagavannekonāśītirmāṇavakāḥ sarve vyākṛtā utpalasaṃtīraṇe kalpe
T01bsu018_u:1790: utpādayāmyahaṃ bhagavannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ, kṣīyamāṇe bhadanta bhagavannutpalasaṃtīraṇe (KpSū 184) kalpe sarvapaścimako 'haṃ
T01bsu018_u:1792: yāntakaṃ teṣāmekonāśītīnāṃ buddhānāmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tāntakaṃ mamaikasya bodhiprāptasya bhavet
T01bsu018_u:1793: yāntakāśca teṣāṃ vaineyā bhaveyustāntakā mamaikasya bhaveyuḥ, yathā ca te tribhiryānairdharmaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1794: deśayeyuḥ, yathā ca teṣāṃ śrāvakasaṅgho bhavet, tāntako mama bodhiprāptasya ekaśrāvakasaṅgho bhavet /
T01bsu018_u:1795: ye ca teṣāmekonāśītīnāṃ buddhānāmutpannānāṃ sattvāstasminnutpalasaṃtīraṇe kalpe manuṣyalābhaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1796: pratigṛhṇīyuḥ, kṣīyamāṇe kalpe 'hamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstān sattvāṃstribhiryānairniyatāṃ vyavasthāpayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:1797: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadvyākuruṣva māṃ bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau" /
T01bsu018_u:1798: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato vigatabhayasaṃtāpasya sādhukāramadāt /
T01bsu018_u:1799: "sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa, gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāruṇikahitakaraścotpanno, bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavakānāgate 'dhvanyatikrānta
T01bsu018_u:1800: ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye tatrotpalasaṃtīraṇe kalpe kṣīyamāṇe
T01bsu018_u:1802: viagatarajasamudgatābhyudgatarājā nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān /
T01bsu018_u:1805: yāvat sarve te tvatpraṇidhānāḥ saṃpatsyante yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:1806: sa āha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripuryeta yadāhaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1807: bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandāmi tadā sarvatrāsmin buddhakṣetre nīlakusumāḥ pravarṣantu paramasugandhā, ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhamāghrāyeyuḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dhātavaḥ prasannā aviruddhā bhaveyuḥ, sarveṣāṃ ca sarvavyādhyaḥ praśāmyeyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1808: yadā ca kulaputra vigatabhayasaṃtāpo māṇavo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvatra tasmin buddhakṣetre nīlakusumavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā, ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhaṃ ghrātavantasteṣāṃ sarve dhātavaḥ samā aviruddhāḥ saṃsthitāḥ, sarve ca tatra sattvā arogā alpābādhāśca saṃvṛttāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1813: tasya ca kulaputra brāhmaṇasya trayaḥ koṭyo 'ntavāsināmārāmadvāre
T01bsu018_u:1814: niṣaṇṇāste āgatāṃ sattvāṃstriśaraṇagamane sthāpayanti, bodhāya ca samādāpayanti /
T01bsu018_u:1817: bho māṇavakā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ, gṛhṇatha buddhakṣetraguṇāṃ yādṛśānākāṅkṣatha, kuruta bhagavataḥ sakāśe praṇidhānaṃ
T01bsu018_u:1819: tatra jyotikṣabhako nāma māṇavaḥ, sa āha - "kīdṛśena mārgeṇa kīdṛśena saṃbhāreṇa kīdṛśyā caryayā kīdṛśyā saṃṛtyā bodhirlabhyate?" /
T01bsu018_u:1820: purohita āha - "catvāra ime māṇavakā bodhimārgapratipannena bodhisattvenākṣayakośāḥ samudānayitavyāḥ
T01bsu018_u:1825: uktaṃ caivaṃ māṇava tathāgatena saṃbhāraviśuddhisaṅgraho nāma
T01bsu018_u:1826: saṃsārottaraṇadharmadvāraṃ; dānasaṃbhāraṃ bodhisattvā ye parityajanti, sa ca vaineyasattvaparipācanāya saṃvartate; śīlasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ praṇidhānapūryai saṃvartate; kṣāntisaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaparipūryai saṃvartate; vīryasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakāmakaraṇāya saṃvartate; dhyānasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāmājāneyacittatāyai saṃvartate; prajñāsaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakleśaparijñāyai saṃvartate; śrutasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāmasaṅgapratibhānatāyai saṃvartate; puṇyasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasattvopajīvyatāyai saṃvartate; jñānasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāmasaṃśayajñānatāyai saṃvartate: śamathasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ karmaṇacittatāyai saṃvartate; vipaśyanāsaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ vigatakathaṃkathāyai saṃvartate; (KpSū 188) maitrīsaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāmapratihatacittatāyai saṃvartate; karuṇāsaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ vaineyākhedatāyai saṃvartate; muditāsaṃbhāro bodhisattvānām dharmārāmaratiramaṇatāyai saṃvartate; upekṣāsaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāmanunayapratighaprahāṇatāyai saṃvartate;
T01bsu018_u:1834: smṛtyupasthānasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ kāyavedanācittadharmapratyavekṣaṇatāyai saṃvartate; samyakprahāṇasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakuśaladharmabhāvanāparipūraṇāya (KpSū 189) saṃvartate;
T01bsu018_u:1836: indriyasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ saṃvaraparipūryai saṃvartate; balasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakleśāvamardanatāyai saṃvartate; bodhyaṅgasaṃbhāro bodhisattvānāṃ dharmasvabhāvāvabodhanatāyai saṃvartate;
T01bsu018_u:1844: purohitā āha - "ye māṇavāḥ saṃsārābhiratā dānaṃ dadanti,
T01bsu018_u:1846: ye māṇavaka kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bodhimārgapratipannāstairdānaṃ damacittatayā dātavyaṃ, śīlaṃ śamathacittatayā rakṣitavyaṃ, śrutamakaluṣacittatayā paryeṣitavyaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:1847: bhāvanā mahākaruṇācittatāyai bhāvayitavyā, pariśeṣā (KpSū 190) dharmāḥ prajñājñānopāyasaṃbhārasamudānayatāyai paryeṣṭavyāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1849: īdṛśena saṃbhāreṇa bodhirlabhyata iti, īdṛśī bhāvanā, īdṛśī
T01bsu018_u:1850: smṛtiḥ, īdṛśī māṇavakā bodhimārgacaryā; janayata māṇavakā bodhau chandaṃ /

T01bsu018_u:1852: prasanno māṇavakā bodhimārga āśayaviśuddhyā; ṛjukā māṇavakā bodhimārga
T01bsu018_u:1855: kuruta praṇidhānaṃ, gṛhṇata buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pariśuddhamapariśuddhaṃ vā yathābhipretā"
T01bsu018_u:1856: atha khalu kulaputra jyotikṣabhako māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpyāha /
T01bsu018_u:1858: asmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre maṇḍarāgāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ maṇḍadveṣāṇāṃ maṇḍamohānāṃ askhalitāluḍitacittānāṃ avairacittānāṃ īrṣyāmātsaryacittavivarjitānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭiparivarjitacittānāṃ samyagdṛṣṭivyavasthitacittānāṃ kuśalacittānāṃ kuśalaparyeṣṭicittānāṃ apāyapathavivarjitacittānāṃ (KpSū 191) triḥsvargapathodyuktacittānāṃ tribhiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ samudānītakuśalamūlānāṃ triṣu yāneṣu
T01bsu018_u:1860: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadā me ubhayoḥ pāṇyorhastināgāḥ prādurbhavantu"
T01bsu018_u:1864: sarvāvantamidaṃ buddhakṣetramaṣṭāṅgopetena varṣeṇa paramasugandhena sarvasattvānito buddhakṣetrāt prabodhayata /

T01bsu018_u:1868: sahapravyāhṛte vākye nāgā uparyantarīkṣe evaṃrūpeṇa javena gacchanti,
T01bsu018_u:1869: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣaḥ prasāritāṃ bāhu saṃkocayet saṃkocitaṃ bāhu prasārayet /
T01bsu018_u:1870: evameva te hastināgāḥ kṛtakāryā yathā pūrvoktaṃ vivarttitvā tasyāgrataḥ sthitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1871: atha khalu kulaputra jyotikṣabho māṇavakaḥ paramaprītimanāḥ; (KpSū 192)
T01bsu018_u:1873: anupraviṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye ratnaprabhāse kalpe ratnasañcayaṃ nāma buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati, asmiṃ cāturdvīpike ratnacchatrābhyudgataraśmirbhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān" /
T01bsu018_u:1874: atha kulaputra jyotikṣabho bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā nipapāta /

T01bsu018_u:1878: peyālaṃ, sahasro māṇavakānāṃ trayaḥ koṭyo māṇavakānāṃ yairasmin
T01bsu018_u:1880: sarve ca te ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vyākṛtāḥ, yāvadvipaśyī śikhī viśvabhuvaḥ paścimā buddhā babhūvuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:1882: tatra sahasravedapāṭhakānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yasteṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ gurusaṃmato vāyuviṣṇurnāma /
T01bsu018_u:1885: tīvrarāgānāṃ tīvradveṣāṇāṃ tīvramohānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ" /

T01bsu018_u:1894: ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - "bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ vāyuviṣṇo atikrāntānāmekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāmasaṃkhyeyānāmavaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye purastimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramitvā tatra

T01bsu018_u:1903: atha khalu kulaputra jyotipālo māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthvyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpyāha - "utpādayāmyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ asmin buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohasabhāgacittānāmavyavasthitakuśalākuśalāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ ' /

T01bsu018_u:1913: krakutsando nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavāṃstribhiryānairdharmaṃ deśayiṣyasi, gaṇanātikrāntān sattvān saṃsāranadyāmuhyamānānuttārayiṣyasi, nirvāṇapāre ca sthāpayiṣyasi atha khalu kulaputra jyotipālo bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'tikramya tasthau /
T01bsu018_u:1914: atha khalu kulaputra dvitīyastumbururnāma māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣaṇṇaḥ

T01bsu018_u:1916: ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - "bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavakātikrānta ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye 'vaśiṣṭe dvitīye nadigaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye sahe buddhakṣetre 'nupraviṣṭe bhadrakalpe krakutsandasya tathāgatasyānusaṃdhau triṃśadvarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ kanakamunirnāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vighuṣṭaśabdo

T01bsu018_u:1920: "susahita sumudita sumadhura vacanā askhalita aluḍita akaluṣa vimalā /

T01bsu018_u:1925: atha khalu kulaputra viśvagupto nāma māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ saptaratnamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ sthāpayitvā śatasahasramūlyena prajñapanena
