T01bsu018_u:3224: kālagataśca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko mahāśramaṇaḥ praṇidhānavaśena dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśāyāmito buddhakṣetrāddaśabuddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya tatra saṃkarṣaṇo nāma lokadhāturaśītivarṣāyuṣkāśca tatra manuṣyā akuśalamūlasamavadhānā raudrā lohitapāṇayaḥ pāpaniviṣṭā adayāpannaḥ sarvasattveṣu amātṛjñā apitṛjñā aparalokabhayādarśinaḥ praṇidhānavaśena mahākāruṇiko mahāśramaṇastatra saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetre caṇḍālakula upapanno 'bhūt /
T01bsu018_u:3225: sa cātīvadīrghaśarīro 'bhūdatīvabalavān atīvavegavān atīvasmṛtimān atīvapratibhānavān atīvajavasamanvāgato 'bhūt /
T01bsu018_u:3226: sa dṛḍhena balavegena sattvān saṃgṛhītvāha - "yadi yūyaṃ bho sattvā adattādānāt
T01bsu018_u:3228: prativiramata, tadahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ jīvitaṃ prayacchāmi jīvitopakaraṇāni ca
T01bsu018_u:3230: atha ca punarna prativiramata, ahaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayitvā prakramiṣyāmi" /
T01bsu018_u:3232: "vayamidānīn tava nāthasya vacanenādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvamadattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭyāḥ prativiramāmaḥ"
T01bsu018_u:3233: sa balacaṇḍālo gatvā rājño vā rājabhaṭṭānāṃ vā nivedayati /
T01bsu018_u:3234: "jīvitopakaraṇena me prayojanamannena vā pānena vā khādyena
T01bsu018_u:3235: vā bhojyena vā peyavastraśayyāgandhahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktavaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍarajatajātarūpeṇa vā prabhūtāni jīvitopakaraṇāni dadata mama" /
T01bsu018_u:3236: sa balacaṇḍālaḥ sattvān yāvajjīvaṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
T01bsu018_u:3238: yaśca tatra rājā sa kālagataḥ tatastai rājāmātyaiḥ sa balacaṇḍālo rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ puṇyabalo nāma saṃskṛtaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3239: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo na cireṇaiva taṃ viṣayamanuśāsitavān,
T01bsu018_u:3241: yāvad rājā puṇyabalo na cireṇa sarvajambūdvīpe rājā balacakravartī babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:3242: yadā ca rājñā puṇyabalena sarvajambūdvīpe rājatvaṃ pratigṛhītaṃ tataḥ paścāt sattvāḥ prāṇātipātaviramaṇe samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3244: pratiṣṭhāpitā, yathābhiprāyāḥ sattvāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3245: atha rājā puṇyabalaḥ sarvajambūdvīpikāṃ sattvāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu saṃniyojya sarvajambūdvīpe ghoṣamanuśrāvayamāsa /
T01bsu018_u:3246: "ye kecid yācanakā annārthikā yāvad ratnārthikā vā te sarva āgacchantu /
T01bsu018_u:3249: 'pareṇa kālasamayena sarvajambūdvīpikāḥ sattvā āgatvā rājānaṃ puṇyabalaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3250: yācitavantaḥ; rājāpi puṇyabalastānyārabhya vividhāni dānāni dattavān /
T01bsu018_u:3252: "yadi tvaṃ mahārāja vividhaṃ mahādānaparityāgaṃ parityajasi, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimākāṅkṣasi
T01bsu018_u:3254: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mahārāja lokapradīpo jina" iti /
T01bsu018_u:3257: pāṃśughoṣa ājīvika āha - "ahaṃ mahārāja vidyādharatvamicchāmi mahāsurasaṃgrāmapramardanakalpaṃ sādhayituṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3258: tenāhaṃ tava purataḥ sthitvā vijñāpayāmi jīvataḥ puruṣasya carmaṇā prayojanaṃ cakṣuṣā ca prayojanaṃ"
T01bsu018_u:3259: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabala evaṃ cintayati /
T01bsu018_u:3261: gaṇanātikrāntaśca sattvā daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitā,
T01bsu018_u:3265: sa rājāha - "tuṣṭo bhava dadāmi te imaṃ prākṛtamāṃsacakṣustenāhaṃ labheyānuttaraṃ dharmacakṣuḥ
T01bsu018_u:3266: dadāmi te imaṃ svakaṃ carma prasannacittena, tena cāhaṃ lapsye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ"
T01bsu018_u:3267: / atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo dakṣiṇena hastenobhau
T01bsu018_u:3269: "śṛṇvantu me iha devayakṣamaharddhikā ye kecinnarā ye 'surā ye ca bhūtā ihāgatāḥ khecarā bhūmau sthitā ye narā, bodhāya mayā dānaṃ nāmitaṃ śubhaṃ prāpsye
T01bsu018_u:3270: 'haṃ śāntaṃ padaṃ, sattvāṃstārayeyaṃ, ghorāt saṃsārārṇavāt pāre 'nuttare
T01bsu018_u:3273: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpnuyāṃ, tāvacciraṃ mama jīvitendriyaṃ mā nirudhyeta mā
T01bsu018_u:3274: ca me smṛtirnaśyeta mā ca me vipratisāro bhaved, yāvacciramasyājīvikasya sā vidyā na siddhā bhavet" /
T01bsu018_u:3276: sa ca kulaputra pāṃśughoṣājīvikastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā rājño dhriyataḥ kāyaccarmamapanetvā carma gṛhītvā vidyāṃ sādhayitvā, tathā saptadivasāni rājñaḥ puṇyabalasya jīvitendriyaṃ na niruddhaṃ, na ca smṛtiḥ pramuṣṭā, na ca tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati, na cāsyaikakṣaṇaṃ api vipratisāro jātaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3277: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva, na cānyo draṣṭavyo 'haṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā /
T01bsu018_u:3279: prathamacittotpādena ca me gaṇānātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu018_u:3280: ayaṃ me prathamaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca /
T01bsu018_u:3281: so 'haṃ praṇidhānavaśena tataścyavitvā saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetra upapannaścaṇḍālakule dvitīyaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3283: tadā me caṇḍālavaṃśe (KpSū 353) sthitvā sattvāṃ kuśale niyojya svabalaparākrameṇa yāvadbalacakravartitvaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3284: sarvajaṃbūdvīpe ca kalikaluṣakalahāḥ praśamitā, āyuśca vardhāpitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3285: ayaṃ ca me prathama ātmaparityāgaḥ, yadā ca me svanetrāḥ parityaktāḥ svacarmaparityāgaśca
T01bsu018_u:3288: peyālaṃ, tatra ca mayaivaṃrūpeṇa dṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇa sattvānniyojayitvā kuśaleṣu karmeṣu,
T01bsu018_u:3290: tatra ca kalikaluṣakalahavairavigrahāḥ praśamitā, āyuśca vardhāpitaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3291: tatra ca svaśarīrāt jihvā karṇau ca parityaktau, yāvat sarvan tatsaṃkarṣaṇaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3293: praṇidhānadṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇānuprabandhena praṇidhānavaśena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu evaṃrūpaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ, sattvāśca kuśaleṣu niyojitāḥ, triṣu ca yāneṣu
T01bsu018_u:3295: ityarthaṃ kulaputrānyeṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3296: yadā te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhicaryāṃ caramāṇā na
T01bsu018_u:3297: parāmāpattyā (KpSū 354) codayanti, na ca parasya bhayaṃ darśayanti, na śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne sattvāṃ samādāpayanti /
T01bsu018_u:3298: ityarthaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ paripūrṇābhiprāyāṇāṃ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhavati
T01bsu018_u:3299: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre āpattināma, na śikṣāgrahaṇasya, na ca paruṣavacanaṃ śrūyate, na cākuśalaśabdaḥ; anyatra dharmaśabdena tadbuddhakṣetramapagatāmanāpaśabdena sphuṭaṃ bhavati tatra ca sattvā yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti, na ca tatra śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya nāma prajñaptiprādurbhāvo 'sti /
T01bsu018_u:3300: yadā ca mayā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu mahākalpeṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu paruṣavacanabhayena sattvāḥ prāṇātipātavairamaṇye samādāpitā yāvattriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3301: (KpSū 355) tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa ma etarhyevaṃ parikliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ akuśalaśabdenāpūritaṃ akuśalamūlasamavadhānagataiḥ sattvaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ, tribhiśca yānairdharmaṃ deśayāmi /
T01bsu018_u:3302: yathā ca me pūrvaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathārūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3303: yādṛśāśca me sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstadṛśenaiva balavīryodyogena bodhicārikāḥ cīrṇāḥ, yādṛśaṃ caiva bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pratilabdhaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3305: saṃkṣiptena te kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ kathayiṣyāmi yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ, na kenacit pūrvaṃ bodhisattvenaivaṃrūpaḥ dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ, na ca punaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3306: kaścidbodhisattvo bhaviṣyati ya evaṃrūpaṃ dānaparityāgaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ parityajati, yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaṃ parityaktaṃ, anyatrāṣṭau satpuruṣāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3308: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśāyāṃ (KpSū 356) sarvaghoṣāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃkaramardārcirnāma tathāgato
T01bsu018_u:3311: evaṃ vīryasaṃcodano nāma babhūva bodhisattvaḥ, yaḥ purimāyāṃ diśāyāmajayavatyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3315: 'nuttaraparinirvāṇena parinirvṛtaḥ, adyāpi tasya mahākāruṇikasya śarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakāryaṃ kurvanti /
T01bsu018_u:3316: evaṃ ca vadanti sārakusumito bodhisattvo dṛḍhavīryasamādhāno balavegaparityāgena bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
T01bsu018_u:3317: daśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamairmahākalpairatikrāntaiḥ paścāt sa tatrottarāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sahetusaṃkarṣaṇo nāma bhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre tatrāsau satpuruṣo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyati,
T01bsu018_u:3318: sahetukṛṣṇavidhvaṃsanarājo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān
T01bsu018_u:3319: prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭo (KpSū 357) nāma bodhisattvaḥ satpuruṣa ekasya mahākalpasyātyayena paścimāyāṃ diśi bhairavatī nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3321: sūryagarbhārcivimalendro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān /
T01bsu018_u:3322: ayaṃ punaḥ saṃrocano gaṇanātikrāntaiḥ kalpairnirdiṣṭitairuparimasyāṃ diśi kṣāravarcanikuñjitāyāṃ lokadhātau pañcakaṣāye tīvrakaluṣasaṃkṣobhaṇe kalpe 'sau saṃrocanaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena pañcāśadvarṣāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ tatra kṣāravarcanikuñjite buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ (KpSū 358) samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate, acintyarocano nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati yāvad buddho bhagavān /
T01bsu018_u:3323: sa pūrvapraṇidhānena daśavarṣāni sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāsyati /
T01bsu018_u:3324: tatraiva divase tasya tathāgatasya saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati, daśavarṣāṇi punastaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T01bsu018_u:3325: tataḥ paścādasau prahasitabāhurbodhisattvastatra ca kṣāravarcanikuñjite buddhakṣetre
T01bsu018_u:3330: tasya ca parinirvṛtasya pūrvapraṇidhānena saptavarṣāṇi saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
T01bsu018_u:3331: atra dvau satpuruṣau labdhapūrvavyākaraṇau labdhāsvādāvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhagavataḥ purataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prītisaumanasyaprāmodyena saptatālamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe 'bhyudgamya prāñjalībhūtau sthitvā bhagavantamekasvareṇa gāthābhiradhyabhāṣatāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3332: "virocase buddha yathaiva sūrya abhyudgato merurimasmiṃ loke /
T01bsu018_u:3333: viśuddhacakṣurvirajā vināyakā ālokabhūtā sugatā namo 'stu te //
T01bsu018_u:3334: bahūni kalpāna ti vīryabhāvitā paryeṣamāṇena ti agrabodhi /
T01bsu018_u:3336: bahujinā pūjitā pūrve ye tvayā na caiva te vyākarṣīmatitanāyakāḥ //
T01bsu018_u:3337: prahīṇarāgā parimuktacittā kṛtaṃ ti kāryamiha sarvaloke /
T01bsu018_u:3338: praṇaṣṭamārgāṇa deśesi dharmaṃ sattvāṃśca uttārayase bhavārṇavāt //
T01bsu018_u:3339: vayaṃ pi pravrajya svayaṃbhūśāsane yā prātimokṣa jina śikṣa deśitā /
T01bsu018_u:3340: vayaṃ pi śikṣitva samāhitendriyā tavaiva āsanna sadā bhavemaḥ //
T01bsu018_u:3344: bhagavānāha - "tau ca kulaputra dvau anutpāditabodhicittau; imau ca saṃrocanaḥ prahasitabāhuḥ, te catvāro dharaṇidatto vīryasaṃcodanaḥ sārakusumitaḥ prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭaḥ, ime ṣaṭsatpuruṣā mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāstāṃ śṛṇu /
T01bsu018_u:3346: kalpairatikrāntaiḥ, yadāsīttena kālena tena samayenedaṃ buddhakṣetramarajamerujugupsitaṃ nāmābhut, tadāhaṃ mahākalpe vartamāne
T01bsu018_u:3347: varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane saddharmapratirūpake (KpSū 361) vartamāne 'haṃ ca kulaputra tena kālena durdhano nāma babhūva balacakravartī jambūdvīpavijayī sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:3350: 'pyapareṇa samayena niṣkramya gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane pravrajitāste ca bhūyasyā mātrayā gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsanaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3351: jvālitavantaḥ, sthāpayitvā ṣaṭputrāṃ ye na pravrajitā na cecchanti bodhicittamutpādayituṃ
T01bsu018_u:3354: yuṣmākamabhiprāyo yadyūyaṃ bodhicittaṃ notpādayatha, na ca pravrajatha?" /
T01bsu018_u:3357: tatkasmāddhetoḥ?, yaḥ kṣayāntakāle saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne pravrajito 'śaktaḥ sakalaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3358: śīlaskandhamārādhayituṃ, sa ca saptadhanavirahito bhavati, magnaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3359: saṃsārapaṅke, punaśca sa devamanuṣyaśrīḥ kadācillabhati, nityaṃ triṣvapāyeṣu paribhramati, buddhaśikṣāyāṃ na samādāya vartate /
T01bsu018_u:3363: ta āhur["]yadyasmākaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ dadyādevaṃ (KpSū 362) vayaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu018_u:3364: tadahaṃ kulaputra śrutvā paramaprītamanā evaṃ cintayāmi /
T01bsu018_u:3365: "mayā sarvaṃ jambudvīpakā manuṣyastriśaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpitā, āryāṣṭāṅge upoṣadhavāse samādāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu samādāpitā /
T01bsu018_u:3366: yannūnamahamimaṃ jambudvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ dadyāṃ; datvā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3368: evaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ dattaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3369: ahaṃ ca niṣkramya pravrajitaste ca ṣajjambūdvīparājānaḥ parasparaviruddhāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigraharogaparacakrasaṃkṣobhavividamāpannāḥ
T01bsu018_u:3370: yataḥ sarvajambūdvīpe durbhikṣaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ, śaṣpāni na saṃpadyante, varṣaṃ na pravarṣati, vṛkṣebhyaśca patrapuṣpaphalāni na niṣpadyante, oṣadhitṛṇāni ca na saṃpadyante, mṛgapakṣiṇo 'pi kṣuttṛṣṇāprajvālitagātrā vihanyante /
T01bsu018_u:3372: "mayā caitarhi ātmaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ, sattvāḥ svamānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayitavyās[ /
T01bsu018_u:3373: "]tato 'ham āśramaṃ parityajya madhyameṣu janapadeṣu gatvā dagapālaṃ parvatamabhiruhya
T01bsu018_u:3375: "yathā tyajāmi svaśarīrajīvitaṃ kāruṇyahetorna ca svargahetorarthāya lokasya sadevakasya bhaved ihāparvatamātramucchrayaṃ //
T01bsu018_u:3376: yathā tyajāmi priyarūpasaṃpadaṃ na śakrabrahmāṇa na mārakāraṇāt /
T01bsu018_u:3377: arthaṃ karo bheṣyasi devaloke bhaveyaṃ mahyaṃ bahumānsaśoṇitaṃ //
T01bsu018_u:3378: śṛṇvantu nāgā naradevayakṣā ye devatā śailagirau nivāsiṇaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3379: kṛpā mamotpannaya sattvahetoḥ tarpaṣya sattvāṃ svakamāṃsaśoṇitaiḥ" //
T01bsu018_u:3381: yadā ca mayā kṛtaṃ praṇidhānaṃ, kṣubhitāstrayo lokāḥ, kaṃpitā dharaṇī,
T01bsu018_u:3384: praṇidhānavaśena mama parvatapramāṇamātmabhāvaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ, yojanaśataṃ vistāreṇa yojanamuccatvena; yāvan manuṣyamṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ārabdhā mānsarudhiraṃ bhakṣayituṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3385: mama ca kulaputra sa kāyaḥ sattvaiḥ paribhujyamānaḥ pratidinaṃ vardhate, yojanaśatasahasraṃ vistāreṇa saṃvṛttaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3387: sarvatra mānuṣaśirāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ sakeśakarṇanayanānāsauṣṭhadāntāḥ sajihvā anekamukhaśatasahasrāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3389: "bhoḥ sattvā bho gṛhṇatha yenārthaṃ, mānsaṃ paribhuñjatha, rudhiraṃ pivatha, nayanāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3391: yasyārthaṃ yenārthaṃ yāvadarthaṃ saṃtarpitaśarīrāḥ paripurṇābhiprāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha, śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena
T01bsu018_u:3393: ayaṃ yuṣmākamupabhogaparibhogo na kṣīyate, na ca yuṣmākaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3394: śraddhādeyaṃ bhaviṣyati, mā vaḥ kṣiprameva jīvitakṣayo bhavatu" /
T01bsu018_u:3396: 365) ye ca tatra vijñāḥ sattvāste kecicchrāvakayāne cittamutpādayanti,
T01bsu018_u:3397: kecit pratyekabuddhayāne, kecidanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti, kecit punardevamanuṣyopapattau
T01bsu018_u:3398: mānsaṃ bhakṣayanti, rudhiraṃ pivanti, kecinnayanāni gṛhṇanti, kecit
T01bsu018_u:3399: karṇau, kecinnāsāṃ, kecidoṣṭhau, keciddāntāṃ gṛhṇanti; gṛhitvā
T01bsu018_u:3400: prakramanti; praṇidhānavaśena cānyonyaṃ prādurbhavati, mānsaṃ na cāpacayaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3402: yāvaddaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sarvajambūdvīpakā manuṣyā yakṣamṛgapakṣiṇo 'pi svaśarīreṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa taiśca daśabhirvarṣasahasrairgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni mayā netrāṇi
T01bsu018_u:3404: sumerusahasrapramāṇaṃ mayā mānsaṃ parityaktaṃ, cakravāḍaparvatapramāṇā mayā jihvā parityaktā, yugandharamerupramāṇā mayā karṇāḥ parityaktāḥ,
T01bsu018_u:3405: vipulāsumerupramāṇā mayā nāsāḥ parityaktāḥ, imaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇā mayā dāntāḥ parityaktāḥ, kṛtsnaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prajñāpanapramāṇaṃ me tatra svacarma parityaktaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3407: paśya kulaputra daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ svaśarīraparityāgāḥ parityaktā ekajīvitena; evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ sattvāḥ saṃtarpitāḥ; ekacittakṣaṇamapi me vipratisāro notpannaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3408: evaṃ ca me tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3410: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ, iyaṃ me āśā paripūryatu, yathā mayaikadvīpe svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāḥ saṃtarpitāḥ, evameva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā varṣasahasrā asminnarajamerujugupsite buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpo mamātmabhāvaḥ prādurabhavat, yathaikadvīpe daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evaṃ sarvadvīpeṣu sattvāṃ svamānsarudhiracarmanayanakarṇanāsauṣṭhajihvākeśaiḥ saṃtarpayitvā triṣu
T01bsu018_u:3411: yāneṣu samādāpayeyaṃ, manuṣyāṃ yakṣarākṣasāṃ sarvatiryagyonikān ye kecin mānsarudhirabhojanāhārāḥ pṛthagyakṣā yāvadantaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ tāṃścāhaṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3412: yathā cāhamekasmin buddhakṣetre svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3414: 367) buddhakṣetreṣu svamānsarudhiracarmanayanāṃ yāvajjihvābhirevaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān mahākalpān teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu svakāyajīvitena sattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:3416: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravartitadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, māhamanuttarāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3417: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ, mā cāhaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaramāṇo buddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ mā ca dharmaśabdaṃ mā saṅghaśabdaṃ mā pāramitāśabdaṃ mā
T01bsu018_u:3418: mārabalaparāśayaśabdaṃ mā vaiśāradyaśabdaṃ yāvat kuśalaśabdamapi saṃsāre mā śṛṇuyāṃ, nityaṃ cāvīcau narake saṃbhaveyaṃ; yadi me evaṃrūpaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3419: svaśarīraparityāgaḥ sattvasaṃtarpaṇārthe na saṃpadyata, naivaṃrūpaṃ ca me
T01bsu018_u:3420: praṇidhānaṃ paripūri syādyathā me āśā cintitā /
T01bsu018_u:3421: ye 'pi cemasmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvatra dvīpeṣvekaikasmiṃ dvīpa evaṃrūpā ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktāḥ sattvāṃśca mānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitā, evaṃ daśasu dikṣu
T01bsu018_u:3422: gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā evaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena svamānsarudhireṇa santarpitāḥ
T01bsu018_u:3423: paśya (KpSū 368) kulaputra tathāgatasya dānapāramitā ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ ya mayānuprabandhena tatkālaṃ netrāḥ
T01bsu018_u:3424: parityaktāḥ teṣāṃ punarayaṃ jambūdvīpe yāvattrāyastriṃśaddevaparyantapramāṇe rāśirbhavet /
T01bsu018_u:3426: punaraparaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādaprameyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena ayaṃ buddhakṣetraścandravidyuto nāma babhūva; tamapi pañcakaṣāyaṃ babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:3427: ahaṃ cāsmiṃ jambudvīpe rājā babhūva pradīpapradyoto nāma balavāṃścakravartī /
T01bsu018_u:3428: evaṃ ca mayā sarvajaṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu
T01bsu018_u:3430: paścādahamudyānabhūmiṃ niryātaḥ svabhūmidarśanāya; tatra cāhaṃ puruṣamadrākṣaṃ, paścādbāhuṃ gāḍhabandhanaṃ badhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayāmātyāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3433: "]ayaṃ puruṣo devasya sāparādhiko; yadetasya puruṣasya saṃvatsare śaṣpaṃ dhānyaṃ cotpadyate tato devasya ṣaṭkāṃśo
T01bsu018_u:3434: deyaḥ, yathānye kuṭumbino dadantyāyadvāraṃ ye devasya nagaragrāmajanapadakarvaṭeṣu prativasanti (KpSū 369) karmāntena jīvikāṃ kalpayanti; taṃ caiṣa puruṣo na dadāti" /
T01bsu018_u:3439: "deva na kaścit suprasannacitto dadāti, yaddevasya divasedivase 'nnapānabhojanaparibhogo devīnāṃ devasya cāntaḥpuradevasya putrāṇāṃ duhitṛṇāṃ upabhogaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tatparaḥ sakāśāduddhriyate na ca kaścit prasannaḥ prayacchati" /
T01bsu018_u:3442: mama pañcaputraśatāni babhūvustāṃśca bodhau samādāpayitvā, imaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ pañcabhāgaśatāni kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ pradattaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3443: ahaṃ ca tapovanaṃ gatvā riṣipravrajyena brahmacaryaṃ cacāra; vanakhaṇḍe uḍumbaramūle dakṣiṇasya
T01bsu018_u:3444: mahāsamudrasya nātidūre navamūlaphalāhāro viharāmi dhyāyī anupūrveṇa pañcābhijñaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3445: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśatā jambūdvīpakānāṃ vāṇijānāṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇāstaistataḥ prabhūto ratnaskandha āsāditaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3446: tatra ca candro nāma sārthavāhaḥ (KpSū 370) tena bhāgyavatā vijñapuruṣeṇa
T01bsu018_u:3448: sa tato ratnadvīpādvipulaṃ ratnadhanaskandhaṃ taṃ ca cintāmaṇiṃ gṛhītvā saṃprasthitaḥ, tataḥ kṣubhitaḥ samudro nāgā ākulā rudanti devatā yāstatra nivāsinyastatra cāśvasto nāma riṣirbodhisattvaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tatropapannaḥ; tena mahāsattvena sa sārthaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa ca mahāsamudrāduttāritastasya ca sārthavāhasyānyataro duṣṭarākṣasaḥ pratyarthiko 'vatāraprekṣī vivaragaveṣī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ
T01bsu018_u:3450: tena saptadivasāni paramakaluṣā vātavṛṣṭiravasṛtā; yataste vaṇijaḥ praṇaṣṭamārgā paramabhītāduccasvareṇa krandanti rudanti
T01bsu018_u:3451: paridevanti, devatāmāyācanti śivavaruṇāṃ yāvan mātāpitaramākrandanti priyaputrāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3452: yāvadaśroṣīdahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa yāvattatrāgatvā vaṇijaḥ samāśvāsitāḥ, "samāgato 'haṃ; mā bhāyatha; ahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ mārgāmupadarśayiṣyāmi, yāvajjambūdvīpaṃ (KpSū 371) svastinā kṣemeṇa ca
T01bsu018_u:3454: tadāhaṃ paṭṭaṃ tailena mrakṣayitvā svahastaṃ veṣṭya agninā prajvālya satyavacanamakarot - "yadi mayā ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṣā caturbhirbrāhmairvihārairvanakhaṇḍanivāsināṃ sattvānāmarthāya hitāya
T01bsu018_u:3455: navamūlaphalāhāreṇa caturaśītīnāṃ nāgayakṣasahasrāṇāṃ cittasantatiḥ paripācitā avaivartikāśca sthāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T01bsu018_u:3456: tena satyena satyavacanena kuśalamūlaparipākena jvalatu me hastaṃ; labhantu mārgaṃ vaṇijaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa jambūdvīpaṃ prāpayantu" /
T01bsu018_u:3457: yāvat saptarātridivasāḥ svahastaṃ jvālitavān, te vaṇijo jambūdvīpe
T01bsu018_u:3458: sthāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ : yadā jambūdvīpaṃ ratnaparihīṇaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3459: bhavet, tad yadāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ, tadā iyaṃ me
T01bsu018_u:3460: āśā paripūryatu, sārthavāho bhaveyaṃ jambudvīpe saptavārāṃ cintāmaṇimānayitvā vividhaṃ ratnavarṣaṃ abhipravarṣayeyaṃ; yāvat sarvadvīpeṣvasmin buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu ratnaṃ pravarṣayeyaṃ, yāvatpūrvoktaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3461: / (KpSū 372) evaṃ ca me āśā paripūrṇā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3462: mahākalpānāmantareṇa sārthavāho 'bhūvan, gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ratnāni pravarṣitāni; ekaikadvīpe saptavārāṃ vividhaṃ ratnavarṣaṃ pravarṣitaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3463: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ratnaiḥ paripurṇābhiprāyāḥ kṛtāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3465: punaraparaṃ kulaputrāprameyāṇāṃ kalpānāmatyayenāntareṇāyaṃ buddhakṣetrastimiraṃ nāmābhūt; saṃtoṣaṇe kalpe vartamāne pañcakaṣāye pañcavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ praṇidhānenāhamasmin jambūdvīpe sūryamālagandho nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūvan vedapāṭhakaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3466: tatkālaṃ ca sattvā bhūyasā śāśvatadṛṣṭayo 'bhūvan savairaparākramāḥ sakalahādhiṣṭhānāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3467: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ mahābalavegaparākrameṇa sattvānāṃ śatrubhūtaṃ skandhaprayogena dharmaṃ deśayāmi, śūnyagrāmāyatanapratyavekṣaṇāpratyayasamanubaddhaṃ sotpādavyayaṃ ānāpānasmṛtimanaskāraṃ darśayāmi te 'nuttarāyāṃ (KpSū 373)
T01bsu018_u:3468: samyaksaṃbodhau cittotpādanakuśalamūlapariṇāmanābhiyojitāḥ, svayameva cāhaṃ pañcābhijñaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ; tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā mamāvavādānuśāsanena pañcābhijñāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3469: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kalahavigrahavairānavasṛjya vanakhaṇḍamāśṛtya vanakhaṇḍe mūlaphalāhārā dhyāyantaścaturbhirbrāhmairvihārai rātridivasamatināmitavantaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3470: tataḥ kṣīyamāṇe kalpe yadā tairdakṣiṇīyaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
T01bsu018_u:3472: praśāntāḥ, akālavātavarṣāḥ praśamitāḥ, praṇītā ojavatīpṛthivīsaṃniśritāḥ śaṣpā babhūvuḥ
T01bsu018_u:3474: tadāhamevaṃ cintayāmi, "yadyahaṃ sattvānāṃ vyādhiṃ na śaktaḥ śamayituṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:3475: tasya mamaitadabhavad, "yannūnamahaṃ śakraṃ mahābrāhmaṇaṃ lokapālānanye ca devarṣayo vā (KpSū 374) nāgarṣayo vā śakrarṣayo vā manuṣyarṣayaśca sannipātayeyaṃ, bhaiṣajyopakaraṇaśāstraṃ sattvānāṃ hitārthamupadarśayeyaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3476: / tadāhamṛddhyā gatvā śakrabrahmāṇalokapāladevarṣīṇāṃ nāgarṣīṇāṃ śakrarṣīṇāṃ manuṣyarṣīṇāṃ ārocayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3477: ekaviḍapatirnāma parvataḥ, tatra saṃnipātayitvā viḍacarakamūrdhani nāma sthānaṃ bhūtasaṃnivāraṇapratiśaraṇaṃ rakṣāvātapittaśleṣmasaṃprasādanaśāstraṃ nirdeśayeyaṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:3480: tatra mahāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā mayaikadivase 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ prajñāvabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ, triṣu ca yāneṣu
T01bsu018_u:3481: niyojitā, apāyapathāḥ pithitāḥ, svargapathapratiṣṭhāpitā, vividhāśca vyādhayaḥ praśamitāḥ parimocittāśca /
T01bsu018_u:3483: tadanena kulaputra (KpSū 375) kuśalamūlavipākena iyaṃ me praṇidhānāśā paripūrṇāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3485: svargapathe ca pratiṣṭhāpitā, glānapratyayopakaraṇārthaṃ devarṣiyakṣasaṅghāḥ sannipātitāḥ sattvānāmarthāya viḍacarakamūrdhani devaloke prakāśite sattvānāmārogyakauśalyamevameva timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu caivaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, sattvāśca svargapathe pratiṣṭhāpitā, devanāgayakṣamanuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sannipātitā
T01bsu018_u:3487: yathena timire buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, sattvāśca triṣu yāneṣu
T01bsu018_u:3488: niyojitāḥ, svargapathe ca pratiṣṭhāpitā, vividhāśca vidyāsthānā loke
T01bsu018_u:3489: prakāśitāḥ, sattvā vyādhitaḥ parimocitā, anuttarā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpā āśā paripūrṇāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3490: api tatra timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3492: jñānena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvaikaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ
T01bsu018_u:3495: bodhicaryāyāṃ, ayaṃ ca tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ sucaritānāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3496: tathā pratyavarakālasamaye 'saṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairadhikatarairantareṇedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vicitadoṣaṃ nāmābhūt, saṃśrayase mahākalpe vartamāne tadapi pañcakaṣāyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3497: purimāyāṃ diśyanupañcāśāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ vaḍaṃ nāma jambūdvīpamabhūt /
T01bsu018_u:3499: caturdvīpeśvaraḥ cakravartī rājā ambaro nāma babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:3500: tatra ca mayā sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3502: tatra ca me yācanakā āgatvā vividhāni ratnāni yācanti, tadyathā hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ (KpSū 377)
T01bsu018_u:3509: na kevalaṃ tāttakā nirdeśayanti yāttakā devasya yācanakāḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:3511: "yadyahaṃ pañcakaṣāye loke vartamāne tīvrakleśāraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3514: yadahamasmin buddhakṣetre nidhidarśako nāma nāgarājā bhaveyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3515: sarvatra cāsmiṃ vijitaghoṣe buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu ca ekaikasmin dvīpe saptajanmāni parigṛhṇīyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3516: ekaikasmiṃśca janmani nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi darśayeyaṃ prayaccheyaṃ ca
T01bsu018_u:3518: ekaikaśca nidhiyojanasahasrāṇi gatvā vistareṇa paripūrṇamapi ratnaṃ sattvānāṃ nidarśayeyaṃ prayacchayeyaṃ (KpSū 378) ca, yadasmiṃ buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3520: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasmin kṣetre sarvatra dvīpe saptajanmāni pratigṛhṇīyāṃ", yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3521: yadā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaganatale devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairantarīkṣāt puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā sādhukāraścānupradattaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3525: devairgaganatalagataiḥ sarvaṃdada iti nāma kṛtaṃ, śrutvā caiṣametadabhavat /
T01bsu018_u:3527: yadi parityakṣyati tadā sarvaṃdada iti nāma bhaviṣyati" /
T01bsu018_u:3535: (KpSū 379) atha na dāsyati na sarvaṃdado bhaviṣyati" /
T01bsu018_u:3536: tatastasyāgrataḥ tatra jyotīraso nāma māṇavako rājño 'mbarasyāgrataḥ
T01bsu018_u:3538: śrutvā ca rājñāmbareṇa paramaprītimanasā svayameva brāhmaṇaṃ snāpayitvā paṭṭaṃ badhvā rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayitvā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3542: mamaitarhi sarvajambūdvīpe rājā pratiṣṭhāpito vartatvasya jambūdvīpe ājñā,
T01bsu018_u:3544: yadā cāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ, yadā yuvarājatvena vyākuryāmanuttarāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3546: roco nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau pādau yācitau, tasya mayā svayameva prasannacittena tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svapādau chitvā
T01bsu018_u:3550: 380) tatra drāṣṭāvo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhe netre yācite, tasya ca mayā
T01bsu018_u:3551: ubhe netre utpādya datte, peyālaṃ, anuttaraṃ pañcacakṣuḥ pratilabhāya
T01bsu018_u:3553: na cireṇa saracchighoṣo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau karṇau yācitau, svayameva tasya mayā karṇau chitvā dattau,
T01bsu018_u:3555: saṃjīvanaśca nāmājīviko 'bhūt, tena me puruṣanimittaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ yācitaṃ, svayameva ca mayā
T01bsu018_u:3558: apareṇa ca me māṃsarudhiraṃ yācitaṃ, svayameva ca mayā dattaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:3560: aparaśca kṣīraso nāma parivrājakastena ca me ubhau hastau yācitau, svayameva ca mayā dakṣiṇena hastena vāmaṃ hastaṃ chitvā dakṣiṇaṃ chedāpayitvā datto,
T01bsu018_u:3562: yadā cāṅgapratyaṅgāni chinnāni tadā ca mayā rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3563: "yadi (KpSū 381) me 'nena parityāgenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā paripūryeta, avaśyamahamasya kāyasya pratigrāhakaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3569: te māṃ gṛhītvā bahirnagaraśmaśānabhūmau choritvā prakāntāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3570: tatra daṃśamaśakā āgatvā rudhiraṃ pibanti, kurkuraśṛgālagṛdhrā āgatvā mānsaṃ bhakṣayanti /
T01bsu018_u:3573: parityaktaṃ, sarvaśarīraṃ caivāṅgapratyaṅgāni parityajatā, ekakṣaṇamapi na vipratisārikṛtaṃ cittaṃ, na ca me roṣa utpāditastena me āśā paripūryatu,
T01bsu018_u:3574: ayaṃ me kāyo mānsaparvataḥ saṃtiṣṭhatāṃ, ye kecit sattvā mānsāhārā rudhirapānāste māṃsaṃ bhakṣayantu rudhiraṃ pibeyantu /
T01bsu018_u:3576: me sattvā māṃsaṃ bhakṣayeyū rudhiraṃ ca pibeyustāvan me praṇidhānavaśena śarīraṃ vardhatu, anupūrveṇa yāvadyojanaśatasahasramuccatvena kāyaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3578: tatra mayā varṣasahasraṃ svamānsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā; yāvabhyaśca mayā jihvāḥ parityaktā yā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ paribhaktāḥ praṇidhānavaśena cānyonyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ teṣāṃ ayaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇo rāśiḥ syānnityaṃ cānuttarāprabhūtājihvatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3579: tatrāhaṃ cyutvā rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe pūrvapraṇidhānena nāgeṣūpapanno nidhisaṃdarśano nāma nāgarājā babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:3580: yāmeva rātriṃ nāgeṣūpapannastāmeva rātriṃ nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nidhānānāṃ saṃdarśitāni svayameva ghoṣaṃ cārayāmi /
T01bsu018_u:3584: gṛhītvā bhoḥ sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya
T01bsu018_u:3588: tatra ca rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe saptanāgajanmaparivartena saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayo nirdarśitāśca pradattāśca /
T01bsu018_u:3591: nānāvidhaiśca ratnaiḥ saṃtarpitā, anuttaradvātriṃśallakṣaṇapratilābhāya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3592: evaṃ dvitīye dvīpe saptabhirnāgajanmaparivartairevaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān /
T01bsu018_u:3593: evaṃ tritīye yāvatsarvatra vijitadoṣāyāṃ lokadhātau sarveṣu dvīpeṣu evaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3594: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamesu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu, ekaikasmin dvīpe evaṃrūpāḥ
T01bsu018_u:3595: saptanāgajanmaparivarteṣu mayā yāvat saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayaḥ sattvānāṃ pradattā, yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3599: 384) ye bodhisattvā evaṃrūpāṃ tīvrabalavīryeṇa bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇavantaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:3600: na kaścidetarhi, na ca punaḥ kaścit paścādbhaviṣyati bodhisattvo ya evaṃ tīvreṇodyogabalavegenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caret,
T01bsu018_u:3602: tadā cāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena pratyavarakālasamayenedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pravāḍodupānirnāma babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:3603: śūnye pañcakaṣāye utpale mahākalpe vartamāne 'syāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmahaṃ śakro 'bhūvan savirocano nāma /
T01bsu018_u:3604: apaśyamahamasmin jambūdvīpe sattvānāmakuśalaparyeṣṭicaryāṃ; dṛṣṭvā cāhaṃ paramabhīṣaṇakaṃ yakṣarūpamātmānamabhinirmāyāsmiṃ jambūdvīpe 'vatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ purataḥ pratyasthāṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3605: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā māṃ pṛcchanti /
T01bsu018_u:3612: tāṃścāhaṃ na khādayāmi ye manuṣyā yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātādviratā, yāvan mithyādṛṣṭyāḥ prativiratā,
T01bsu018_u:3613: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti pratyekabuddhayānena vā śrāvakayānena (KpSū 385) vā cittānyutpādayanti tānapyahaṃ na khādayāmi" /
T01bsu018_u:3614: tatra ca me sattvā nirmitakāḥ paribhūktāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā te sattvā bhayena yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātātprativiratā adattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3615: kaiścidanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ, kaiścit pratyekabuddhayāne kaiścicchrāvakayāne cittamutpāditaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3616: sarve cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu triṣu ca yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3618: samyaksaṃbodhau āśā paripūryeta, tadidaṃ me praṇidhānaparipūrṇaṃ bhavet,
T01bsu018_u:3619: yathā ca me cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvāḥ kuśale mārge niyojitā /
T01bsu018_u:3620: evameva sarvatrāsmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu sattvāḥ evaṃrūpeṇa bhayena māṃ paśyeyuḥ, daśasu caiva kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ, triṣu ca yāneṣu niyojayeyaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3621: evameva samantāddaśasu dikṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:3623: evameva me kulaputra āśā praṇidhiśca paripūrṇaḥ sarvatra pravāḍodupānāyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā yakṣarūpeṇa vinītāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
T01bsu018_u:3625: (KpSū 386) śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yakṣarūpeṇa mayā manuṣyāḥ
T01bsu018_u:3627: yathā ca mayā bahavaḥ sattvā bhayāt kuśalacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ; tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa mamaitarhi
T01bsu018_u:3628: bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇasya bodhimabhisaṃbodhukāmasya māraḥ pāpīyāṃ mahāsainyenopasaṃkrānto bodhau vyākṣepakaraṇārthaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3629: ayaṃ me kulaputra saṃkṣiptena dānapāramitā; bodhicaryāṃ caramāṇasya labdhā cāhaṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ kṣāntiṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dhāraṇīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ samādhiṃ pañcalaukikābhijñāḥ pratilabdhāḥ; evaṃrūpaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān /
T01bsu018_u:3630: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ
T01bsu018_u:3631: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayāne, evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakayāne samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3634: paryupāsitāḥ, ekaikasya buddhasyāntike sāgarodakabindupramāṇā mayā guṇāḥ parigṛhītāḥ, gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ mayā pūja kṛtā,
T01bsu018_u:3635: gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ tathāgataśrāvakānāṃ pūjā kṛtā, evaṃ mātāpitṝṇāṃ pañcābhijñānāmṛṣīṇāṃ pūjā kṛtā /
T01bsu018_u:3636: mayā ca kṛpayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena svamāṃsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā, idānīmapi dharmeṇa saṃtarpitāḥ //
T01bsu018_u:3637: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dānaparivarto nāma pañcamaḥ // 5 //
T01bsu018_u:3639: VI (EPILOGUE) yathāhaṃ kulaputra buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi daśasu dikṣu
T01bsu018_u:3640: buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtān, ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
T01bsu018_u:3641: ye mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ
T01bsu018_u:3642: evamevaitarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāste buddhā bhagavantaḥ pravartitadhārmikadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanto yāpayanto dharmaṃ deśayanto 'drakṣaṃ, ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3643: evaṃ yāvatṣaṭsu pāramitāṣu vaktavyaṃ, evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottaraheṣṭimopariṣu dikṣu vaktavyaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3645: saṃpuṣpite lokadhātau vimalatejaguṇarājo nāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati /
T01bsu018_u:3646: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3649: purimāyāṃ diśi abhiratye buddhakṣetre akṣobhyo nāma
T01bsu018_u:3650: tathāgato, jambūnade buddhakṣetre sūryagarbho nāma tathāgataḥ, ratīśvare buddhakṣetre ratīśvaraghoṣajyotirnāma tathāgataḥ, sūryapratiṣṭhite buddhakṣetre jñānabhāskaro nāma tathāgataḥ, jayavaiśraye buddhakṣetre nāganinardito nāma tathāgataḥ, saṃjīvane buddhakṣetre vajrakīrtirnāma
T01bsu018_u:3651: tathāgataḥ, svaraje buddhakṣetre vyāghraraśmirnāma tathāgataḥ, aratīye buddhakṣetre sūryagarbho nāma tathāgataḥ, vairaprabhe buddhakṣetre kīrtiśvararājo nāma tathāgataḥ, meruprabhe buddhakṣetre (KpSū 390)
T01bsu018_u:3652: acintyarājo nāma tathāgataḥ, saṃvare buddhakṣetre jyotiśrīrnāma
T01bsu018_u:3655: dharaṇāvatyāṃ buddhakṣetre jñānabimbo nāma tathāgataḥ, kusumavicitre buddhakṣetre vimalanetro nāma tathāgataḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3656: etāṃ pūrvaṃgamāṃ kṛtvā kulaputra purimāyāṃ diśyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ deśayato buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi /
T01bsu018_u:3658: pūrve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā mayā ca prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā, mayā ca prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanītā yatra taiḥ sarvaprathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau"
T01bsu018_u:3659: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ saṃpuṣpitāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3660: ye tatra bodhisattvāste tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya (KpSū 391) tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3662: "ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadi idamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ bhagavata āsanaṃ prakaṃpitam[?"]iti
T01bsu018_u:3663: sa tathāgatastānavocat - "asti kulaputrāḥ paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrādekonanavatibuddhakṣetrānatikramya tatra sahā nāma lokadhātustatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
T01bsu018_u:3664: sa etarhi caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati /
T01bsu018_u:3665: tena tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādapitāḥ, yena me prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpannaṃ;
T01bsu018_u:3666: tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ; tena tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caratāhaṃ prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3667: bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto, yatra me prathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu018_u:3668: sa ca me śākyamunistathāgataḥ kalyāṇamitraḥ sahe lokadhātau tiṣṭhati yāpayati, sa evaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ imaṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati /
T01bsu018_u:3670: ko yuṣmākaṃ kulaputrotsahate (KpSū 392) madvacanāt sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gantuṃ śākyamunestathāgatasyārogyakauśalyaṃ paripṛcchanāya?" /
T01bsu018_u:3673: "]ya iha bhadanta bhagavan saṃpuṣpite buddhakṣetre ṛddhimantaḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇapāramitāprāptāste 'dya pūrvāhnasamaye mahāntamavabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvānyasmādbuddhakṣetrādvikurvyābhyāgatastenāyaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3677: bhadanta bhagavan gamiṣyāmastaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ taṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāya paryupasanāya taṃ ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāya" /
T01bsu018_u:3681: "tāmapi vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan diśaṃ na jānīmo yatra sahā lokadhātuḥ
T01bsu018_u:3683: tataḥ sa vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārya pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo
T01bsu018_u:3687: yataste bodhisattvāḥ paśyanti sarvāvadimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvairgaganatale ca devanāgayakṣāsuraiḥ sphuṭaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3688: dṛṣṭvā ca punaste bodhisattvāstaṃ vimalaguṇatejarājānaṃ tathāgatamevamāhuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3689: "paśyāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvāvantaṃ sphuṭaṃ, nāsti tatrāvakāśo 'ntaśo daṇḍanikṣepaṇamātramapi yanna sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3690: paśyāmaḥ śākyamunistathāgato 'smān nirīkṣate dharmaṃ ca deśayati" /
T01bsu018_u:3691: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgatasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmevamāha - "samantacakṣuḥ kulaputrāḥ śākyamunistathāgato /
T01bsu018_u:3692: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau sattvā bhūmisthitā vā antarīkṣasthitā vā tataścaikaikaḥ sattva evaṃ saṃjānāti, "maṃ śākyamunistathāgataḥ sarvacetasā nirīkṣate mamaikamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati" /
T01bsu018_u:3693: sarvavarṇaṃśca sa kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati ekavarṇasthānaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3695: 394) ye ca tatra kulaputra sattvā brāhmabhaktāste śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ brahmāṇaṃ samanupaśyanti, mahābrahmapativyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti; yāvad ye mārabhaktikā, ye sūryabhaktikā, ye candrabhaktikā, ye
T01bsu018_u:3696: vaiśravaṇabhaktikā, ye virūḍhakabhaktikā, ye virūpākṣabhaktikā, ye
T01bsu018_u:3698: maheśvararūpavarṇasaṃsthānavacanavyāhāreṇa śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti
T01bsu018_u:3699: yāvaccaturaśītistatra sattvānāṃ varṇasaṃsthānabhaktirūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi te tathā caiva śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti" /
T01bsu018_u:3700: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi rahagarjito nāma bodhisattvo dvitīyaśca jyotiraśmirnāma bodhisattvaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3702: "gacchatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ madvacanādārogyakauśalyaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatha" /
T01bsu018_u:3704: "sarvāvantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sakṣitigaganaṃ (KpSū 395) bodhisattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3705: na cātraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo 'sti kṣitau gagane vā yatra vayaṃ pratitiṣṭhemaḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:3706: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgata āha - "mā kulaputrā evaṃ vadatha, "nāsti sahe buddhakṣetre 'vakāśaḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:3707: vistīrṇāvakāśaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgato 'cintyairbuddhaguṇaiḥ, pūrvapraṇidhānena vistīrṇā tathāgatasya kṛpāśāsanāvatārapraveśā, triśaraṇagamanaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:3708: triyānadharmadeśanāmārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati, trividhaṃ ca śikṣāsaṃvaraṃ
T01bsu018_u:3710: sattvānuddharati, tisṛṣu ca śiveṣu patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati /
T01bsu018_u:3712: vaineyasattvāvekṣayā madhye śailaparvate indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati, saptāhamekaparyaṅkenātināmayati, vimuktiprītisukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /
T01bsu018_u:3713: sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā tathāgatakāyena sphuṭā, nāsti tatrāvakāśo 'ntaśaścaturaṅgulapramāṇaṃ (KpSū 396) yattathāgatakāyena na sphuṭaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3714: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhir diśābhirdvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sahe lokadhātau yastasya parvatasyābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya sa ca kulaputra śākyamunistathāgatastatra parśadi
T01bsu018_u:3715: ridhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān; sā ca sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā caivaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3716: vipulā ca prādurbhūtā, yadā te dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sālaguhāyāṃ praviṣṭā vistīrṇāvakāśaṃ paśyanti sma /
T01bsu018_u:3717: ekaikaśca bodhisattvastatra tathāgatasya vividhabodhisattvavikurvaṇena pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
T01bsu018_u:3718: ekaiko bodhisattvastatra saptaratnamayāsanaṃ nirmitavān yatropaviṣṭā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti sma
T01bsu018_u:3720: te ca bodhisattvāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā śākyamunestathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu saṃprasthitāḥ aciraprakāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sālaguhā yathā paurvāṇāṃ saṃsthitā /
T01bsu018_u:3722: tatra caturdvīpikāyāṃ kauśiko nāma śakra āyuḥparīkṣīṇastiryagyonyupapattibhayabhītaḥ, sa caturaśītibhistrayastriṃśaddevasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sālaguhā yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati upasaṃkramya sāmantake indrākṣasya sālaguhābhavane sthitaḥ, tasya bhagavato 'nubhāvena etadabhavat
T01bsu018_u:3724: sa ca pañcaśikho madhureṇa svareṇa bhagavantamabhimukhaṃ staviṣyati, tadā bhagavān dhyānasamādhibhyo vyutthāsyati" /
T01bsu018_u:3726: atha pañcaśikho vīṇāṃ manojñena gītavāditena bhagavato 'nubhāvena pañcabhiḥ stavaśatairbhagavato varṇamabhāṣata /
T01bsu018_u:3727: yadā ca kulaputra pañcaśikha ārabdho bhagavato 'bhistavanāya tataḥ sa śākyamunirbhagavān sughoṣavairocanaketuṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannastena samādhinā ye sahe lokadhātau maharddhikayakṣarākṣasā vāsurā vā garuḍā vā
T01bsu018_u:3728: kinnarā vā mahoragā vā gandharvā vā sarve kāmāvacarā devā sarve rūpāvacarā devaputrāstatra sannipātā babhūvurye ca svarabhaktikāste svaraṃ śrutvā
T01bsu018_u:3729: prasīdanti, ye varṇayaśobhaktikāste bhagavato varṇaṃ (KpSū 398) śrutvā tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśe tīvrapremaprasādagurugauravacitrīkārajātāḥ prasīdanti, ye veṇuvādyabhaktikāste veṇuvādyaṃ śrutvā prasīdanti /
T01bsu018_u:3730: tataḥ śākyamunirbhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya sālaguhāyā dvāraṃ darśāpayāmāsa
T01bsu018_u:3733: sa śākyamunistathāgata uvāca - "niṣīdadhvaṃ yakṣā yāvattasthuḥ samāgatāḥ"
T01bsu018_u:3734: / tataḥ sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā saṃsthitā yathā dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamā yakṣāstatra guhāyāṃ praviṣṭā, niṣaṇṇāyāśca tasyāḥ parṣadaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgatastathārūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavāṃ; yathā ye tasmin
T01bsu018_u:3736: navanavatikoṭyastatra śrotāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ; ye ca tatra parṣadi anuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhayānikāste śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ śṛṇvanti; tatra ca pañcaśikhagandharvapūrvaṃgamā aṣṭādaśanayutā avaivartikāḥ saṃsthitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau; yaiśca tatrānutpāditaṃ triṣu yāneṣu cittaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:3739: cittamutpāditaṃ; sa ca tatra kauśikaḥ śakro bhayātparimukto, varṣasahasraṃ
T01bsu018_u:3743: na śakyaṃ kenacittasya tathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalasya paryantamudgṛhītuṃ vā gaṇāyituṃ vā /
T01bsu018_u:3744: vistīrṇaṃ tasya tathāgatasyopāyakauśalyaṃ sattvaparipākaśca: na śakyaṃ tasya tathāgatasyopāyakauśalyaṃ paryantamudgṛhītuṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3745: vistīrṇakāyaśca kulaputra tathāgato; na śākyaṃ kenacittasya mūrdhānamavalokayituṃ, kāyasya vā paryantamadhigantuṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3746: yāvantaśca sattvā etarhi tatra sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitā yadi te sattvāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya kukṣau praviśeyuste sarve tatra vicareyuste ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasyaikaromamukhe praviśeyuḥ niṣkrameyuśca; te ekaromamukhāttasya tathāgatasya na śaktāḥ paryantamudgṛhītuṃ ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vāntaśo (KpSū 400) divyenāpi cakṣuṣā /
T01bsu018_u:3749: yāvantaśca daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikasamā buddhakṣetrā evaṃ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ sattvaistadyathāpi nāmaitarhi sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarve te sattvā etarhi sahe buddhakṣetre viśeyuḥ sarve te tatra vicareyuḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3751: ] tathaiva tasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ babhūva /
T01bsu018_u:3752: tiṣṭhatu kulaputraikaṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ, sacetkulaputra yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sahasraṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrā evaṃ vistīrṇāḥ tadyathaitarhi sahabuddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇaṃ sattvaiḥ te sarve etarhi sahe lokadhātau praviśeyuste sarve tatra vicareyurevaṃrūpaṃ tasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpāditānuttarajñānapratilābhāya praṇidhānaṃ babhūva evaṃ vistīrṇabuddhakṣetraḥ sa kulaputra śākyamunistathāgataḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3754: (KpSū 401) yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ candrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ, gacchatha paścimāṃ diśaṃ yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ, mama vacanena taṃ
T01bsu018_u:3756: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgataścandrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā raharājasya bodhisattvasya jyotiraśmeśca bodhisattvasya datvāha -
T01bsu018_u:3760: tathāgatānubhāvena sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ tasya śākyamunestathāgatasya darśanāye vandanāya paryupāsanāya"
T01bsu018_u:3763: tau ca dvau bodhisattvau raharājaśca jyotiraśmiśca sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasya riddhibalena tataḥ saṃpuṣpitāyā lokadhātoḥ saṃprasthitā ekacittakṣaṇenedaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptā gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthātaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3766: purastime digbhāge ekonanavatibuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyatikramya tatra saṃpuṣpito nāma lokadhātuḥ, tatra vimalaguṇatejarājo nāma tathāgataḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3767: sa ca punastathāgato bodhisattvagaṇaparivārastathāgatasya guṇavarṇakīrtayamāna evamāha - "śākyamunirnāma tathāgataḥ sahe buddhakṣetre tiṣṭhati yāpayati /
T01bsu018_u:3768: tena ca tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇenāhaṃ sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitastasya ca vacanena mayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niveśito,
T01bsu018_u:3771: yathā teneme candrarocavimalā puṣpāḥ preṣitā ārogyakauśalyaṃ ca pṛcchati" /
T01bsu018_u:3773: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipattitaste cāpi dṛṣṭvākṣobhyasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ paripṛcchanti sma /
T01bsu018_u:3776: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ purimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatadūtā bodhisattvā imaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya paripṛcchanāya pūjanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
T01bsu018_u:3777: samanantaraparivāsito bhagavataḥ purimāyāṃ diśi buddhakṣetranāma parikīrtanaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ, dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ punarbhagavānārabdhaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3780: buddhakṣetrādekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya tatra sarvaśokāpagato nāma lokadhātustatrāśokaśrīrnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyati yāpayati /
T01bsu018_u:3781: mayā sa bhagavān sarvaprathamaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu018_u:3788: nāma tathāgataḥ, devasome buddhakṣetre jyotigarbho nāma tathāgataḥ,
T01bsu018_u:3790: viśiṣṭagandhe buddhakṣetre puṇyabalasālarājā nāma tathāgataḥ, suvidite buddhakṣetre manojñaghoṣasvaravinardito nāma tathāgataḥ, duraṇye buddhakṣetre sālajayabindurājā nāma tathāgataḥ, nardaścoce buddhakṣetre tejeśvaraprabhāso nāma tathāgataḥ, abhigarjite buddhakṣetre sumanojñasvaranirghoṣe nāma tathāgataḥ, ratnavisabhe buddhakṣetre ratnatalanāgendro nāma tathāgataḥ, palāmaratnavṛkṣaratne (KpSū 405)
T01bsu018_u:3791: buddhakṣetre dharmameghanirghoṣeśvarasaumyo nāma tathāgataḥ, peyālaṃ yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3792: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyāsanāni kaṃpanti /
T01bsu018_u:3793: sarve te buddhā bhagantaḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya varṇaṃ yaśaḥ kīrtimudīrayanti /
T01bsu018_u:3794: yāvattena samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi tathāgatadūtā bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpairimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya pṛcchanāya yāvaddharmaśravaṇāya" punaśca bhagavān āha - "paśyāmyahaṃ kulaputra paścimāyāṃ diśīto
T01bsu018_u:3795: buddhakṣetrāt saptānavatibuddhakṣetranayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tatropaśāntamatirnāma buddhakṣetrastatra ratnagirirnāma tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyati yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati /
T01bsu018_u:3796: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito, (KpSū 406) yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3797: buddhakṣetrāṇāṃ peyālaṃ, vararaśmikośo nāma tathāgataḥ, svarajñakośo nāma tathāgataḥ, haritālakīrtiḥ, samantagarbhaḥ, brahmakusumaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:3800: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ paścimāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yeṣāṃ śākyamuninā tathāgatena nāmāni parikīrtitāni teṣāmāsanāni kaṃpanti /
T01bsu018_u:3801: yāvattena samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhadūtā bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpairimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptā yāvanniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
T01bsu018_u:3808: mayā sa tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito, yāvatṣaṭsu
T01bsu018_u:3809: pāramitāsu; yāvanmayā sarvaprathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto, yatra tena vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhamanuttarāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3810: samyaksaṃbodhau; yadā nāma parikīrtitaṃ tadāsanaṃ kaṃpitāṃ;
T01bsu018_u:3811: yāvaccaturaśītisattvānāṃ varṇabhaktisaṃsthānarūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi tathā śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti /
T01bsu018_u:3812: tatra ca parṣadi dvau bodhisattvau, ekaḥ vigopaśikharo nāma dvitīyaḥ saṃrocanabuddho nāma; sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājo nāma tathāgatastau dvau bodhisattvavāmantrayitvaivamāha - "gacchata yūyaṃ kulaputrau sahe buddhakṣetre,
T01bsu018_u:3816: "sarvāvantaṃ bhadanta bhagavannāvāṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sakṣitigaganaṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3817: na ca tatraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo 'sti kṣitau vā gagane vā yatrāvāṃ pratiṣṭhevahi" /
T01bsu018_u:3818: sa ca tathāgata āha - "mā kulaputraivaṃ vadata, "nāsti
T01bsu018_u:3822: kulaputrau sa śākyamunistathāgato 'cintyairbuddhaguṇaiḥ, pūrvapraṇidhānena vistīrṇā tasya tathāgatasya kṛpāśāsanāvatārapraveśā, triśaraṇagamanaṃ,
T01bsu018_u:3823: tribhiryānairdharmaṃ deśayati, trividhaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaraṃ deśayati, trīṇi vimokṣadvārāṇi prakāśayati, tribhyaścāpāyebhyaḥ sattvānuddharati, triṣu ca śivapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayati /
T01bsu018_u:3825: vaineyasattvāvekṣayā viṣamaśailendraparvatamadhye indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati sma, saptāhamekaparyaṅkenātināmayati sma,
T01bsu018_u:3828: tathāgatakāyena, nāsti tatrāvakāśo 'ntaśaścaturaṅgulapramāṇaṃ yanna tathāgatakāyena sphuṭaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3829: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhyo digbhyaḥ dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sahe lokadhātau saṃprāptāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya /
T01bsu018_u:3831: gṛhṇīdhvaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ candrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ; gṛhītvā gacchata dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ diśaṃ, yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ; mama vacanāttasya śākyamunestathāgatasyārogyakauśalyaṃ pṛcchata" /
T01bsu018_u:3832: sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājastathāgataḥ candrarocavimalān puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā vigopaśikharasya bodhisattvasya dadāti saṃrocanabuddhasya ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, evaṃ cāha - "gacchata kulaputrau mamarddhibalādhānena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ" /
T01bsu018_u:3838: tatastau dvau bodhisattvau sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya tathāgatasya riddhyanubhāvena tato virajādbuddhakṣetrātsaṃprasthitāḥ, ekakṣaṇeneha buddhakṣetre 'nuprāptā
T01bsu018_u:3842: tena tathāgateneme candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ preṣitā, bhagavataścārogyakauśalyaṃ pṛcchati"
T01bsu018_u:3844: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipatitāste cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanaṃ tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchanti, yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3845: evaṃ sālendrarājā vikramaraśmiḥ padmottaraḥ (KpSū 411) candano merurājaḥ sāgaraḥ sārajyotirjñānavikramastathāgataḥ
T01bsu018_u:3846: yāvattena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā uttarapurimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatāste bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalapuṣpairiha sahe buddhakṣetre saṃprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya pṛcchanāya pūjanāya vandanāya dharmaśravaṇāya tāvadeva śākyamunistathāgata ṛddhyanubhāvena sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ye sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitāsteṣāṃ ekaikasya sattvasya yojanapramāṇamātramātmabhāvaḥ saṃsthitaḥ; sarvāvantaṃ ca sahaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3847: buddhakṣetraṃ evaṃrūpaiḥ sattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ, na kaścidbuddhakṣetre kṣitau vā gagane vāvakāśo yaḥ sattvairasphuṭo 'ntaśo 'ñjanaśalākāpradeśamātramapi
T01bsu018_u:3849: sarve ca te sattvāḥ śūnyamākāśaṃ paśyanti, na ca parasparaṃ paśyanti; na caiṣāṃ parvatasumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍaparvatāścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti, na lokāntarikā (KpSū 412) divyā vimānā ūrddhaṃ yāvadadho kāñcanacakraṃ tatorddhaṃ pṛthivī cakṣuṣo nābhāsamāgacchanti, sthāpayitvā tathāgataṃ śākyamuniṃ /
T01bsu018_u:3851: tatra ca bhagavān ākāśasphuraṇaṃ dharmāvacchedapraśrabdhisamādhiṃ samāpanno /
T01bsu018_u:3852: yataste candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ sarvaromamukhesu bhagavataḥ praviśanti /
T01bsu018_u:3853: sarve ca te sattvāḥ paśyanti sahe lokadhātāvantargatā vigatāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaitasikeṣu
T01bsu018_u:3854: manasikārarūpasaṃdarśanatāḥ, te caiva bhagavato romamukhe nirīkṣante sma /
T01bsu018_u:3860: sarve ca te sattvā ye (KpSū 413) sahe lokadhātāvantargatāḥ, sthāpayitvā nairayikāṃ yāmalaukikāṃ tairyagyonikāṃ ārūpyāvacarāṃ, sarve pariśiṣṭāḥ sattvāstasya
T01bsu018_u:3865: maitreyo bodhisattva āha - "saṃprajānaṃ tataḥ sattvāḥ samanvāharata sarve vayaṃ tathāgatasya
T01bsu018_u:3867: tataste sattvāḥ sāntarabāhiraṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ pratyakṣībhūtā "yathā vayaṃ tathāgatasya
T01bsu018_u:3871: tato maitreyaḥ sarvāvatī parṣadaṃ svareṇa vijñapayannuvāca - "śṛṇvantu
T01bsu018_u:3872: bhavantastathāgatasyaivamṛddhivikurvaṇaprātihāryaṃ yadasmākaṃ hitakaraḥ śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati tadyuṣmābhiḥ sarvacetasā samanvāhartavyāḥ" /
T01bsu018_u:3879: tatra daśaprakārā dhyānaniveśacittotpādapariṇāmanatā, yaduta sarvasattvebhyo mahākaruṇācittādhiṣṭhānaṃ, hitavastusaṃjananatā, atīrṇasattvottāraṇatayā
T01bsu018_u:3891: imasya khalu punardharmaparyāyasya bhāṣyamāṇasyāśītikoṭīgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāḥ sattvāstathāgatasya kukṣigatā avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau; gaṇanātikrāntāśca tatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye nānāvidhadhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā abhūn /
T01bsu018_u:3892: sarve ca punastathāgataśarīrādromamukhebhyo niṣkrāntā āścaryaprāptā, bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā, daśadiśaḥ prakāntāḥ, svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatāstathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalakāyapramāṇajñapanārthaṃ tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ purimāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ,
T01bsu018_u:3893: purimāyāṃ diśi yadbuddhakṣetrānatikrāmanti na ca śākyamunestathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalaṃ pratihanyate, evaṃ ca tatra svaraṃ śṛṇvanti vicitrapadārthavyañjanāḥ, tadyathā śākyamunestathāgatasya purato
T01bsu018_u:3895: (KpSū 416) api ca tatrāpi śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā na
T01bsu018_u:3896: prajñāyate, śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyaḥ sphuṭo dṛśyate bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiścāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakāścaikaromamukhe
T01bsu018_u:3898: evaṃ dvitīye romamukhe, yāvatsarvaromamukhebhyaḥ praviśanto niṣkrāmantaśca
T01bsu018_u:3900: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā yāvadbhagavataḥ kāyāntargatāḥ sā bhagavataḥ kāyaromamukhebhyo niṣkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇī kṛtvā bhagavato 'bhimukhaṃ pratyavasthādbhagavantameva vicitrārthapadavyañjanarutavyāhāraiḥ stavamānāḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3901: atha tāvaccaiva kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā vicitrāṃ ca gandhamālyavilepanavṛṣṭiṃ
T01bsu018_u:3902: pravarṣitā, divyāni ca tūryāṇi pravāditavanto, divyāni ca chatradhvajapatākāvastraduṣyābharaṇāni bhagavataḥ pūjāyodyuktāḥ //
T01bsu018_u:3903: tatra vaiśāradyasamuddhāraṇirnāma bodhisattvo yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - (KpSū 417) "kiṃ nāmāyaṃ bhadanta bhagavan
T01bsu018_u:3908: nāma, samādhānakalpāvataraṇo nāma, buddhakṣetrasandarśano nāma, sāgaropamo
T01bsu018_u:3910: punarapyāha - "kiyantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
T01bsu018_u:3911: puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi?" /
T01bsu018_u:3912: āha - "pūrvaṃ ca mayoktamiha puṇyaskandhaṃ; saṃkṣepeṇedānīṃ kathayisyāmi /
T01bsu018_u:3913: yaḥ kaścidimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi, yaśca punaḥ paścimāyāṃ
T01bsu018_u:3914: pañcāśatyāmantaśo likhitvā dhārayiṣyati, sa bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3915: prasaviṣyati, na tvevaṃ ṣoḍaśamahākalpān ṣaṭpāramitācaramāṇasya bodhisattvasya puṇyaskandhaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3917: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sayakṣanāgagandharvakumbhāṇḍapretapiśācakinnarāsurāṇāṃ duṣṭacittānāṃ prasādanaḥ, sarvarogāṇāṃ praśamanaḥ,
T01bsu018_u:3930: ko mamemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ rakṣiṣyati, adharmabhūmiṣṭhānāṃ sattvānāṃ bhinnaśīlānāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ (KpSū 419) karṇapuṭe prakāśayiṣyati,
T01bsu018_u:3932: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya; tatra parṣadi merupuṇyo nāma yakṣariṣirniṣaṇṇaḥ
T01bsu018_u:3933: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ merupuṇyaṃ yakṣariṣiṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītavān
T01bsu018_u:3937: adya cāvaivartikacittaṃ saṃjanayasvā "hai"vaṃ. bhadanta bhagavaṃścaturaśītimahākalpā atikrāmantā
T01bsu018_u:3938: yanmayā bhadanta bhagavan pūrvaṃ praṇidhānena yakṣariṣitvālabdhyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇo gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvā mayā caturṣu brāhmavihāreṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
T01bsu018_u:3941: svayameva paripācayāmi yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
T01bsu018_u:3943: idamavocadbhagavān āttamanāḥ sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
T01bsu018_u:3946: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣāṃ tathāgataḥ /
T01bsu018_u:3947: hevadatteṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādi mahāśramaṇaṃ //
